171a6(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi dga' ba gsum gyi bdag nyid med pa yin pa'i phyir ci ldang ba de ni su zhig gi yin par 'gyur zhe na brjod par bya ste/ bdag byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan nyid med pa ni skyes pa me yin gyi gang zhig bag chags dang
171b1(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i sgyu ma lta bu'i rnam par shes pa de'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba bsgom pa la ji srid 'gog pa mngon sum du mi byed pa de srid du ldang ba ste skyed par ni mi 'gyur ro// 'dir yang gsungs pa/ phyi nas de nyid yang dag
171b2(rgyud 'grel): bshad// rnam dag ye shes rang bzhin can/ zhes pa'o// phyi nas zhes pa ni bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i de ma thag tu rang rig pa las skyes pa ni dngos grub po// ji skad gsungs pa/ rang rig las ni dngos grub 'gyur// rang
171b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs phyir na bsgom pa'o// zhes pa'o// slar yang gsungs pa/ phyag rgya rgyu dang sbyor bral las// rnal 'byor snying rje thab su 'gyur// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// byang chub semasu brjod pa yin// 'di nyid bcom
171b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi zung du 'jug pa ni 'bras bur gsungs pa yin no// de gsungs pa/ rang rigs ye shes de nyid 'gyur// rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs// mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dngos dang dngos med
171b5(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres// chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid mi 'gyur dam pa yin// de nyid thams cad khyab pa po// lus kun la ni rnam
171b6(rgyud 'grel): par gnas// 'di nyid du gsungs pa/ dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing // de bzhin slar yang byon pa nyid// 'dis ni shes rab rig pa yis// de bzhin gshegs par mngon spyod bya// de la rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//
172a1(rgyud 'grel): thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sogs thabs dang // bdag byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang // kun
172a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzob don dam gzugs can gyi// byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// kun rdzob kun du lta bu ste// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no// bud med klo lnga bde ba can// e waM yi ge'i rang bzhin du// bde ba srung ba nyid kyi phyir
172a3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba can+da zhes brjod par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas// 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid// 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni// mya ngan 'das
172a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rtog mi 'gyur// 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs// 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa// 'khor ba dbang po rnams nyid de// 'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa// 'di rnams chos ni mya ngan 'das// rmongs phyir 'khor
172a5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gzugs can nyid// rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// 'dis chos 'di rnams kyi rab tu myi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongasu mkhyen pa las rgyal ba mchog rnams kyis
172a6(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi skye ba gsungs pa yin no// gal te gzhan rnams kyi bla ma rgyud pa'i rim pas rang bzhin yongasu shes par 'gyur zhing so so'i skye bo rnams kyi yin pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi bdag nyid 'ba' zhig pa yang yin//
172b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gsungs pa/ ma lus pa yi sems can gyi// skye ba gang la brjod bya ba// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// de sprul pa'i sku nyid yin/ zhes pa la sogs pa rgyas par te/ sde pa sde
172b2(rgyud 'grel): pab zhes bshad pa// lto ba gnasu brjod par bya// skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// mngal gyi khru ma chos gos yin// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po'o// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba bslab pa'i
172b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas// de bzhin sngags bzlas a dang haM// skye gnas 'khor lo'i yi ge a// bde chen gyi yang yi ge haM// gcer pu skra dang kha spu brag/ sngags bzlas kyang ni dge slong skyes// tshogs pa 'di rnams kyis sems
172b4(rgyud 'grel): can/ sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// zla bo bcu yang sa rnams yin// sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste// lus kun la ni rnam por gnas// gnyis dang gnyisu med pa'i
172b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas// sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du snang // dkyil 'khor 'khor la sogs thabs kyis// rtag tu nges par 'grub par
172b6(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// lus la ye shes chen po gnas// kun tu rtogs pa thams cad spangs// dngos po kun la khyab byed pa// lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min// de'i phyir bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i de bzhin
173a1(rgyud 'grel): nyid lnga rab tu zhugs pa'i de ma thag tu skye ba'i rim pa shes par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du na 'khor ba zad pa tsam kho narA 'gyuraro// 'khor bar gnas pa'i bar du yang dam pa'i don yang dag par
173a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i thabs dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mchog tu bde ba chen po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu rang bzhin gyis thob par 'gyur ba mA yi no// de gsungs pa/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i
173a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom// spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas// spros pa nyid ni spros med bya// sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ni// ji ltar bar ma'i srid ji bzhin// rtag tu goms po'i sbyor ba las//
173a4(rgyud 'grel): de lta nyid du dkyil 'khor snang // phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur bar// ji ltar shes pa'i bde ba chen po// de nyid de myang ba las te// gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med// de ltar yang / phung po rnams nyid dri ma med pa'i
173a5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor te// rnams cad lha mo mang por rnam par nges shing rtogs// de la dpa' bo he ru ka yang yin pa s+ho// 'jig med sku ste de bzhin nyid kyi ro yin no// kye rdo rje'i rgyud du yang gsungs pa/ bde ba nag po bde bya
173a6(rgyud 'grel): ser / bde ba dmar po bde ba dkar// bde ba sngon po bde ba ljang // bde ba nag po rgyu mi rgyu// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde// bde ba dngos dang dngos med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod//
173b1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje snying pos gsol pa/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// de yi bde ba bde chen 'dod// rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa yis// bskyed pas dgos pa ci zhig yod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ oM ma byung chub
173b2(rgyud 'grel): sems chen 'di// dang pa'i shugs kyi sku rab tu nyams// lus kyi dngos med gang las byed// bde ba smra bar mi nus// khyab bya khyab bying tshul gyis ni// bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa yin// ji ltar me tog la gnas //
173b3(rgyud 'grel): me tog med phyir shes mi 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs la sogs med pas// bde ba dmigs pa nyid mi 'gyur// dngos de dngos po med pa nga // dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa // gang zhig lce ltos nyer 'tshe dang //
173b4(rgyud 'grel): rmongs pa gang gis bdag mi shes// rje btsu na lha mi'i b+ha gar ni// e yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ bde ba can du rtag tu rgyu// 'chad pa po ngo chos kyang nga // rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa
173b5(rgyud 'grel): dang / sgrub bya 'gro ba'i ston pa nga// 'jig rten 'jig rten pa yang // lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin pa// mchog mtha' dga' bral dang po can// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// de bzhin bus kyang yid ches gyis//
173b6(rgyud 'grel): ston pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan// btsun mo'i b+ha go bde can du// khu bo'i ming gi rnam par gnas// gsungs pa'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis// sngags rgyud sogs dang rnal 'byor la// gang gis he ru ka mi shes/
174a1(rgyud 'grel): de yis ldog par ngal ba'o// de med pas na bde med 'gyur// bde ba med na de med 'gyur// nus med nyid phyir ltos bcas te// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde'o// gang phyir lus las byung bas//
174a2(rgyud 'grel): na/ sgyu zhes brjod par bya ba yin// de phyir sangs rgyas dngos 'gyur min// dngos med tshul du'ang 'gyur nyid min// zhal phyag rnams po gzugs can to// mchog tu dado bas gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun
174a3(rgyud 'grel): lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin lhan ces brjod bya// rnam par dag pa'i sems kyis ni// rang bzhin nyid ni mya ngan 'das// bzhin lag kha dog dbyibs las ni// lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs ni// skye ba tsam gyis rnam par
174a4(rgyud 'grel): gnas// 'on kyang tha mal bag chags las// de'i phyir longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lus myed pas grol ba ma yin te// de ni gang du yang 'dod par bya ba mA yi no// thams cad du stong pa nyid las lhan cig skyes par bshad pa na
174a5(rgyud 'grel): dngos pos grol ba de yang ma yin no// de'i phyir yong de dag gi rnam par grol ba ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje dbyer med pa'i thar pa'i gzugs byang chub kyi sems ma yin no zhes bya bar nges so// de ltar yang klu sbubs zhabs
174a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol bya// dngos po med pas 'gyur ba min// dngos po'i bdag nyid rnam grol te// dngos dang dngos med yongs shes pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis yang rgyud du gsungs pa/ rdo rje snying po
174b1(rgyud 'grel): snying rje che// dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing // dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur// de yongs shes pas grol ba yin// dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas// dngos po bsgom 'gyur shes rab can// dngos
174b2(rgyud 'grel): bo med pa'ang yongs shes pas// he ru ka dpal de ltar bsgom// yang gsungs pa/ shrI yig gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru yig bkod pa dang bral ba// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o//
174b3(rgyud 'grel): de ltar shes nas rnal 'byor pa// gang zhig mnyam bzhag bsgom byed pa// bsod nams zhan pas mi yas kyang // the tshom med par de 'grub po// mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor yang rnal 'byor pa tha ma'i 'o//
174b4(rgyud 'grel): bza' dang btud dang khrus byed dang // sang dam nyams yang bsam par bya// phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas// de las rtag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// zhes pa many+dzum par bzhag pa 'di ni rnal 'byor pa 'bring po'i yin
174b5(rgyud 'grel): no/ chen po'i spyad pa spyod pa rnamaswA kIs// bza' btud d+hI ltar stod pa dang // bgrong dang bgrod myin maM spang zhing // khrus dang gtsang s+thA mi bya ste// grong gi chos ni spyang mi bya/ blo ldan sngags bzla ba nyid
174b6(rgyud 'grel): min/ bsam gton dmigs par bya nyid min// gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste// dbang po rnams ni mi dgag go/ kha la thams cad bza' bar bya// rigs pa la ni mnyam par spyad// dgas po med pa'i sems kyis ni// btsun
175a1(rgyud 'grel): mo thams cad dga' bar bya// grog sA lA dga' bar mi bya zhing // de bzhin gdug lnga zhe sdang min// rdo zhing sa las byung ba yi// lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya// zhes pa la sogs pa
175a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyas par ro// de ltar yang / sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med cing sbyin sreg med// dkyil 'khor pa med dkyil 'khor yang ni med pa ste// de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub de yin sbyin sreg de// de ni dkyil
175a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor pa ste dkyil 'khor yang ni de// mdor bsdus nas ni sems su 'dus pa'i gzugs can no// gzhan du yang gsungs pa/ ji ltar dpa' bo rtog med pas// 'jig rten pa yi gnas bcom nas//
175a4(rgyud 'grel): spyod pa thams cad spyad par bya// de tshe de yi sangs rgyas mthong / zhes pa'o// dpal ldan he ru ka yis rgyud kyi rgyal por gsungs pa'i bla med rim pa lnga// dpal ldan dzA lan d+ha re bzang po'i zhabs kyis bkod/
175a5(rgyud 'grel): dang bla ma'i gsang ba'i bzhed// de thob skal ba bzang la yang dag gzhung byas bsod nams mchog gang thob de las// ma lus sems can phung po'i 'gro bas bla med rim lnga nges par thob par shog/
175a6(rgyud 'grel): dpalce rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs rab tu gsal ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal sgra can gsang ba'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
175b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni tshad med pa'i bsod nams kyi dpal la brten nas/ 'dzam bus mchin pa'i gling gi byang phyogs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po'i srid la mnga' bsgyur zhing / bstan pa chen po che la srid zhu dang // bya ba lhag par bsgrub pa'i
175b2(rgyud 'grel): khur gyi mi ngal ba'i chos kyi rgyal po chen po/ grags pa 'byung gnas rgyal mtshan dpal bzong pos lung stsol zhing / bdag rkyen mdzad nas/ rgyu gar shar phyogs kyi paN+Di te chen po shrI ba na rong+ga zhabs kyi zhal mnga'
175b3(rgyud 'grel): nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba 'gos gzhon nu dpal gyis phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i pho brang chen po sna gdong rtse'i gtsug lag khang du bsgyur ba'o//
176a1(rgyud 'grel): rkyen rna yan lag drug pa'i sbubs thabs bzhugs//
176b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gAr skad du/ Sha T+wA~M ga sA d+ha nA nA ma/ bod skad du/ yan lag drug pA zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs/ kye rnga rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dkyil 'khor sgyu ma la bzhugs chu zla dang mtshungs lha mo brgyad
176b2(rgyud 'grel): kyi bdag/ kye rdo rje rnam thar bsdu dngos de bzhin nyid kyi zhal dang zhabs phyag spyi li// bdud kyi snying ga nyams dga' ba yi gan su sems can den mdzad dgyes// gar mkhan na mkha' lta buHsa dregs par mdzad cing 'gro ba bsgreng ba dang /
176b3(rgyud 'grel): dang por sangs rgyas kyis sbrul sku 'dra ba// skye ba'i chu blo sgrol ba'i thag gcig pa// bla maM la gus phyag 'tshal rtog pa yin// kye yi rdo rje'i rgyud chen rgya mtsho lta bu las// Dom+bi'i zhal sde nas kyi rim parnyed pas// kye rdo rje hrI
176b4(rgyud 'grel): sgrub thabs ni// mi shes sgrib g.yogs mun 'dra ba'i// thur ma 'di ni brtsam par bya// dngos grub kyi ni sems 'di yis// mtshan ma'i dus su rang khyim dang // dur khrod chu 'grum de dag tu// 'jigs pa med par bsam gtan
176b5(rgyud 'grel): bya/ snying gur chu skyes nyi ma de'o// gzugs brnyan hUM las khyad par bsgom// bla ma rdo rje mchod nas ni// bdun po yongasu dag par ni// gau rI la sogs lha mo brgyad// mchod pa yongasu spro bar bya// sdig pa byas pa bshags
176b6(rgyud 'grel): po dang // byed pa yong ni sdom pa dang // bsod nams dag rjes yi rang dang // de dag yongasu bsngo bar bgyi// dkon mchog gsum skyabs 'gro ba dang // byang chub mchog skyabs 'gro ba dang // lom la gnas shing bdag kyang ni//
177a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan gyi don du dbul ba dang // gnang ba gnod dang tshangs pa yi// gnas ni bzhi po'i bsam gtan bya// dang po byams pa bsgom bya zhing // gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom// gsum pa dga' ba bsgo
177a2(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ thams cad tha ma btang snyomaso// yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ni// bsgom zhing 'di ni brjod par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he// stong pad raM skyes hUM dngos la// sna tshogs rdo rje'i bsam gtan bya// 'gro ba'i bdud rnams/
177a3(rgyud 'grel): sel byed pa'i// hUM las gsal bar spro bar bya// oM rAk+Sha rak+Sha hU~M hUM hUM phaT swA hA// yi ge 'di brjod do// 'di waM dzA NAM bskor ba'i glur// bla re yang ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i sa la ni mkha'i dbyings// yaM raM baM laM byung ba'i dkyil 'khor//
177a4(rgyud 'grel): b+h+rUM las 'khor lo'i steng du bzhag/ bar ma'i skyes pa'i bsam gtan bya// 'di ni 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi// 'khor lo 'dra ni lnga pa'o// gcig 'gyur de las sangs rgyas kyi// gzhal yas khang du gyur pa ste// ngos bzhi
177a5(rgyud 'grel): papo la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi ni rnam par brgyan// dra bA dra phyed yang dog ldan// ba spyod gyis shiSh+Tha spos// lha mo brgyad kyim nga nas ni// gsal ba yi ni snam bu yin// 'di ni chu skyes 'dab ma ni// brgyad pa dri zhing phreng ba gcig/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'a/
177a6(rgyud 'grel): la gnas pa'i// bdud bzhi yis ni rnam par brgyan// oM sarba ta thA ga tA la ya badz+ra swa b+ha ba at+ma ko haM// sangs rgyas pho brang bye brag rdzogs// rnam pa lnga po bsgom pa ni// zla ba maM long ye shes te// rta bdun pa ni mnyam pa
177b1(rgyud 'grel): nyid/ lha yi sa bon phyag mtshan ni// so sor rtog pa yin zhes zer// thams cad gcig 'gyur bya nan tan// gzugs brnyan rdzogs pa de chos dbyings// A lI bsgom pa zla ba ste// kA li rta bdun pa yin no// gnyis kyi bar
177b2(rgyud 'grel): na aM dang hUM// de gnyis rdo rje gri gug gyur// zlany+tsi sa bon+da phyag mtshan ni// 'di thams cad gciglo gyur pa// chu dang 'o ma tha dad med// de 'dra'i rdo rje bsam gtan ni// zhal brgyad phyag ni bcu drug pa// 'jigs byed zhabs ni bzhi
177b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// bdag med ma yis phrag nas 'khyud// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin pa'i lha// zla ba'i nor bu kha dog 'od// rtsa ba'i lus mdog g.yon gyi ni// zhal ni dmar dang dkar dang gzhon// glang po D+ha
177b4(rgyud 'grel): bod glang rnga mo// mi dang seng ge de byi la// gAyas pa thod pa brgyad pa ni// dang po glang po rim shes bya// gzhi dang chu gnas rlung dang ni// me zla de n+yas snang byed dang // phyin mthar byed dang nor sbyin ni// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o//
177b5(rgyud 'grel): lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis mo// gnag cing gyen du bsgreng ba ser// gri gug tha~Md pa kha T+wAM ga/ 'dzin cing stag+na lpags sham thabs can// oM pad+ma su kha d+hA ra ma hA ri ga su khaM dat+tA tsa tu/ A nan+da b+ha ga bi sha hUM hUM hUM/ kaur+yaM ku ru
177b6(rgyud 'grel): oM dz+ram dra macar/ oM na ma ga she ga ma khakan / ku mu ma/ oM sa~M rba ta thA ga ta ma nun maN na to/ mo'i skyes thams mnanas// gapa'i khrim
178a1(rgyud 'grel): lo spro/ rdo rje rjesu chags byed pas// rgyal ba'i khu ba rje su 'gyur// sa bon brgyad du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thig le de// gaM tsa baM g+haM paM saM laM DaM/ lha me'i sa bon dbyung ba'o// gau rI
178a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang shin chom rkun ma// ro langs mA ni chu bdag gnas// g+hasma rI ni gsus po che// de bzhin puk+ka sI dbang ldan// ri khrod ma ni byin za'i grwa/ gtum mo bden bral la gnas te// g.yung mo 'di ni rlung gnas na//
178a3(rgyud 'grel): lha mo 'khor lo rdzogs pa'o// ho gnyis dbus su gnas pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge ste// 'di ni bar ma'i sems can ming // lha mo'i pad+mar bsam gtan bya// khar ma mnyam par 'jug pa ni// khu bo'i ngo bos rje su dran// /
178a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshams kyis lha mo bskul ba ste// de nas dbyangs kyi bskul bar bya// snying rje'i yid kyi bla med bzhengs// puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni// bdag la 'dod pa'i bde chen sbyor// khyed mi bzhugs
178a5(rgyud 'grel): na bdag 'gum pas// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// ri khrod ma 'bras grub par ni// kye rdo rje khyed bzhengs shig/ 'jig rten phyir smon 'dod pa'i gtso// ci phyir stong pa'i ngang las bzhugs// khyod mi bzhugs na phyogs mi
178a6(rgyud 'grel): khums// gtum mo bdag ni gsol ba 'debs// g.yung mo bdag ni yid rmongs pas// snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad par// bdag gis khyod kyis thugs 'tshal gyis// khyod ni mig 'phrul lta bur bzhangs// bskul ba'i
178b1(rgyud 'grel): gyu/ bskul bas sngon gyi byang chub kyi// smon lam rjes su dran pa'o// khu ba'i gzugs las bzhengs pa ni// aM dang hUM gnyis rdo rje che// zhal brgyad zhabs ni bzhi pa ste// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam
178b2(rgyud 'grel): pA ra mAnan pA ste// phyed bcas pa yi gur mkhan nI// mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal byas// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// rtsa ba'i zhal nI nag po che// g.yas pa ku mu to dang mtshungs// g.yon pa dmar po chen po 'jigs/
178b3(rgyud 'grel): phyi ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// spyan+da ni nyi shu rtsa bzhis phyug/ bdag med ma la bde ba ster// glang po rta bong glong rnga mo// mi dang seng ge de byi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad po ni// dang po glang po rim shes bya// gzhi dang chu
178b4(rgyud 'grel): grinas rlung dang ni// me zla de nas snang byed dang // phyi mthar byed dang nor sbyin ni// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// go rI kha dog nag po'o// chom rkun ma ni btsong dang mtshungs// ro langs ma nI gser bsrog mdog/ g+hus+t+ra
178b5(rgyud 'grel): d+hi ni mUrka Ni mtshungs// khrak+ka s+t+rai nI dbang sngon mo// re khrod mo ni zla nor 'di// gtum mo nA mkha'i lhung gu ste// g.yung mo sna tshogs pa ru 'dod// go r+t+ti g.yas na gri gug ste// g.yon nA nya ni de bzhin// chom rkun ma g.yas ci
178b6(rgyud 'grel): te'uste// g.yon na phag pa de bzhin no// ro langs ma g.yas ru sbal te// g.yon pa'i lag pa thod po'i// za phod ma yis g.yas ni// g.yon pa'i lag na thod pa'o// puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste// g.yon pa'i phyag
179a1(rgyud 'grel): na dgra sta 'dzin// ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon pa na ni gsil byed shes// gtum mo g.yas ni 'khor lo ste// g.yon na thod pa de bzhin no// g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje ste// g.yon na sdig
179a2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub de bzhin no// skyil krung byed pa'i gar gyis gnas// gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis shes// spyan gsum skra ni gyen du yin// phyag rgya lnga yis shin tu mdzes// tshangs pa dbang po shin tu nye dbang drag/ gshin rje nor gyi bdag
179a3(rgyud 'grel): bopo dang // bden bral dang ni thags bzang rigs// gau rI la sogs pa yi gdarA// thams cad rdo rje 'di yis ni// rang sngags yi ge rdzogs pa dang // phyag rgya phyag mtshan gyur pa las// snying gar ye shes bsam gtan bya/
179a4(rgyud 'grel): rang snying pad nyir hUM rdo rje// hUM ye shes sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i snying // pad nyir gnas pa'i hUM rdo rje// hUM ye shes rje su bsam pa'o// dam tshig 'khor lo la mnyam thim// ye shes 'khor lo chen po 'bar// sangs

179a6(rgyud 'grel): pa ga ti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum bsam// mig gnyis rdo rje gti mug ma// rna gnyis zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sna ni ser sna rdo rje ma// mkha' la 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yid
179b1(rgyud 'grel): bdag med rnal 'byor ma// ming gi yi ge dang pos bskyed// phyag gnyis zhal gcig bzang po yi// gri grag thod pa lag na bcas// sna tshogs mdog can ro yi gdan// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas su ni// oM AHhUM ni 'di
179b2(rgyud 'grel): yi sngags// 'di las mkha' spyod sa spyod ma// zhabs 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// rnal 'byor ma ni rigs gsum dngos// rang snying sa bor khyad par spro// lcags kyu'i gzugs

179b4(rgyud 'grel): gzugs byas nas ni// bdud rtsi lnga yis chus gang ba'i// bum pa nyid kyi phyag gis bsnams// blugs te dbang bskur mtha' ru 'di'i// rtsa ba'i mi bskyed phyag rgya'o// de ni yang ne gau nI dang // prak+ka sI 'di phyag rgya'o//

179b6(rgyud 'grel): bya'i bdud rtsi'i ro myong bar byed pa la/ rdo rje nas kyi 'bru tsam bsams te/ dpal kye rdo rje brtag pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mr-i taM sa badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko taM/ ye shes ma tshang pa sna tshogs sogs/ lha mo 'di brgyad ma
180a1(rgyud 'grel): pa ni/ spro zhing 'khor lo'i bdag po ni// 'khor lo'i bdag nyid pas sngon mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga tA pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rnal 'byor ma ni de dag gis// 'khor lo'i gtso bo la bstod
180a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rnams bskor// nyid kyi thugs kyi khyod dgongs grub// khyod ni rgyu dang mi rgyu 'khor ba kun sgrub pa// snying rje'i thugs kyi sems can byang chub tu// kun rdzob sgyu mas byang chub sgrub pa'i yid// dgyes
180a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i shrI he ru ka rdo rje bstod// oM sarba tA thA ga tA stu staM badz+ra swa b+hA ba~M At+ma ko haM/ rdo rje rje su chags byed dang / sangs rgyas gzhal med bye brag bsgom// dbang bskur bdud rtsi myang ba dang // mchod pa bstod pa yan lag drug/
180a4(rgyud 'grel): yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor gang // des ni myur du dngos grub thob// pho byang sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad// dbong ni mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs// bdud rtsi myong ba 'od dpag med// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan dpal//
180a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa don yod yang dag mchod// rjes chags rdo rje sems dpa'o// dngos grub 'di ni nye ba yi// yan lag drug gis bskyed pa ni// dang sprin dang 'dra ba mthong // gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba ste// gsum pa glog gi rnam par/
180a6(rgyud 'grel): bani pa mar me 'bar ba dang // lnga pa thams cad snang ba ste// sprin med na mkha' 'dra ba'o// phyis ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtshungs// rmi lam snang ba skad cig go// lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga
180b1(rgyud 'grel): bsregs te// spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pa// bsregs pas haM las ri bong 'byung // bsam gtan mAM nus rnal 'byor gang // don ni dag pa rje su dran// snying rje can ni dmar po ste/ yan lag nag po byams pa'i
180b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs// bsdu de'i dngos po bzhi po ni// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// zhal brgyad rnam par thar bA yin// bcu drug phyag ni stong pa ste// phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas yin// khro bo gdug pa 'dul ba po// spyan gsum/
180b3(rgyud 'grel): bo ni sku gsum mo// rus pa bden pa bzhi po'o// gzugs ni rdo rje ma yin te// tshor ba gsang ba'i gau rI ma// de bzhin chu ma 'du shes phung // 'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rnam shes 'di ni bdag med ma// don
180b4(rgyud 'grel): dmya la ni spang ba med// de nAM yA nu lag drug tu 'gyur// skye sargyu drug ni dag pa yi// zhe sdang rdo rje rdo rje ma// rdo rje rol mo 'bab yin// drag dog rdo rje ma de bzhin// gar+b+he mug rdo rje mya yang ni// yin te rdo rje ma
180b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ma// ser sna gsang ba'i go n+ti mya// yid la bdag med rnal 'byor mA// sa ni puk+ka sI ru bats+tshed// chu rnams ri khrod mA zhes zer// drod ni gtum por shes par bya// rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu badz+rod// gzugs
180b6(rgyud 'grel): ni gau rIr yang dag bshad// sgra ni chom rkun ma rab bshad// so ma'i dri ni ro langs ma// ro yi tshul ni za phod ma// reg byas spyod ma zhes brjod// chos kyi khams ni mkha' spyod pa// sa ni dang por nor sbyin maH
181a1(rgyud 'grel): phyug po thams cad sa 'grub pa'o// glang po lnga sogs 'dzin pa ni// nad nI nye bar zhi ba'o// glu dang dbugs dang de bzhin skyo// khrag skyugs mdze nadA be rdzi kra/ mtsher ba mtshan pa rang
181a2(rgyud 'grel): gzugs ni// glang po la sogs rab tu brjod// ni rang suM 'amA gzhan las ni// bsamya gtan sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// aM aSh+mA na nA ya pi ga ur+N+Na ke sha wa d+ha ma ne tsa turbi sha ti/ naM tA ya sho Da sha b+hu dza ya/
181a3(rgyud 'grel): kr-iSh+Na dzA mA ta wa pu She ka pA la mA lA ne kau d+ha ri Ne A d+ha ma tA krU ra tsit+tA ya an+d+ran+ta daMSh+Ti Ni/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA rA yAM kA ra ya/ gardza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza yA tAr+N+Na ya/ she Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rAn/ ban
181a4(rgyud 'grel): d+ha ban d+h+waM/ nA ga any+dza kAn+da/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na sha tAM/ ha hA hi hI hU~M d+hA hAM tAM rtiH/ ho haHphaT sAd+ha/ bar chad thams cad nyor zhi'i phyir// gtor ma N+yan tu sbyin par bya// oM In+ta dza ma dza la dzak+Sha b+hA ta bad+d+hi ba A rASh+Ta tsan+na sa?
181a5(rgyud 'grel): me ta bap+pa ta laM aSh+Ta sad+d+hi ai daM ba liM b+h+r-i dza dzaM g+haM phuwa~M d+hU paM mAM sa piM ga am+b+ha sap+pa kadz+dza sA da/ khan+ti khu N+Di/ pe TA ga da/ oM a kA re mu khaM sarbo d+har+m+ma NAM/ Ad+ho nut+pan+na tAta oM AHhUM phaT sAd+d+ha/ lha ma'i rgyud kyi pad+ma meng po na
181a6(rgyud 'grel): bla ma zhi bas nyi ma'i 'od kyis phye// mi thub zla bas sbrang rtsi gzhi bla 'thungs pas// sgrubs pa'i thabs ni sbrang rtsi skyugs pa'o// dpal gyi thugs rje'i stobs kyis sgrubs thabs byas// 'di las ngal bar gyur pa'i
181b1(rgyud 'grel): bsod nams gang // des thob skye ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i// theg pa 'gro ba sgrol ba'i rgyur gyur cig/ yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs shes bya ba// slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa rdzogaso//
181b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma dam pas bka' stsal pa// dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis// yan lag drug pa'i sgrub thabs 'di// shAkya dkon mchog bdag med la// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad phyir// nus pas bsgyur ba gang yod pa//
181b3(rgyud 'grel): kyai rdo rje'i sgrub thob shog// r+g+ha gar g+haM mkhan pau rat+na shrI dz+nyA na~M zhalA sta nas dang / dge slong shAkyaye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
181b4(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ su pa ri gra ha nA ma maN+Da laM bi kA d+hi d+hi/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i sgrub thabs bzang po yongasu bzung ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo//
181b5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba 'jigs pa'i mo 'byung nas dang mya ngan phreng ba'i 'ong 'phro bar// ltung ba chu bur nad 'gyur bzlog dkas 'gro ba nyam thug zhi bya'i phyir/ snying rje bdud rtsi'i cher gyis chus pang 'gro la byams pa'i chu bam
181b6(rgyud 'grel): gang 'di kun tu rab 'bab sangs rgyas bcom ldan de la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyud kun don gyi cho ga ni// rgyas par rig pa yong min to// rgyod kun don gyi cho ga ni// bsgrub par nus pa ma yin no// de phyir tha snyad
182a1(rgyud 'grel): tsam gyis ni// rjes 'jug spros pa ma yin no// dkyil 'khor cho ga bdag gis ni// legs par bsdu ba 'di brtsa mo// slob dpon rnyed dang bkur ma 'phrogs// bya ba mkhas shing dkyil 'khor
182a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong // bya ba mkhas shing dkyil 'khor mthong // sgrub sbrul legs par bsngags pa yis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// zhi dang rgyas dang rabs gnas sogs// 'dod pa'i don ni byed nus pa'i// slob ma
182a3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis sam gsum gyi ba// dkyil 'khor bri phyir gsol ba gdab// tshogs 'phel ba dang bgegs zhi'i phyir// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam shes pa'i// sngon du bsnyen par bya ba yin// bsnyen pa med na 'grub mi
182a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur// gnas kyi bye brag rig pa yis// 'phrol du dben par 'dug nas ni// lha yi 'khor lo bsgom por bya// dub na de yis grusang sngags bzlas// 'khor lo can gyi sngags 'bum bzlas// rang gi lhag pa'i
182a5(rgyud 'grel): lha yis 'bum// gzhan rnams kyi ni khri nyid de// dngos grub mtshan ma mchog thob nas// rang gI lus la dkyil 'khor bsdu// 'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod// sngon du bsnyen pa'o// bsnyen pas bgegs kyi
182a6(rgyud 'grel): chags bcom ste// sa yongasu bzung bar bya// ri bo grong dang grong khyer dang // sa phyogs yid ni dga' ba ru// rus pa thal ba zug rngu rdo// bshang bas me dag gzhan du bgrod// A dr-i m+bA ra n+ya gro a shwat+ma//
182b1(rgyud 'grel): pal sha dang bag+ha lAdz+nyA na// wAn pa ru sbrul rgyu ba dang lpa bA mo// sa nI drug po rnam par spang bar bya// chu ni g.yus 'khor ba dang // shar dang byang du gzhol ba'i sa// zur ni bzhi ste dkar 'dra ba// brkos nas des bkang
182b2(rgyud 'grel): lhag gyur pa'o// sngags pa rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// snying rjes gang ba'i yid dang bcas// g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul gyis gnas// bgegs rnams thams cad bsal bar bya// khru phyed brkos nas chu yis bkang //
182b3(rgyud 'grel): gom pa brgyang ru 'gro bar bya// myur du 'ong nas blta bya ste// de bzhin 'dug na lhag par sngags// dor nI sa bdag zhing skyong ba// la sogs la ni gtor ma sbyin// des na sngags dang phyag rgyu ru// bcas pas sa sa
182b4(rgyud 'grel): ni bslang bAr byA// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// gAny+dzi ga mtshams kyi 'thu' ru gzung // sa bzang po 'di dag stsol cig/ ces pas bslang bar+ya byA ba yin// oM hUM badz+ra s+yAt+t+ra// sa bslang ba'o sngags dang phyag rgya'o//
182b5(rgyud 'grel): dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma dang // rjes mthun phyi de'i nyi ma la// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bya ba 'am// yang na bgegs rnams gzhom par bya// sa 'dzin lta bar brtan pa'i blos// srung ba'i 'khor los ste legs
182b6(rgyud 'grel): bsrung // pus mo lte ba rked tsam du// dngos grub rjes mthun brko bar bya// dgun zlo ra ba la sogs nas// brtsams te zla ba gsum gsum du// lto 'phye lho dang nub dang byang // shar du de yi mgo bo ste//
183a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa'i zur gyis nyal ba yin// 'di yi lto ba shes nas brko// mgo bo rgyab sogs nas brkos pa'i// skyon ni rgyas pa las shes bya// dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i sa brko ba
183a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga'o// phub ma rdo dang gseg ma dang // sol ba la sogs dor byas te// rin chen 'bru sman+da nang du gzhug/ shin tu 'thas parA brdung byar bya// zug rngu'i nyes pa thams cad ni// gal te bsal bar ma nus
183a3(rgyud 'grel): na/ lag pas mnan+da te gsang sngags bzla'o// de nyid stobs ldan dag par 'gyur// oM ha na haM na kr-i d+ha hUM phaT/ sa sbyangs pa'i sngagaso// dri chus gtor cing dag pa yis// sa 'di yongs su gzung bar
183a4(rgyud 'grel): byAbya/ mtshan mo lnga ni 'chang pare// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// nu ma gnyis ni mdun gzhag nas// thams cad kun ni bskrad byas te// de rjes sar ni 'jug par bya//
183a5(rgyud 'grel): oM a pa sa ran+d+ha b+ha ban+to yi ge tsad+d+hA na swa mi na/ dwe ba nA ga/ yak+Sha gan d+ha ba b+hU ta/ b+hU tI nI/ DA ki ni/ satwAn+da kr-I yA pA raM bA ga tsha traM si gr-i me wan+tu/ oM hUM phaT/ bskrad pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sa
183a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhi ra ba dang / dra ba dag dang bla raM dang // mnga' yi dra ba phyi rol tu// mo ri yong ni byin gyis brlabs// oM me dI naM badz+ra b+ha ba badz+ra ban d+ha nAM/ oM badz+ra prA ka ra hUM baM hUM/ oM badz+ra pany+tsa ra ts+tsha oM hUM/ oM badz+ra
183b1(rgyud 'grel): bi d+ha na hUM khaM hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ra dz+wa la traM s+t+waM traM/ oM badz+ra dz+wA la a na lAr+tha hUM hUM hUM/ oM suM b+hA ni suM b+ha hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM phaT/ oM gr-ih+NA pa yu gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga wAn badz+rA rA dza hUM hUM phaT/ oM g+ha
183b2(rgyud 'grel): g+ha/ g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+TAM big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ oM kI lA ya kI la yau sarba pA pa hUM phaT/ oM hUM hUM hUM badz+rA kI la yai badz+ra d+ha r-I dz+nyo pa ya ti/ sarba big+h+na kA ya bAk+Shit+taM badz+ra kI la ya kI laM ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hUM mung+ga ra~M badz+ra kI lA ya~M/
183b3(rgyud 'grel): A kaM Ta ya hUM phaT/ sngags tshigs grub pa 'di rnams kyis// 'bar ba'i me yis phyi rol tu// khro bo'i rnam pA'i phur bu ni// lugasu 'byung dang lugs min pas// bgegs rnams kyi ni spyi bor gdab// phu ri bo la
183b4(rgyud 'grel): sogs cho ga'o// rdo rje dril bu la sogs kyi// de nyid rnams dang mchod yon sogs// cho ga rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni// sgro sbyong las kyi rdo rje gdab// sdor mo brgyud pa nas brtsams te// nyi shu'i bar du grangs mnyam bya//
183b5(rgyud 'grel): gser dang 'dzin mar sogs byung ba'i// rdo rje rnam par gsum ni gzung // rtse gsum pa dang rtse lnga pa// rtse dgu pa ste rnam pa gsum// zhi dang ma zhi rab phye bas// yang ni rnam pa gnyisu brjod// bzhi pa sna tshogs
183b6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje nyid// rtse mo lnga pa gdong bzhi yin// dbus ma bzung ba'i gnas yin te// mtha' ma'i rtse mo de yi tshang // dbus ma'i ro ni nas gzugs mtshungs// phyogs kyi cha las ma 'das pas// tha ma chu srin ma
184a1(rgyud 'grel): nga'i tshe// chu srin kha nas byung ba yin// rtsa sbom rtse mo byin gyis phra// rno zhing rim gyis mgo bo gug/ rwa rnams kyi ni nang gi char// dbus kyi ra dang bar mtshams bya// rdo rje rje su mthun pA ru// sor ma
184a2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis bya bskyed bri bya// rtse mo phun tshun mnyam bya zhing // dbu ma las ni cung zod thung // rwa brgyad rtsa ba'i yan lag tu// pad+ma kha bye pad+ma brtag/ dbus kyi cha las zad tsam// lhag par ska rigs bya ba yin// phan tshun
184a3(rgyud 'grel): mnyam pa'i lhag ma ni// rim gyis nyis 'gyur mthon po yin// chu skyes 'dab brgyad mdzes pa yis// dA go dang zhabasu phreng ba gnyis// zhes bya ba 'di ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do// dbus su rnam snang mi bskyod pa// shar
184a4(rgyud 'grel): yin de bzhin rin chen ldor/ nub dang byang gau rA dag la// 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad dag pa// pad+ma 'dob brgyad 'dab ma la// byang chub sems dpa' brgyud yin te// mtshan
184a5(rgyud 'grel): ma gsal sa bar bya// phyag na pad+mo byams pa dang // na mkha'i mdzod dang bzang ba'i gsungs// gnod sbyin bdag po 'jam pa'i dpal// sgrib pa sel dang sa snying nyid// dbu ma kun gyi bzhir gnas te// sangs
184a6(rgyud 'grel): ras snying po za ma gtog/ rdo rje lcags sgrog sgrol ma'o// mtshamasu skul byed rin chen grog/ lu gu rgyud ma gzhan mi thub// pad+ma'i mkha' 'gro ma ru gsungs// ro la yang dag gnas brjod pa// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'a
184b1(rgyud 'grel): ma/ byang du 'jigs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma// nub tu ro langs mar shes bya// lho ru gtum mo dran par bya// dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje'i de nyid 'dir 'dod do// dril bu kun tu cha drug la// de yi cha bzhi 'khar
184b2(rgyud 'grel): ba yi/ rang bzhin ma 'dres par la bya// gzhan ni gzhan las brtag par bya// dril bu de yi nang gi mkha'// zheng dang mchu ru mnyam pa yin// phreng ba ut+pal mtshan ma brgyud// steng dbus su rim pa ji bzhin du//
184b3(rgyud 'grel): cho gas 'dab ma brgyad mtshan pa// ut+pal steng gi cha gcig la// phreng ba gsum gnas de steng du// bum pa gser ram zangs ma 'am// dngul lam ra gan la byas pa'o// de yi steng du de tshad tsam// shar bltas
184b4(rgyud 'grel): shes rab gdong pa bya// gdong steng rdo rje phyed pa ste// sngon gyi rdo rje phyed lta bu// de ltar sor brgyad laM sogs pa'i// dril bu rdo rje'i rjes mthun bya// cung zad chu skyes khwa phyo ba'i// khar gyur yang ni ba lang mchu// zhes bya ba
184b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni dril bu'i mtshan nyid do// phyogs mtshams brgyad du blto bya ba// lha rnams sa bon rnam par bsgom// shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste// gos dkar mo ni byang du yin// nub tu mA ma kIr shweswA bya// lho ru sangs rgyas
184b6(rgyud 'grel): spyan ma'o// mdog bzangs dmar dang 'od can ma// rdo rje phreng ma mtshoms nyid do// nang na gnas pa'i nam mkha' ni// gzugs med pa'i khams dag pa'o// gzugs khams rnam par dag pa 'di'o// ut+pal rtsa ba kho
185a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba/ shes rab bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i gzhi// steng gi mu skyes rdo rje ni// rdo rje lta bur rnam par bsam// dbus kyi dbyug pa ye shes te// thams cad sdud cing
185a2(rgyud 'grel): spro bar byed// pad+ma'i bskor ba rnam pa lngas// gnas brgyad rnamasu dkrol bar bya// zhes bya ba 'di ni dril bu'i de kho na nyid do// gser sogs rdzas dang mchod sbyin shing // yang na nim pa'i shing las ni// dgang
185a3(rgyud 'grel): gzar ring tshad khru do ba// de yi dbye bar bshad par bya// chu zheng sor mo brgyad pa la// khung bu de phyed mnyam pa brko// brkos pa dang mnyam rdo rje bruM// kha ni pad+ma'i 'dab ma mtshungs// mu khyud kyang ni gru bzhi ste// kun tu
185a4(rgyud 'grel): sor me bzhi yin no// ser gnyis brkos pa de tshong la// rdo rje rtse gsum pa nang ngu// 'di yi khu bcud 'dzag pa yi// bu ga mthe'u chung ched tsam yin// ske rags 'og tu de yi tshang // mdzes pa 'dab ma dag gi
185a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas// skye byed me trog dang mtshungs pa// yu ba'i mgo bo dag tu bya// yu 'og sor gnyis rin po che// tha mar rdo rje sor drug pa zhes bya ba 'di ni// dgang gzar gyi mtshan nyid de// phyed bcas khru gang blugs gzar
185a6(rgyud 'grel): du/ shes bya 'di yi kha sor drug/ chu skyes 'dab ma'i rnam pa mtshungs// de yis dbus su zheng zabs su// sor gsum bru bya de tshad tsam// rtse lnga pa yi rdo rje mdzes// sor gnyis mdzes par byed pa'i gnas//
185b1(rgyud 'grel): rin chen sor cig shes par bya// dgang gzar yu ba chang pa yis// gzung bar 'dod pa'i tshad tsam yin// cung zad phra ba blug gzar gyis// rdo rje sor gsum bya ba'o// 'di ni blugs gzur gyi mtshan nyid do// gser dang
185b2(rgyud 'grel): dngul dang nya phyis rung // rdo dang shing dang zangs ma'i snod// 'di dag mtshang yon stong yin te// mthar yang 'dab ma'i snad sbyar bya// mchod yon gyi snod bstan pa yin no// dri yi chu dang 'o ma mngar// chu gtsang
185b3(rgyud 'grel): me tog dkar po rnams// ji ltar rnyed snod nang bzhig ste// spos bdug gsung sngags mngon par bzlas// 'di ni mchod yon grub po'i cho gA'o// dkar baM ser po dmar po ljang // zhi dang rgyas sogs sgrub pa la//
185b4(rgyud 'grel): las dang rje su mthun pa'i dri// chu la sogs pa de bzhin sbyar// mchod yon gyi dbye ba'i cho ga'o// me tog spros dang mar me dang // dwi yi dung sogs g.yasu bzhag/ g.yon du sngags kyi mchod yon snod// mdu
185b5(rgyud 'grel): du yang ni snod bzhag bya// mchod yon gyi snod la sogs pa dgod pa'o// yi ge gsum mam yi ge lnga// ji ltar rgyud du bstan pa'i sngags// ji ltar las kyi rjes 'thun par// mchod yon la sogs sngags
185b6(rgyud 'grel): su bya/ zhi la mtha' ru b+ha shaM ste// rgyas la mtha' mo bo ShaT ste// gsang la hUM phaT tha' mar ste// dgug dang dbang li dza dang hriH/ mched yon la sogs pa'i sngags yin no// dang por dri chu sbyin par bye//
186a1(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pA la ni 'o ma mngar// gsum pa nyid la chu gtsang ste// bzhi par me tog sbyar bar bya// gsum du kha yis dri yis chu// zhabs rtsa dag la dbul bar bya// e nI ri ti hUM khaM zhabs
186a2(rgyud 'grel): bsil gyi sngagaso// 'thor 'thung la ni 'o ma dang // mngar ba yin no bsang gtor ni// chu gtsang 'ba' zhigI ku sha yau// chun po mchod yon sngags bzla'o// oM sar+b+ba saM sho d+ha ni hUM phaT/ zhal bsil dang bsang gtor
186a3(rgyud 'grel): gyis sngags so// ye shes dkar pos me tog ni// blangs nas mtha' sogs rim gyis dbye// zhabs bsil zhal bsil bzed zhal ni// chos zangs sngam ni lcags kyi snong // gser dang dngul sogs rdzas gzhan lA// /
186a4(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'i snod ni man 'jir bzhag/ zhabs bsil la sogs pa'i rAb tu dbye ba'o// zhabs bsil zhal bsil bsang gtor sogs// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar byi// 'di kun mchod yon an lag phyir//
186a5(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon skyu ru bshung pa yin// mchod yon dbul ba'i cho ga'i rim// khu tshur mnyam pA ra dam bcings te// gung mo gnyis brkyang rtse mo sbyar// Ar+g+haM chen po rab tu bstan/ oM pra tIts+tsha ar+g+ha hUM swA hA/ mtsha
186a6(rgyud 'grel): yon dbul ba'i sngagaso dang phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil sngags yungs kar bzla// khu tshur gnyis kyis 'dod lha la// rang gi bskor bas rab bskor te// gnyis gnyis bar du sbyang bar bya// cig car khu tshur gnyis
186b1(rgyud 'grel): dag gis// g.yas su bskor bar yang bya'o// sngon bzhin yungs kar me snod la// sbyang bar bya phyir gzhugs par bya// oM sar+b+ba pa paM da ha na bAdz+rA ya badz+ra satwa s+ya sar+b+ba pA paM da hA swA hA/ 'di ni sbyang ba'i cho ga'o// ye
186b2(rgyud 'grel): shes rnam shes nang bcug ste// snyim pos chu ni blang byas nas// de bzhin bskor ti sbrang phyir mi ra// yungs kar bzhin du gzhug par bya// oM hUM ta ti phaT/ nye reg gi cho ga'o// zla 'od in+d+ra nI la dang // bu sha rA
186b3(rgyud 'grel): ga dmar nor bu// marka ta mchog ste de rnams kyi// phye ma rin chen rdul mtshon mchog/ gser dang dngul dang mu tig dang // rgyal po 'khyil pa byi ru rnams// 'di dag rin chen lnga ru bshad// yal ga lnga po bshad
186b4(rgyud 'grel): par bya// 'dzam bu dang ni ka dam pa// bil ba dang ni a mra dang // bi dza pA ra las byung ba'o// til dang gro dang sran ma 'bras// nAs rnams 'bru lngar shes par bya// ha sa de ba kra bi ra// kre taM dza li br-i hA pa la/
186b5(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag sman bzhir shes par bya// lnga pa kar ni ka yin no// kat+ta ka ri bri hA ti/ ha sa de ba ha sa dang // se te a pa ra dzi dang // 'di dag cig shr-Is sman gyi tshogs// tsan dan gnyis dang gur gum dang // la ku drAnra
186b6(rgyud 'grel): thi ka dang lnga// 'di dag dri lngar bstan pa ste// lha la khrus gsol bshad pa yin// u dum+ba ra shi ri Sha// a shwat+tha dang n+ya gro d+ha// pa ra ka ti yi shun pags lngas// lha khrus gsol ba'i mar khu gsal// ba mi
187a1(rgyud 'grel): mar dang lci ba chu// zho dang 'o ma yang dag bsres// 'di dag pa yi ltar shes bya// lha rnams khrus gsol sgrub pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// yang dag mnyis
187a2(rgyud 'grel): par bya ba ste// rtag tu dam tshig rig pa yis// dam tshig mchod pas mchod par bya// glu ni rdo rje can la dbul// gar ni sangs rgyas rnams la 'bul// hi ra mchog la de bzhin dri// 'jig rten rje la bza' dang btung //
187a3(rgyud 'grel): gos kyi mchod pa rta mchog pa 'di dag de cig mchog yin// hUM dzaM las byung ba yi dri// a ka ru nag he ru ka tsan dan dkar po rtag pa la// dmar po 'jog rten rje la dbul// kha che rdo rje snang ba la// bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad do//
187a4(rgyud 'grel): khA dang tsha ba rdo rjer dbul// mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa laM// sgyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la// de bzhin lan tsha 'jig rten rjer// rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam// bska ba rab tu brtag par bya// shing byung me tog nag mdzes pa// kye
187a5(rgyud 'grel): yi rdo rje 'chang ba la'o// ma laM ka dang ma la ti// kun de rtag tu sangs rgyas dbul// shing dbang mchog dang dri med pa// snang byed la ni dbul bar bya// ut+pal dmarA pau chu skyes dang // ban+du dmar po pya ta la//
187a6(rgyud 'grel): pad+ma gar gyi dbang la dbul// thams cad rdo rje rta mchog la'o// rang gi lha yi sbyar byas te// mi mthun phyogs bskrad nges pa yis// sa yis dbus su 'dug nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdas
187b1(rgyud 'grel): ji srid 'khor lo yongs rdzogs par// bdag cag bskyang bar bya ba'i phyir// sna 'di byin gyis brlabs pa ni// bde bar gshegs pas dang nyid 'os// 'gal ba'i sems can rtsom pa'i cho gas// mkhas pa khros
187b2(rgyud 'grel): pas rnam par gzhol// g.yas dang g.yon gyi mig dag la// ma las nyi ma Ta las zla// rkang 'og rdo rje spro ba yin// 'od zer rnams kyis klu sogs bsgrags// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan paste/
187b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje gsor ba rol byed cing // gnas rnams ni dril bu gdungs// rgyun tu 'thug pa'i hrI sgra sgrogs// mkhas pas g.yasu bskor byas te// phyogs bzhi rnams su yongs su bskor// 'gyur dang bcas shing
187b4(rgyud 'grel): sgosgeg pa mchog/ dang por rol bcas rjes rgyu bas// rkang stobs brgyad du cho ga yis// rdo rje gom pas gar bya'o// me tog snyim pa'i sbyor ba bya// spros la yol ba'i sbyor ba nyid// mAr me steng du'i lag tshul dang // dbyug pa'i
187b5(rgyud 'grel): tshul gyi byug pa dang // lag pas mig dang de bzhin na// rlung pa zung gis g.yas phyogs// bskor te phyog rdob sbyor ba yi// de bzhin du yang g.yon du bskor// de nas rgyun gyi gar byas te// der rjes bskyed pa'i gar bya/
187b6(rgyud 'grel): myur bdebs de bzhin gar byas te// 'khor lo lta bur 'khor bar bya// g.yas borkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang / zlum po dang / sna tshogs spyod pa dang /
188a1(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi rkang stabs dang / bung ba phur pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni/ rkang stabs brgyad do// rgya mtsho bskyod pa dang / ri bo 'degs pa dang / mdzes pa'i goms pa dang / khro bo'i gom pa ste rkang
188a2(rgyud 'grel): stabs kyi bkod pa'o// rdo rje'i tshul dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / rin po che'i tshul dang / pad+ma'i tshul dang / ral gri'i tshul dang / mdung gi tshul dang / gzhu'i tshul dang / dbyug pa'i tshul dang / tho ba'i tshul dang / gtun
188a3(rgyud 'grel): shing gi tshul dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang / kha bcu pa'i tshul dang / ral gri'i phru gu'i tshul dang / sna tshogs dbyig pa'i tshul dang / mdung thung gi tshul dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni tshul
188a4(rgyud 'grel): bcu drug go/ ba dan gnyis pa dang / ba dan gsum pa dang / me tog gi tshul dang / spos kyi tshul dang / mar mA'i tshul dang / dwi'i tshul dang / lA s+ye'i lag pa dang / phreng ba'i ldag pa dang / glu'i lag bA dang /
188a5(rgyud 'grel): gar gyi lag pa dang / gling bu'i lag pa dang / rdza rnga'i lag pa dang / mu kuNAM'i lag pa dang / bya ba mtha' yas pa'i lag pa'i bgrod pa'o// rdo rje'i dkyil dkrung dang / sems dpa'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i skyil
188a6(rgyud 'grel): krung dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / skyil krung phyed pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs te 'dug stangs kyi bkod pa'o// sgeg pa'i ro dang / dpa' bo'i ro dang / mi sdug pa'i ro dang / drog po'i ro dang / 'jigs
188b1(rgyud 'grel): s+yAskyu rAdu bA'i ro dang / zhi ba'i r-I dang / rngam pa'i ro dang / snying rje'i ba'i ro zhes bya ba nI gyir gyi ro dgu'o// tha hi tha hI/ thA ga tha gA/ thu ma thu ma/ tha mA tha ma/ tho ho tho ho// tse hI tse hi/ d+ha d+haM d+hA d+h+waM/ kra ka kra ka/ tha kA tha ka/
188b2(rgyud 'grel): DoMDo hi Da hi/ ta Ta wa tA Ta wa/ traM/ cang te'u cha lang rnga rings dang // rtswa rnga phyed po de bzhin no// gling bu pi ldir yang de bzhin// pi wang rgyud mangs rgyud gcig pa// rnam gsum dbye bas brdung bar bya// ngal ba drag po myur
188b3(rgyud 'grel): paba'o// dkyil 'khor la sogs gnas rnamasu// mchod pa 'di ni bla na med// 'di dag ni rol mo'i bkod pa yin no// drug gi rjes su skyes pa'i glu dang / drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang / sa 'dzin gyi rjes kyi glu dang /
188b4(rgyud 'grel): byabar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang / lnga pa'i rjes kyi glu dang / blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang / 'khor nyan pa'i rjes kyi grwa dang / dal ba'i dbye ba dang / drag po'i dbye ba dang / rdzogs par dbye ba dang / zab par dbye ba dang / phyed
188b5(rgyud 'grel): phri ba dang / rnam par 'dres pa dang / dkyugs gnyis len par byed pa dang / mgrin par sgrogs pa dang / rkan du sgrogs pa dang / lcer sgrogs po dang / sor skrag pa ste/ 'di dag ni glu'i bkod pa yin no//
188b6(rgyud 'grel): sa gzhi yongasu gzung ba'i phyir// dam tshig 'di dag rab tu bsku'o// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub phyir// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang bas bya// rdo rjes sogs grub rjes su// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung hUM//
189a1(rgyud 'grel): bsgom bya de nang du// hri las byung ba'i pad+ma ste// pad stengs a las byung ba yis// kun tu bltas pa'i rdo rje yin// rdo rje'i steng du rlung la sogs// de steng b+h+rUM las 'khor lo nyid// na mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gan
189a2(rgyud 'grel): par/ 'byung bzhi'i bdag nyid dkyil 'khor lo// de steng sangs rgyas yongs bsgoms te// spro zhing gzhal yas khang 'bar dgod// rgyal mtshan ba dan la sogs mdzes// pho brang nyams dga' bsgom par bya//
189a3(rgyud 'grel): dkar po gser sogs phye ma yis/ pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// las kun byed pa zhes bya ba'i// bum pa lte ba'i dbus su bzhag/ tshon sna lnga yi srad bu ni// shar gyi 'dab mar rnam par dgod// lho ru rdo rje bzhag par
189a4(rgyud 'grel): bya/ de bzhin byang du dril bu'o// bdud rtsi lnga gang dung phor ni// shor las gzhan po'i 'dab mar dgod// rdul tshon sangs rgyas lnga yi cha// 'bar ba re re tha dad pa'i// snod du bzhag par byas ni// so so'i mtshams bzhag
189a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya// sku dang gdan rnams ji lta bar// bum par rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom// mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod// sngags dang phyag rgya bskul bar bya// khu tshur gnyi ga dam bcings te// ro tsa na dang dkar po brkyang
189a6(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo rtse mo sbyar ba nyid// snying po'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// oM aHswAtAM/ snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngagaso// rdo rje rtse'i bum reg nas// gosang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// oM hUM swAhA sngags so// chu des rdul tshon
189b1(rgyud 'grel): thig spyad la// gad+hor nas mchod dang gtwo rA ma sbyinA// rang gi bdag pa'i gsung sngags ban// sku yang bsgom par bya ba yin// sngo zhing 'khor lo bAsdu bar bya// mtshan mo skad cig der gnuswA bya// 'di dag ni sa yong/
189b2(rgyud 'grel): su gzung ba yin no// rnal 'byor bdag nyid tho rangs langs// lus kyi bya ba kun byas te// bum pa sngogs bsdus dkyil 'khor sa'i// lho phyogs cha ru gzhag par bya// yang ni dri yis nyer byugs te//
189b3(rgyud 'grel): bam las byung ba'i lha maM bas ma// phyag gnyis bum pa bzang po 'dzin// sku mngag ser po'i 'od ldan zhing // ye shes rdzogs pa yang dag mchod// lhag par gnas nas gshegs gsol// skyob pa sangs
189b4(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang // sa drang pha rol phyin pa la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur// dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir// bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// zhes ldan gsuM
189b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod de sa'i lha mo gshegs su gsol lo// lus khrus bya zhing dri yi spro byugs// ji snyed 'byor ba'i rgyun gyi s+ya rgyan// ser po'i gros ni bgos na so ni// phyi dro'i dus su 'jug par bya// dri dang me tog
189b6(rgyud 'grel): btsal bkram pa'i// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug byas te// bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lhar bsgoms lo// spro dang bcas pas spos gzung nas// yan lag kun gyis rab btud // rgyal ba rnams la
190a1(rgyud 'grel): gsol ba gdab// ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// rdo rje 'chang chen che ge mo// bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'bri bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas la sogs
190a2(rgyud 'grel): kun gshegs te// dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol// 'di ni sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab pa'o// slob dpon rdo rje sems mtshungs lnga// phyi nas rtag sogs rgyal ba dang // mnyam pa rdo rje dril 'chang ba'i//
190a3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rnams kyis gsol gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// chos kun bdag med pa yi mtshig/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshang du gsol// mtshan rnams thams
190a4(rgyud 'grel): cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan smin thams cad rnam par spangs// kun tu bzang po sku yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba'i chos ni mchog las byung // ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong

190a6(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bshad du gsol// yang na tshigs bcad gcig pa 'di// bzhi yis mgrin gcig brjod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa'

190b4(rgyud 'grel): ba sor mo btso brgyad pa 'am// ying nu sor mo bcu gnyis pa// sbom su sor drug sor bzhi pa// seng lding rus pa lcags las byas// tsan ngan dmar pos byug par bya// phreng ba tsod pan dmar pos mdze sA// chang pa
190b5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pas bzung bar bya// phur bu'i mgo ru tho ba ni// bzhag pa lag pa gcig shos kyis// sngon gyi sngags kyis brdungs byas te// shar sogs gnas su gangadab par bya// yang na sngags dang phyag rgya yis//
190b6(rgyud 'grel): phur bu ra ba dra rnams bya// lag pa'i mthil ni steng bstan te// bzlog nas sa la brdab par bya// oM badz+re hUM phaT/ rdo rje phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis lu gu rgyud bcas te// gyen du brkyang nas phyi
191a1(rgyud 'grel): ru bzlog/ oM hUM phaT/ dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lcag gnyis khu tshur byas nas ni// ye shes pad+ma brkyang bar bya// sa gdugs dang ni rnam shes brkyang // ye shes dang ni rnam shes
191a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyar/ sa gdugs pad+ma sbyar byas te// phyogs mtshams brgyad du bskor bar bya// oM dzaM b+ha ni hUM phaT/ ro ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i bdag nyid kyis// bum pa lhag par gnas par

191a4(rgyud 'grel): su mthun pa'i stana? d+ha sa twe// dkyil 'khor khang par bzhag par bya// dngos grub brgyad don 'dod byed phyir// lan bdun byurar+ya du bzlas pa yin// I tAp+te tap+te mA hA tap+te swA hA// gang+gA'i chu dgug pa'i sngagaso//

191a6(rgyud 'grel): pa yis// 'khor l-i yaM ni sgo bzhi ru// shar phyogs sgo nas brtsom byas te// bum pa rnams ni dgod par bya// rgyal ba dang ni bkra shis zhis// byi ba shar sgo'i logs gnyis la// lho ru dngos grub srung

192a1(rgyud 'grel): mtshor bying ba las// 'don par mdzad pa khyod 'ba' zhig/ dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen

193b1(rgyud 'grel): de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongasu bzung ste skye bzhin pa// de phyir khyed rnams theg chen la// sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po cher

194a1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ the tshom med par bshang bar bya// dge bas dngos grub rnams gsum 'grub// mi dge sbyin sreg sogs zhi bya// slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o// gza' dang skar ma bzang sogs la//
