194a6(rgyud 'grel): yongasu shes par 'gyur// lag la skal ba bzang por 'gyur// snar mas nor rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// mgo la zhi bar brjod pa yin// chu stong chu smad bu 'phel 'gyur// khrums stod khrims smad 'phel bar
194b1(rgyud 'grel): shes/ rgyal la thams cad du ni rgyal// snron la bde ba yang dag stsol// lha mtshams mchog ni rab tu ster// dus dang gza' bzang la brten nas// bya ba 'di ni lhag nas yin// thig skud sar pa gtsang ma ni//
194b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzes pa snal ma dgu 'am lnga// gcig tu bsgril ba lnga yis grangs// gsang sngags zlos shing sgril bar bya// oM a n+yo n+ya A nu ga ta sar+b+ba d+harmA/ po rA s+phA ra A nu biSh+Ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma/ a t+yan+ta A nu pra biSh+Ta sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma
194b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba'i sngagaso// 'bar ba'i blta bas sangs rgyas kyis// thugs nas 'od kyi thig skud bkug/ lag po sbyar ba'i dbus gnas par// thig skud de ni rje su bsgrub// oM oM A a A AM swA hA/ thig
194b4(rgyud 'grel): skusrud do sgrub pa'i sngagaso// bla mas khu tshur g.yon pa ni// lte bar bzhag nas thig skung gzung // de ma thag tu slob ma yis// sngags 'di yis ni gzung bur bya// oM dz+nyA dz+dza dz+nyA zhes lan gsum gyis bar du
194b5(rgyud 'grel): brjod do// sngags kyis bum pa kun gyi chu// gtsang mas khyim gyi nang du gtor// thig skud gdab pa'i rim pa bzhin// ye shes thig skud rab tu brkyang // oM saur+b+bA saM sho d+ha nI hU~M phaT/ dkyil 'khor la sogs par
194b6(rgyud 'grel): gtor ba'i sngag so// oM badz+ra sU tra sa ma ya ma ti kra ma hUM/ ye shes kyi thig skud kyi sngagaso// mtshan ma med pas dngos mi 'grub// thig skud chad pas slob dpon 'chi// ring thung khyer na nad kyis 'debs//
195a1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs 'khrul pa yis myos par 'gyur// g.yas kyi phyogs su bskor ba yis// ji ltar gsungs pa'i thig gdab pas// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i thig la yang // ye shes thog skud/
195a2(rgyud 'grel): rab tu gdab// hi hi sgrogs dang ldan pa yis// yid kyi sgo ni dbye ba bya// oM hUM traM oM khaM rnams kyis// rdul tshon lha yi rnam par sbyor// 'bar nga'i lta bas bsgrub par bya// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas
195a3(rgyud 'grel): spros dang na bza' la sogs pa// ji ltar 'byor pa dbul bar bya// rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol// rdo rje'i glu sogs kyis bskul te// dmar po'i gos gyon ga tor ma sbyin// 'di ltar yang ni lhag mos byas/
195a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can khams ni rnam grol byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gnas// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag byas te// nyes pa kun las rnam grol ba'i// tshon rtsi
195a5(rgyud 'grel): dgye ba brtsom par bya// slob dpon gyi ni dang por dgye// phyi nas kun tu slob mas so// g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis// blangs nas dbang ldan nas g.yas bskor// 'khor lo can rigs rjes mthun pa'i
195a6(rgyud 'grel): rim pa sngags kyi rdul tshon bri/ oM badz+ra tsI tra sa ma ya hUM// gsang sngags so// phyi nas slob mas mkhas pa yis// ji ltar bde ba dgye bar bya// yon po ma dag chad sbom po// phra mo mtshan ngan spang ba
195b1(rgyud 'grel): byAbya/ sbom pos nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur// phra mos nor rnams 'jigs par byed// yon pos rnam par 'grus par 'gyur// chad pas slob dpon slob ma 'chi// 'di sogs skyon las nges grol ba// rdul chenar
195b2(rgyud 'grel): mos shes par 'gyur// in+d+ra nI lA'i rang bzhin dang // de bzhin gzhan yang marka ta 'dra// pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin dang // ser po 'bar bas shes pad+ma bya// kha dog dkar po de bzhin gzhan// de ltar rdul chen+da rim+ba
195b3(rgyud 'grel): shes bya// shar du dkar po chen po ste// lho ru ser po 'bar ba yin// nub tu rab tu dmar ba ste// byang du lhung khu de bzhin no// dbus kyi sa yi cha ru ni// khA dog sngon po rab tu brtag/ slob dpon 'khor lo
195b4(rgyud 'grel): shar gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin ldan// hUM mdzad la sogs sbyor ba'i bdag/ slob dpon bzhi ni sgo bzhir yin// zur bzhir bzhag par bya ba ni// chos sgrogs byed pa de bzhin yin no//
195b5(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig nyams pas 'jigs pa'i phyir// slob ma min paM gzhugs mi bya// med na gnyis sam gsum gzung bya// mthu' mar yang nI gcig 'dod bya// g.yas pa rdo rje gsor bya zhing // g.yon pas
195b6(rgyud 'grel): dril bu dkrol bar bya// phyag rgya sbyar ba'i tsham dam gtor// lta stangs phyag rgyas dgra las rgyal// sngags dang bcas pa'i stang stabs kyis// shar gyi gnas ni mnan par bya// rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni
196a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhan// sgo nas dag gis kyang ni mnan// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon dag gis// rol dang bcas pas mtha' ru spro// cung zad dgrad pa'i sdang mig dang // bcas pas smin ma rnam par bskyod// 'gro ba
196a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang du byed pa'i rgya// mig gi phyag rgyar shes par bya// g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brkyang dang // g.yas brkyang bskum dang g.yon brkyang bskum// hUM zhes sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o// gtso bo'i slob
196a3(rgyud 'grel): dpon gyi'o// bus stabs tsog pu'i rkang stabs dang // bskor ba'i stobs dang bzlog pa'i stobs// oM hUM phaT/ shar spro ba'i'o// pus reg stabs dang g.yon 'degs stabs// bskor stabs seng ge'i 'tshong stabaso// oM hUM AHphaT/
196a4(rgyud 'grel): lho'i sgra'o// g.yas brkyang ba dang g.yon brgyad dang // sa ga zlum po'i rkang stobaso// oM hUM A A AM phaT/ nub sgo'i 'o// mthun pa'i stabs dang mi mthun stabs// gcig bsdus g.yon bcad rkang stabs mchid// a
196a5(rgyud 'grel): ha na mA ra duSh+TA na/ b+hU ta ya g+hA ta ya a a hUM hrIHphaT/ byang sgo'i slob dpon gyi stang stabs dang rtagaso// 'dod pa'i grub bya ba dang // bgegs kyi bar chad zhi bya'i phyir// sngags dang phyag rgyas lha la sogs// g.yas brkyang
196a6(rgyud 'grel): kug la gtor ma sbyin// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings te// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// sa gdugs dang ni pad+ma sbrel// ro tsa na dang dkar po brkyang // dkar po bkug nas 'dren pa ni// lha dang lha min grub pa dgug/
196b1(rgyud 'grel): oM AHbA ha ni ma hA bA hA ni pre ta bA hA ni sAr+ya tsan+na/ sid d+ha mu khi dza ya rA dzI/ u ma de bi gang+ga/ sU rA bi tA ra ya/ saM g+ha gra ha nA sarbe/ gA Na pa ti/ krU ra tI ka ya shrI sa si de bi/ a ga lo pa ga lA/ a su rA su rA dza yo/ puk+ka sI ma hA
196b2(rgyud 'grel): puk+ka sI/ hUM ho ho A kaR+Sha ya A kAR+Sha ya/ sa ma sA d+hi pe hUM hUM hUM phaT dzaHswAhA// spyan drangs pa'i sngogs dang phyag rgya'o// oM ba tA li ma hA ba tA l-i hUM hUM hUM/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ sa ma ya tiSh+Tha dzardzu phreM phaT swAt+ta/ sngags 'dis spyan
196b3(rgyud 'grel): drangs phyag rgya las// mdzub bcings se gol gsum brdebs gtang // mnyes par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dI yi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi par// me tog dkar po dgram par bya// shU li'i bza' ba rgya chen po/
196b4(rgyud 'grel): bu ram zho dang 'bras can dmar// mar me sogs mchod rol stabs kyis// shar sgo ba yi ga taur ma sbyin// aM e ka bIk+She smA sh+yA ne pa/ parba te kan+de re gr-i h+na grA ma pAr+ye pa kre the tre shu n+yo gre bi shu Sha ta/ b+ha dz+nyA ni s+tha la ga te/
196b5(rgyud 'grel): mA tA d+hA na bI shiShi ta/ kr-iT+TA ru tra/ mA hA ru tra de ba dat+tA/ sa mA shAM tAM k+ShaSh+Ta A kA rA la b+hI b+hA tsA nAn+ta d+hI tI tA bI nau yU ka/ tsa myAr+d+ha tr-I ti/ baun+na ya k+Sha/ tsU mrat+satr-It+te/ bI nAM s+yA kA/ ts+tsha mur+t+ti gau r-I bAM b+hAn+na/ u mA d+he b+h+r-i tsa mA ta/
196b6(rgyud 'grel): yA.An tsa/ bi dza yA Na tse ba/ a dzi ti/ a pa ra dzi ta/ b+ha dra kA li ma hA ka lis+thU la ka li ma hAM tuM dzaM gi nIn+ti/ tsan+ti gau rI/ duSh+Ti laM pa ki/ tri ta shaM shwa ri kaM bo tsi dAM pI tsu pI n+yA grA mA Thas+thi ta yau gi ni/ bau rI rU paM ma hA rU pi/
197a1(rgyud 'grel): daMny+dza rU pA li ni/ ka pU li mA lA mA ni n+ya kha Did+ha na/ ma hA d+hI ka/ khaD+ga paR+Sha hA ta ya/ badz+ra hasta/ d+ha nustA thA/ ma hA su kha ma hA badz+ra sar+b+ba karma mA nu sA d+ha ka/ yo ga maN+Da la ma hA ra dzA/ badz+rA
197a2(rgyud 'grel): d+hid+hab+ha ti pra b+hU thA/ ta thA ga ta ma hA kU ya ni rany+dza yo gi triSh+Ti kA/ i da~M mU su khA e dz+nyA nA/ oM ba ha naM sar+b+ba sarbi Ni/ A~M kAk+sha D+hA na/ bag+h+nAn d+hi na/ khab+hU da na/ sar+b+ba dur+dz+dza N+yA hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT sUhA/ rdo rje'i stabs dang sngon phyag rgyar
197a3(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa'i sngags dang spyan drang ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal bcings nas ni// mdzub gnyis lu gu rgyud byas la// oM driSh+Ti hUM hA b+hak+Sha phaT swA hA/ sngags dang phyag rgya 'dis mnyes bya// se gol gsum gyis 'dis mnyes bya//
197a4(rgyud 'grel): tsan dan dmar po chu yis ni// phyi rol dkyil 'khor gru gsum bya// der ni me tog dmar po dgram// nya skam sha skam sgog po khrag/ til phye bag phye 'bras sran can// khyad par bdud rtsi lnga sogs dang // rnam pa sna tshogs
197a5(rgyud 'grel): bza' ba rnams// g+h+r-i sgo ba yI gAtor ma yin// oM ma NAM b+hA dza// b+hur+d+ha b+ha dra/ su b+hA dra/ dzA ya b+ha dra/ nAn+na kI la ma hA/ kI lA/ su kr-I la/ pad+mo shi kha/ shaM kha shrI kha na Ta/ ma hA nA TA/ b+hi da n+ti/ ts+tshe da nAM pU ra ni/ d+ha nU d+hi su
197a6(rgyud 'grel): d+ha na/ sA ru pa/ ke li ma hA ki li/ ha si ta/ kr-i Ti ta bak+She pa/ su shr-I ya rU pa kan+taM/ i daM badz+re shwa rA ge nA waM nAM/ ye kA yak+Shi ni/ hUM a ba ta ra ba ta li ba ta li/ b+hak+Sha br-i ye yo gI ni/ hU hUM hUM phruM s+thA hA/ khu tshur gnyis sbyar daM
197b1(rgyud 'grel): bcingasaH// snying ga'i gnas mnan par bya// spyan drangs pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bcings bskor snying gar bzhig/ sngags 'dis mnyes par byas la gtang // oM da na d+hi bya ti ba da ya~M b+hU swA hA/ dkyil 'byor dmar po mngon
197b2(rgyud 'grel): byas te// me tog dmar dang ser pos mchod// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i zas// sna tshogs kyis bkang snod bzhag ste// zlum pa'i stabs kyis bsngags bzlas te/ nub sgor gnas pa'i gti ri ma yin// oM a nan+ta/ ba su kaM
197b3(rgyud 'grel): to kA ka/ karko Ta/ pad+mA/ ma hA pad+mA/ shAM kha pA ta la/ ku li kA pA la/ de bA ti/ ma hA de bya ti/ som+b+ha shri khI/ mi hU shrI khIdat+tA d+hA ra/ ma hA dar+t+ta d+ha ra/ a pA la la hu lun d+ha non+da pa nAn+da/ sA ga ra/ ma hA sA ga ra/ tap+tA/ ma hA
197b4(rgyud 'grel): tAH/ shr-I kAn+ti/ ma hI kAn+ti/ rat+naM k+ShAn+ti/ su rU pa/ ma hA su R+ShA paM/ b+hA dr-i haM ke/ me ho rA ga/ ni li/ ma hA shai li/ oM b+hUk+ShaM b+h+r-ik+ShA/ U grAn+d+haM/ A grAn+d+ha/ ma d+hA nAM gAM/ oM d+h+r-i ba ti sirba/ b+hu b+ha ba phruM phuM swAt+ma/ b+hU gA khu tshu
197b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid bcas te// sa gdugs dang ni rnams shes brkyang // nyi ma'i lag pa brkyang byas te// sbrul mgo gdengs pa lta bur bya// oM hi liM hi l-i ma hA hi l-i phruM phruM phruM swA hUM/ sngar gyi phyag rgyas gos bcas// sngags 'di yis
197b6(rgyud 'grel): ni gtor ma sbyin// tsan dan dkar po'i dkyil 'khor lo// me tog dkar po dang ldan par// 'o ma dang ni mngar gsum gyiso// gang ba'i snod ni bzhag par bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs kyis ni bya// byang skyo ba yi gtor
198a1(rgyud 'grel): ma yin// 'byung 'jug la ni rdul tshon dang // thig 'goms nyes pas 'jigs pa'i phyir// rdo rje shugs kyis tshonA dang thig/ yid kyi rdo rje gadreg par bya// oM badz+ra be gA kra ma hUM/ na mkha'
198a2(rgyud 'grel): la rdul tshon dang thig gdegs pa'i sngagaso// dri yi chu yi dkyil 'khor du// lha yi gnas ni so so bar// de gdan yang dag gnas pa la// de dgra mtshan ma yang dag bri// gang dag 'khor lo yongs rdzogs pa bya//
198a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod pas rdzogs pa bya ched du// bde gshegs ji ltar gsungs pa yi// spos rnams phyogs su nges par dbul// tsan ngan dang ni gur gum nyid// brag zhun de bzhin 'dod ma yin// rdzas 'di dag gi gdug spos
198a4(rgyud 'grel): che/ mi bskyed pa la rab tu dbul// gsum pa dza ti ko sha ste// dngos grub bskyod pa'i spos 'di dag/ phan pa la ni sbyar bar bya// kun+du ru dang po la ka/ ri dgas lte ba sen me ni// dngos grub rab tu sgrub pa yi//
198a5(rgyud 'grel): spos ni rin chen rgyal po yIn// a ru ra dang bu ram dang // sha tha'i dri dang sha thi nyid// shA li kA dang sih+ma ka/ 'jig rten mgron gyi gdug pa 'di// gsungs dang me gsungs pa yi dri// dri yis bstan bcos las
198a6(rgyud 'grel): shes pa// spros 'di lta yi rgyal po ste// de dag mchod pa'i sgrub pa yin// de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil bzlas pa'i// dri chus dkyil 'khor gtor nas ni// bsrung ba byas te phyir byung nas// bum pa la sogs sta gon
198b1(rgyud 'grel): b+h+ya/ nag po rtsa la sogs kun spangs// mgrin pA rIng ba lto ba che// rdo d+has+ya dkar po btags pa yi// chus byugs yal gAs kha rgyan pa// mgul du mdzes pa'i gos kyis dukri// rin chen 'bru sman+da snying por ldam/
198b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs kyi mtshan mas mtshan pa ste// rgyal ba bzhi yi mtshon ma yis// stong pa'i log bzhi ldan byas pa// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par bya// gzhan yang de 'dra 'on kyang chung // rigs kyi mtshan ma ri re yini// bla re
198b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mtshan me tog sogs// mchod gtor rgya chen sta gon bya// de nas lus gtsang dri zhim bsgo// dkyil 'khor las rig yang dgra btsos// ngo shal dpung rgyan rkang rgyun dang // rna ba'i rgyan dang gdu gu dang // sor
198b4(rgyud 'grel): gdub ska rags la sogs pa'i// rgyun rnams kun gyi brgyan byas pa// cod pan dmar po mdzes pa la// lan bdun bzlas pas mgo bor bcings// dpal ldan rdo rje dril 'dzin pa// rdo rje sems dpa' dang mtshungs
198b5(rgyud 'grel): pas/ bskor zhing bltas nas chad pas bskang // lhag pa dbye zhing sgo dbye bye// de nas bla re 'og gis// dkyil 'khor phyi rol dris byugs pa'i// dbang ldan grwa yi steng gnas la// bum pa lhug par gnas par bya
198b6(rgyud 'grel): oM hUM swA hA// sngags 'di yis// cod pani kha rgyan bzhag por bya// hU~M bdun bzlas pa'i srang bu dkar// me tog phreng ba lhag par bcings// tsan dan dkar po'i dri chur bcug/ phreng ba'i mgo bo lag gzung nas//
199a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i dbus bcings steng bzhag la// sngags pas bdag po bsgom byas te// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pas// lhag par gnas nas mdun du bya// cig shos bum pa brgyad po rnam
199a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yas su bskor ba yi skor ba yis// de mtshan bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis// brgya los brgyad ni lhag par bzlas// de nas slob ma la sogs pa// bsang phyir 'khyil pa'i bum pa la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i//
199a3(rgyud 'grel): gzugs byas te// de yi gsang sngags 'ba' zhig la// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas// shar gyi sgra dang nye bar bzhag/ shar gyi gnas gnas nas ni// lha yi rnal 'byor shin tu ldan// dkyil 'khor bsgrub
199a4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha mchong phyir// 'dir ni mchod pa'i bsgrub par bya// rdo rje slob dpon bsam ji bzhin// 'jig rten spyod pa'i rjes zhugs nas// mchod yon snod la sogs pa rnamaso// gnas ji ltar bar bzhug par bya//
199a5(rgyud 'grel): dang por bdag blo gsang sngags kyis// yon mchod la sogs gsung gtor bya// oM sarba s+t+waM sho d+ha ni hU~M phaT/ 'bras bu me twog+na la sogs pa// dngos po sna tshogs bsang ba'i sngags// oM AHswA hA/
199a6(rgyud 'grel): dung por snod na gnas pa yi// bdud rtsi lnga sbyangs gsang sngagaso// oM AHhUM oM swAhA/ dam tshig gi chu bseng ba'i sngagaso// oM shrI hUM g+h+raM dz+dza swAhA/ rnam shes 'jigs par sbyar ba yis// lcags kyi lnga skyeng
199b1(rgyud 'grel): gsang sdug so// de nas rang gtso'i sbyor bdag nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku// ye shes phyag rgya snyoms zhugs te// ting nge 'dzin la dmigs par bya// ting nge 'dzin spros sangs rgyasna rnams// rang rang mtsha
199b2(rgyud 'grel): mar dgod par bya// byin brlabs pa la sogs dang // dbang bskur bar du yongs rdzogs bya// de nas gos zung dang bcas pa'i// snod rnams ji bzhin gnas pa los// gos dbul ba yi sngags kyis ni// so sor lha la
199b3(rgyud 'grel): dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra ltas se swA hA/ sngar bsangs byas pa gtsang ma yi// mchod yon la sogs mchod pa bya// de nas bstod pa nges brjod de// bdud rtsi myang zhing dgyes par bya// me tog 'di ni bzang zhing dge/ dag
199b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i skye gnos las dag po// bdag gis dad pas 'byol lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// nags tshal lngas byung ro yi mchog/ gang zhig dri yi bdug spos mchog/ bdag ni dad byas 'bul
199b5(rgyud 'grel): lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// srin bu 'joms shing dag byed pa// dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// lhan
199b6(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes dang sbyar ba'i dri// shangs la tshim byed dag pa 'di// bdag gis dang pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// lha bshos gtsang ma thams cad ni// bza' dang bca' ba'i bye brag
200a1(rgyud 'grel): bcas// kha dog dri dang ror ldan pa// 'bul gyi so sor bzhes su gsol// oM ku ru ku ru ma hA b+hak+Sha shrI shrI swA hA// lha bshos dbul ba'i sngag so// oM dzaM swA hA/ 'bras bu thams cad dbul ba'i sdug
200a2(rgyud 'grel): so/ oM shrI hUM g+h+raM dz+dza swA hA/ lcags kyu lnga dbul ba'i sngagaso// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgrub pa// mchod pa nyi shu bya ba ni// hUM gi dam tshig las byung ba// rang gi rang phyag rgyas thams cad dbul// sgeg pa'i lag pas sgeg
200a3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// phreng ba phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i// glu ni hUM gi dam tshigs gis// gar ni rdo rje rkang pas byas// de ltar pi baM gling bu sogs// mchod pa blo dang ldan pas bya'o// de bzhin me tog mar mye dang // spos sogs dngos mang tshogs
200a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams gos// sna tshogs gos dang bla re dang // dril bu rnga yab mdzes pa dang // bran po bran mo ba bzhon dang // rta dang glang po la sogs dbul// bde gshegs gsungs pa'i dga' ston rgyu// dkyil 'khor snying po'i nang phul
200a5(rgyud 'grel): bas/ de nyid don las ma 'das shing // don shes pa'i 'khor lo dgyes// rdo rje dril bu ma sbyangs par// bstod bya bA bkra shriswA glu blang bya// dz+nyA hUM hUM/ de ha d+ha ru saM sa ra/ d+hu ru d+hAn d+ha li ga na/ d+h+r-i d+hu ru he badz+rA tu hUM/ te na hUM/ twe na hA/
200a6(rgyud 'grel): t+ye nA te tAM hUM/ su ra na ra ban+ti ta tsa ra Na d+hA ru ku su ma bai man+t+ra tha ro Sha ku ru he badz+rA tu hUM/ te na hU~M/ te na te te hUM/ b+hA bo bi mud ti/ thi shi shau gu h+yA ni gr-I dzaM/ a se ra ma ra ma he badz+ra tu hU~M/ g+hA ha ni pi TaM a ga d+h+r-i tuM hU~M/ rlung me'o dkyi
200b1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la gnas pa/ oM gyi byin rlabs bdud rtsi lnga// rab sbar rje su ye shes kyi// bdud rtsir bsam zhing yig gsum bzla// nang zhugs thugs dbang dpag med pa/ hUM byung rdo rje bcas pa'i lces// snying ga'i zla bar rgyal ba yi// /
200b2(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor ma lus tshim par bya// dran pa ma nyams rnal 'byor pas// thams cad byang chub rab bsgrub phyir// bshad dang ma bshad pa yi gar// rdo rje'i gom par bya ba yin// mchod dang bstod pa nyer spyod sogs//
200b3(rgyud 'grel): phul nas lha rnams mnyes par byas// sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dkyil 'khor du// bzhag nas phyir byung chos skyong la// 'bras dang nya dang sha la sogs// chang dang bcas pa'i gtor mas mchod// slar yang nod zhugs rnam
200b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor ldan// ma dag nyes bzhi byi'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun tu bskor byas te// de ru mtshan mo rdzogs par bya// dkyil 'khor bdag pos snga dro ni// phyi rol slar yang byang nas ni// rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byas pa yis//
200b5(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rab tu mchod// rgyas par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i cho ga yi// yan lag la mkhas yan lag bcas// rgyal ba'i sreg rdzas bsreg par bya// dkyil 'khor sgo yi phyi rol tu//
200b6(rgyud 'grel): slob ma bzhag nas de gzhug phyir// nang zhugs mchod pa char byas nas// 'khor bdag dbang blangs bden pa brjod// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa mod// gzung du med cing brjod du med//
201a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu dang las las kun tu byung // de bzhin nyid las nges pararla skyes// bden pa de yis dkyil 'khor du// gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni// kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ dkyil 'khor bdag pa
201a2(rgyud 'grel): zhal byung ba'i// tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyis bskul// lag gnyis rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// 'khor lo can la glu yis bstod// nam mkha' skye ba'i mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang
201a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// mi bskyod rdo rje bdag 'grub mdzod // kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa'ang khyod//
201a4(rgyud 'grel): 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang
201a5(rgyud 'grel): chub sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen pa phyag rgya'i mchag/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag grub mdzod//
201a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can kun gyi yid khyab pa// sems can kun gyi snying la bzhugs// sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid// 'dod mchog dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o// bden pa gang gis ye shes mchog/ shes rab thabs bdag dkyil la
201b1(rgyud 'grel): yin/ bden pa de yis mgon bdag la// khyod kyi 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod// de ltar bstod cing phyag byas pas// 'di ltar yang nAM gasnol ba gdab// dkyil 'khor gtso bo dkyil 'khor du// slob ma rab tu gzhug pa
201b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyi/ sems can don du bdag gsol 'debs// bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol// de ltar de tsho gnang thob nas// slob ma der ni bzhugs par bya// de nas dbang bskur ldan pa'i// slob mas slob dpon zhabs dag
201b3(rgyud 'grel): la/ btud nas me tog snyim bkang ste// 'di skad ces ni brjod byar bya// dga' chen khyod dga' ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongasu gsol// byang chub tshon po'i tshul brtan po// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshalo// dam tshig
201b4(rgyud 'grel): de nyid gsal du gsol// sdom pa rnams kyab bdag la gsol// sangs rgyas rol mo las byung ba// mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan// thor pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gas
201b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du// slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod// mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba// skal ba chen po bdog la gsol// mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing // dpe byad rnams ni yang dag
201b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan/ sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// dbang bskur ba ni rmang byung che// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol//
202a1(rgyud 'grel): de nus slob ma'i 'dod pa bzhin// 'khor lo n+dan+da la gsol ba gdab// rnam dag che ge mo zhes pa// byang chub sems ni yongs 'dzin cing // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs nas// dam tshig dam
202a2(rgyud 'grel): ni sdom pa tshal// de nas slob dpon gnang thob pas// slob ma la ni dri bar bya// gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa// gsang ba yongasu 'dzin pa ni// bdag nyid chen po khyod 'dod dam// des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya//
202a3(rgyud 'grel): sa na bla ma rdor 'dzin gyis// slob ma sdom pa dang ldan pa// gos dmar gyon la ras dmar gyis// mig ngag dgab par byas nas ni// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i bum pa'i chus// bsrung ba'i phyir ni gsang gtor bya// me d+h+r-ig kha
202a4(rgyud 'grel): drog sna tshogs pa'i// phreng ba lag pas gzung ba la// sku gsum rnam par sbyang ba'i phyir// yi ge gsum po rnam par dgod // gsang sngags zlos shing lag bzung nas// slob ma gzhug par bya ba yin// oM ki li
202a5(rgyud 'grel): ki li ma li g+hur ni ta badz+ra tsa le yuM yuM yuM swA hA// slob ma gzhug pa'i sngagaso// sdug po khyod ni su zhig ces// bla mas slob ma gzhug la ni dr-i// sdug pa skal chen byadag yin zhes// 'di yi 'jug phyir sma byar bya//
202a6(rgyud 'grel): de nas nang du bcug nas ni// rnam par snang mdzad brgya byin la// sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs byas te// de nas dam tshig bzung bar bya// oM sarba bud d+hA pU dza~M pas+thA nA ya// at+ma nAM nIr+yA tA ya mi/ oM o tsa
202b1(rgyud 'grel): pU dz+nyo bas+tha nA ya At+ma nAM nir+ya tA ya mi/ oM sa kA le satwa pa ri tA nAr+tha/ At+ma nAM nir+yA tA ya mi/ de nas rdo rje dril 'chang ba'i// bla mas slob ma'i snying ga ru// rdo rje bkod de der btags nas// dam tshig mchog ni ldan gsum
202b2(rgyud 'grel): brjod// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma yU haM/ 'di ni dam tshig gzung ba'o// de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ dang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigasu zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gi de bzhin gshegs
202b3(rgyud 'grel): pa thams cad du grub pa yang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan smos kyang ci dgos te/ de lta bu'i rdo rje'i ye shes bskyod par bya// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong pa rnams kyis mdun du ma smra zhig/ dam tshig nyams par
202b4(rgyud 'grel): gyur ta re// rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis// snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur// gal te tshul 'di smras nA ni// de ma thag tu bral te gshegs// de nas sngon du sgrub pa yi// bdud rtsi lnga la bdun bzlas te// dung gis
202b5(rgyud 'grel): sgrub ma'i kha ru ni// sngags 'di brjod la sbyin par bya// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub pas// rdo rje bdud rtsi chu 'thung shig/ aM oMHswA hA/ bdud rtsi lnga yi chu blud pa'i sngagaso// dam tshig
202b6(rgyud 'grel): gi ni chu 'thungs te// dad pa nye bar gnas pa la// ci ste 'dir ni mi brtan par// dogs phyir bla mas brtan par bya// dang phyin chad khyod kyis phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyi/ ngas 'di byos shig/ ces sgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgoso// /
203a1(rgyud 'grel): khyod kyi nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes brjod par bya'o// sems ni rab tu dga' bya'i phyir// gal te 'bebs par
203a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa na// snying gar rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// rlung gi sa bon rnam par bsgom// rkang pa'i mthil nas rlung gis gdegs// de yi snying gar bskul bar bya// rong gi lha yi sbyor ba yi// nga rgyal ljon pas gsang sngags bzlas
203a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags ni oM le lo l-I lo hUM AHsngags pas nga rgyal bskyed nas ni// rdo rje dril bu dkrol byas te// de yis sngags kyi rdo rje glu// 'jigs su rung bar gor bya'o// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya pra ti ba li ta hUM hUM hUM haM hoswA hA/ ye shes
203a4(rgyud 'grel): phab pa las bskyod pa'i sngags// de nas se go lo brngub bya ste// me tog phreng ba bzang po 'dis// oM pra tIts+tsha badz+ra ho zhes badz+rod// dkyil 'khor snying po rab tu dor// gal te bzang por ma lhung na// lan gnyis ber du dor
203a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// de nas di'i mgo re bcings te// phreng ba'i sbyor ba byin par bya// 'di yis gdong g.yogs dbye ba ste// bla myas tshigs bcad 'di ltar brjod// oM rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis// mig 'byed par nI brtson
203a6(rgyud 'grel): byar+ya myodzad// mig ni thams cad 'byod mdzad de// rdo NAM'i mig ni bla na med// oM dz+nyA na tsak+Shu hUM a swA hA/ di ltar brjod rjes mig phye ste// bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// de nas bla mos slob ma la// 'di ltar yang ni brjod
203b1(rgyud 'grel): pabar bya// dkyil 'khor 'di la da lta nyid// dad pa'i shugs kyis blta bar bya// khyod kyang sangs rgyas rig las skyes// sngags dang phyag rgya skya byin gyis brlabs// ston ma byung ba mthong ba yis// slob ma 'dod dang ldan pa yis//
203b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i zhabs la phyag byas te// de nas 'di ltar brjod par bya// oM rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yis// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag zhugaso// oM rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas dam
203b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig kyang brjod par bya ste/ sa ma ya hU~M ha~M haM// de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bstan// rigs rgyal lha mo'i mtshan ma dang // 'dab ldan pad+mar bcas pa dang / lha yi gnas rnams bstan par bya// 'di dag ni slob ma dkyil
203b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khor du gzhug pa'i cho ga'o// de nas slob mas slob dpon g+hi// zhabs la gus par phyag 'tshal te// tshigs bcud 'di yis bla ma la// dbang bskur don du gsol ba gang ba// khyod ni he ruM kA dang lo te// bde gshegs rnams
203b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bde gsol mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' che rnams kyis// yang dag don mchog rnam dag pa// ji ltar de nyid bdud rtsi yis// dbang gi mchog ni bskur bya yin// de bzhin bdag la 'khor ba yi// sdug bsngal rnams
203b6(rgyud 'grel): ni gsal bar mdzod// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi dri med mchog/ ma rig nyes pa rab rib 'joms// gang gis byang chub bla med pa// de ring bdag gis thob par mdzod// dkyil 'khor shar du khru gnyis dor// nang gi dkyil 'khor
204a1(rgyud 'grel): byed tsam gyis// dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ldan pa yi// pAl 'khor nyid par slob ma gzhag/ mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs sbyin// sbyang ba'i cho ga byas nas ni// slob ma shis par 'dod
204a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// bla mas bkra shis glu blang bya// phun sum+b+ha tshogs 'dzin gser gyi ri bo lta bu'i mdog/ 'jig rten gsum mgon d+hI ma gsum ni rab tu spangs// sangs rgyas chu skyes 'dab rgyas lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba//
204a3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la bde byed shog/ de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grags shing lha dang mis mchod pa// dam chos rab mchogo skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'jig
204a4(rgyud 'grel): rten bkra shis gnyis pa dong 'dir khyod la shog/ dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhing thos pa'i bkru shes phyag/ dge 'dun lha dang lha ma yin dang mis mchod pa// ngo tsha dpal gnas tshogs kyi nang na rab kyi mchog/ 'jig rten
204a5(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gsum pa deng 'dir khyod la shog/ dga' ldan lha yi gzhal med khang gi snying po nas// 'gro la phan phyir bde gshegs dbang por bcas pa'i lha// rjes su 'brang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang /
204a6(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ 'dab sar mtsher ba me tog char 'bab yum pa'i tshal// mang po lha yis bsten par mgon po bltam pa na// sred pa mthar gyur pa yis bkra shis gang yin/
204b1(rgyud 'grel): ba/ bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ sna tshugs skyon rnams rnam par gzhom par bya ba'i phyir// dgyes pas dka' thub tshal du nam phyed mngon par byung // dbang bcas lha rnams rjes 'brengs gshegs pa'i
204b2(rgyud 'grel): bkra shIs gang // bkra shrIs des kyang dang 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ chu bo'i 'gram du mchod yon phreng bas yongasu bskor// zhi phyir ngo mtshur gyur pa srid pa dag byed pa// klu yis rgyal pos legs par bstod pa'i
204b3(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gang // bkra shrIs des nI deng 'drir khyod la zhi byed shog/ grang khyer mchog gyur ser skya zhes ni bya ba der// rmad du grags pa chen po'i lha yis mngon bstod pa// bsam yas dge bsgrubs de bzhin gshegs pa'i
204b4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni dang 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ rgyu bar 'grum du/ sems can thams cad la ni phan phyir byang chub pa// dam chos rin chen tshogs ni thub pa las byung ba// sems can don bsgrub pa
204b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas brtson pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis ngos kyang dong 'dir khyod la zhi byed shig/ rab tu 'od+mo 'bar gser lta bu yau sgyu mnga' ba// bai DUr+ya mdog 'dra ba'i rtsa gdan snying du bzhugs// skyil krung phyed bcas mi g.yo
204b6(rgyud 'grel): spyi mnga'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni dang 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ shing gi rgyal po'i rtsa bar bcom ldan byams stobs kyis// bdud phyogs kun las rnam par rgyal chos dang mkhar// rnam pa sna
205a1(rgyud 'grel): tshogs ngo mtshar gyur pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shrIs des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ ba rA d+hA ser bzhugs nas bde bar gshegs ston pas// sa dang mkha' la shin tu ngo mtshar gsung byung
205a2(rgyud 'grel): ba/ chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor ba'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ bkra shis gang zhig phan byed dam pa mchog phyir thogs// bsod nams bya byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bskyed pa//
205a3(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan thub pa shAkya steng ges kun gsungs pa'i// bkra shris des ni dreng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ dril bu bskyod cing rdo rje gsor// bkra shis glu dang ldan pas so// gsor la sogs pa'i spyan kan// der ni de la dang
205a4(rgyud 'grel): bskur bya// de ltar de lta'i dbang la ni// lha yi sbyor ba gang yin pa// de yis phyag rgyas mgul nas 'khyud// slob mo nges par byed du gzhug/ dang po chu yi dbang gi dang // gnyis pa cod pan dbang yin no// gsum pa rtswa
205a5(rgyud 'grel): rje'i dbang yin// bzhi pa rang bdag dbang yin no// lnga pa ming gi dbang bskur bya// drug pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// bdun pa bum pa'i dbang yin te// brgyad pa gsang ba'i dbang nyid// dgu pa shes rab dbang gis
205a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ de nyid rdo rje rab sbyor bas// brtul zhugs dang ni lung bstan nyid// 'di dag ji bzhin rim pas sbyin// bum po brgyad po thams cad kyis// rang gi rig ma skyes bus chu// thugs rdo rje ru rab bsgom pas// rdo rje 'chang
205b1(rgyud 'grel): bsams dbang bskur bya// rdo rje nyi ma rnams bsgoms pas// de sa dbu rgyan sbyin par bya// thams cad snga mA bzhin bsgoms lu// rdo rje tshigs bcad rab sbyor lngas// rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa// snying gar rang gi lhag pas
205b2(rgyud 'grel): gzung // slob ma 'jig rten dbang phyug bsgoms// rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni// di ring khyod la dbang bskur bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu grub phyir rdo rje zung
205b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rta mchog bsgom byas la// lha mo sgrol mas yang dag 'khyud// rdo rje bdag pos dbang bskur te// rdo rje dril bu dkrol du gzhug/ oM badz+ra a d+hi pa ti t+taM oM b+hi Shiny+tsA mi tiShiny+tsa mi tISh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ slob ma rnam por snang
205b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzad bsgom// ming gi dbang ni bskur bar bya// oM badz+ra satwa s+t+waM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi badz+ra nA ma a b+hi She ka ta/ kye dpal che ge mo rdo rje zhes bya'o// dbang kun gang dang gang snang ba// gtso de rang gi lhag pa'i lha// chos rnams rang bzhin/
205b5(rgyud 'grel): rnyog med pa// sangs rgyas ye shes blta bar bya// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag na gnas// khyod kyis kyang ni rtog tu bzung // rdo rje'i snying po'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga tA sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma
205b6(rgyud 'grel): ya s+t+waM d+hA rA ya mi hi hi hUM// bdag gis bde bar gshegs bcas ni// rim pa bzhin du bsdu bar bya// bde ba can na bcom ldan 'das// nyid kyis gang tshe chos bstan pa// de tshe gsang ba'i dbang pos zhus// mi rnams ji ltar
206a1(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgod pa dag la slob dpon te// blta ba gsang ba'i de bzhin// lag pas reg pa shes rab nyid// de nyid gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa'o//
206a2(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ma 'ongs pa yin te// bla ma'o zhal las gsal bar 'gyur// 'di dag ni dbang bskur ba drug pa'i yin no// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// phyag 'tshal nas ni mdun gnas te// 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshigs bcad 'dis/
206a3(rgyud 'grel): slob mas bla ma la gsol gdab// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar chen po'i tshe gsal ba// bdag kyang bskyab pa'i don gyi phyir// na mkho'i rdo rje deng bdag gsol btab nas// bla mas skad cig ting 'dzin la// gnas
206a4(rgyud 'grel): nanus de dbang bskur ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog spro bya// nya 'khor ba dan rgyal mtshan sogs// glu dang rnga sogs sa ru ni// gdugs dang bla re bres nas su// 'dug ste slob mA la 'di brjod// dbang bskur
206a5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen chen po ni// khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas las byung ba sbyin par bya// bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yin no// gsum pa shes
206a6(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes te// bzhi pa pa de bzhin gshegs po'o// thams cad thabs kyi cho ga yis// thams cad bla med chod pas mchod// phyi nas lag nas lag tu ni// slob ma rdo rje brtul bzhugs sbyin// thog mtha' med pa'i/
206b1(rgyud 'grel): sems dpa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems ma bdag po'i bdag/ a las byung ba'i yes rab gzugs// dril bu yang ni de lnga sbyin// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir//
206b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje dril bu ming nyid do// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // byang chub mtshig tu rgyal ba bzhed// 'di nyid kyi don ni/ rdo rje che dang dril bu che//
206b3(rgyud 'grel): zung zhig rdo rje rab gnas pa// de ring rdo rje slob dpon gyur// slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis// mkha' 'gro lnga dang yang dag ldan// dam tshig lnga yis yongs gang ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs dang ldan// slob ma rdo rje 'chang dbang
206b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgyur// dkyil 'khor pad+ma zhes su gsungs// yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid// gzhal med khang zhes bshad pa ste// sems ni gzhal yas khang brtsegs nyid// de la phyi rol gru bzhi pa'i// tshad ni mnyam par gyur
206b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// gang zhig byams pa la sogs sems// thig skud bzhir ni brjod pa'o// thig gang yang dgra bshad pa yin// sbyor bas chos kyi rjes dran pa'o// lta ba kun las rnam grol ba// ye shes thig tu brjod pa yin//
206b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyun gang yang dag bshad pa nyid// tshul khrims sogs kyi sdom pa mchog/ dbang po gnyis la sogs pa'i sems// ra ba lngar ni byung ba nyid// gang zhig sgo zhes bshad pa ni// rnam par thar pa rnam pa bzhi// rta babs
207a1(rgyud 'grel): ba bzhi po ni// yang dag spong ba bzhi zhes brjod// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi// kha khyer bzhir ni brjod pa nyid// sgo gang bzhi ni gang yin pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rnam pa bzhi// de bzhin me tog phreng
207a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyan pa// byang chub yan lag bdun po yin// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad po ni// ka ba brgyad po zhes brjod// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi// lam gyi ye shes khyad par ni// rnga yab du ni yongasu grags// gang zhig
207a3(rgyud 'grel): do shal bshad pa ni// nyon mongs thams cad bcod pa ste// kun tu bcad pa'i ngo bo yis// nyon mongs 'phrog pa dra ba nyid// tshogs gnyis dag gi sbyor ba las// 'khor lo bskor ba gang yin pas// nyon mongs phyed/
207a4(rgyud 'grel): ni gcod pas na// do shal phyed pa nyid du brjod// 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do// phung po lnga ni mdor bsdu na// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags// rdo rje skye mched nyid dag ni// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil
207a5(rgyud 'grel): 'khor mchog/ sa ni spyan zhes bya bar bshad// chu'i khams ni mA ma kI// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ni// me dang rlung du rab tu grags// gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas// gaN+DI mug zad pa shin rje mthar// rtsa
207a6(rgyud 'grel): mas byu / sa ni she bya ma par byed pa'o// zhe sdang zad par mthar byed pas// nyes pa zad pas shes rab mthar// des na sems kyi mthar byed de// des ni nyon mongs mthar byed 'gyur// 'dod chags 'dod chags longs
207b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod pas// 'dod chags zad pa padad+ma mthar byed// des na ngag gi mthar byed 'gyur// de bzhin snyoms 'jug mthar byed do// nyon mongs kun zad gang yin dang / de bzhin las kun zad pa nyid// sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs ni
207b2(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed ces byar bshad// 'di ni lha yau de kho na nyid do// phyir mi ldog pa slob dpon gyi dbang ngo // mi bskyod sbyor ba btang byas te// rtag pa'i sbyor ba rjes dran bya// slob ma drung du bzhag byas la// de yi rje su bla ma yis//
207b3(rgyud 'grel): gos la sogs pas mig bkab nas// brtags pa'i stan la bzhags par bya// shes rab bcas par rab bzhugs te// rdo rje sbyor ba yang dag brtsam// rong 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor bya// rdo rje sa bon sbyor bas ni// slob
207b4(rgyud 'grel): ma brtag par bsams pa la// 'dzags pa'i rigs zhes bya bas ni// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ltar// bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyi
207b5(rgyud 'grel): dbang bskur ltar// bdag gis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyi dbang bsku ro// de chud za dogs mi za'i phyir// nya phyis sogs kyis blang mi bya// dag pa lce yi mchog gi ni// gnyi gA las byung blang
207b6(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// 'di ni de nyid bla na med// gnyis med yi ges brjod mi nus// chos dbyings rnam pa lta bu yi// dam pa'i bde ba yang dag myang // bla ma rdo rje 'chang ba yis// g.yas pas mchog sbyin snying gar ni/
208a1(rgyud 'grel): khu tshur chos gos grwa nas gzung // lag pas de yi dril bu gtad// dbugs 'byin thams cad byin nas ni// shAkya thub pa rang gyur pas// slob ma chen po lung bstan te// sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur
208a2(rgyud 'grel): the tshom med// skye rgas nA dang 'chi mi 'gyur// 'jigs dang mya ngan nad mi 'byung // bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// bu khyod ngo yi lung bstan bya// 'di ltar nga yi lung bstan khyod// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs//
208a3(rgyud 'grel): srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral to// rang gi lhag pa'i lha yis ming // de bzhin gshegs par sar 'og dang // mi yul mtho ris nyid du 'grub// 'di ni gsang ba'i dbang lung bstan pa'o//
208a4(rgyud 'grel): snga ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // rgyud du gsungs pa'i rim pa yis// phyag rgya bzang mo rab brtags pas// 'od dpag med sbyor ldan la sbyin// lha mo thar byed dga' ster ma// sna tshogs gzugs can brtser ldan ma//
208a5(rgyud 'grel): zung zhig zung zhig sems dpa' che// bzung bar byas nas mchod par gyis// rdo rje bcings pa'i sbyor bas ni// rdo rje mchod pa yong dgra brtsam// rdo rje sems nI nges phyung bas// rdo rje lce yis bza' bar bya// mnyam par
208a6(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'i cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bya ste// bsam gtan las byung sbyin sreg bya// de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa yis// dkyil 'khor mthong dang rab tu zhugs pas// sdig
208b1(rgyud 'grel): pa kun yAs+ya nges grol bas// khyed rnams rnyeng nyid legs par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// slar yang ba b.ru 'gyur ma yin// mi tshugs pa dang maM 'chi bas// gang la'ang 'jigs med rol par gyur// srid pa
208b2(rgyud 'grel): tu dag pa'i phyir// srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir// srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'das// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya//
208b3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs// mchog tu brtag pa'i bka' yino// slob dpon smad par mi bya byung // bdog shegs bka' las mda' mi bya// dz+ha spun la sbed pa ru// nam yang smyo bar mi bya'o// sems can
208b4(rgyud 'grel): rnams lo byams dman smin// skab myed de nyid gtam mi bya// skul ldan sems can stong mi bya// bdag gis sras la nges maM smad// dam pa'i chos lo tshad mi gzung // gzhan gyi chos la'ang brnyas mau byA// byang chub snying
208b5(rgyud 'grel): bo'i mthar thug par// dkon mats+tsha ni spyang mi bya// rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya// pri ma to ga gtung bar bya// rtag tu sbyin sreg dgang bar bya// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya// rtag tu bdog shogs
208b6(rgyud 'grel): rab gnas bya// 'byung po che la gtor mo sbyin/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas dbugs dbyung ba rgyas parashes rab kyi ni dbang bskur nas// der rjes bzhi pa brjod par bya// rdo rje bri bru
209a1(rgyud 'grel): de dbyangs kyi// gnyis kyis mig ni rgyus btab pa// rtogs shing rab tu rtogs med pa// bzhi pa gsal bar 'ongs pa yin// ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing // rdo rje snying po mkha' dang mtshungs// rdul
209a2(rgyud 'grel): bral thar ster zhi ba nyid// khyod rang yang ni de yi pa// bla ma dam pa'i zhal las ni// bzhi pa shes par bya ba yin// slob ma'i bya ba rdzogs rjes su// dkyil 'khor phyi rol byung nas ni// cho ga rdzogs phyir sbyin sreg bya// zhus
209a3(rgyud 'grel): te rgyal rnams bzod gsol// mchod dang bstod pa byas nas ni// g.yon pas dril bu dkrol bar bya// g.yas pas bskyod cing spros dbul te// gshegs su gsol ba'i tshigs bcud brjod// oM khyod kyi sems con don
209a4(rgyud 'grel): kun mdzad// rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol// sangs rgyas yul du gshegs nas kyang // slar yang 'byon par mdzod du gsol// 'di ni gshegs gsol ba'i sngags yi no// / lha yi dkyil 'khru
209a5(rgyud 'grel): gshegs nas nI// sngags kyi rdul tshon bsti byas te// gtsang ma'i snod du gzhag byas la// de nas chu bor dor bar bya// aM gi li gi li hUM dzaHswA hA// rdul tshon bsdu ba dang dor ba'i sngags so// de nas dkyil 'khor rlung gnas
209a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i/ sa ni bdud rtsis nyer byugs te// phyogs sbyong ba yi gtor ma'im// 'byung po kun la gtor ma btang // phyogs sbyong rnams kyi gtor ma ni// dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i sngon du bstan// sngon dang mthun pa ma yin pa'i//
209b1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po kun gyi gtor ma bshad// na mkhag khams kyi dbus gnas bAr// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya// shar gyi 'dab mar dbang po bsam// lho ru thar byed dgod par bya// nub kyi 'dab mAr chu bdag ste// byang du gnod sbyin
209b2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin no// me yi mtshams la me chen po// bden bral du ni srin po'i bdag/ rlung du gnas med bsam par bya// dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i bdag/ nyi zla tshangasa~M pa la sogaso dang // tshangs pa'i rigs ni dam pa dang // tshangs po
209b3(rgyud 'grel): bdun na 'don pa dang // dga' bral mtha' bral gnas pa dang // yang dag par byung rgyal chen dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang byed nyid dang ni// 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang // gnas gtsang ma na gnas pa dang // bde ba can
209b4(rgyud 'grel): na gnas pa dang // 'og min tu ni gnas pa dang / 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten khams// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa rnams// de dag thams cad stong du 'god// chos kyi 'byung gnas ngan spong ba// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang /
209b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs mtha' yas nor rgyal bu// 'jog po dang ni rigs ldan dang // pad chen pad+ma bzung ba dang // lha mini sems can dmyal ba rnams// chos 'byung smad du bsam par bya// oM las tshangs pa la sogs s+ho/
209b6(rgyud 'grel): hUM las brgya byin la sogs pa// AM las stobs kyi rgyu la sogs// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa'o// steng gi lha rnams dkar po che// dbang po la sogs nag po ste// stobs kyi rgya sogs dmar po che// rang mtshungs
210a1(rgyud 'grel): rigs mas yan la 'khyud// lag na rdo rje dril bu bcas// g.yas brkyang ba yis stan la gnas// tshangs sngogs brtog pas phyag rgyas gdab// mchod sbyin brgya sogs rdo rje yis// stobs kyi rgyu so
210a2(rgyud 'grel): gar dbang gis// thams cad rigs gsum las skyes pa'o// dkar mos dgug par byas nas ni// chom rkun ma yis zhags pas bcings// ro langs ma yi lcags sgrog bsdam// za phod ma yis dril bus dgyes// de nas
210a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod yon zhabs bsil sbyin// rgyo gas gtor ma bsgrub par bya// rlung dang e yaM dkyil 'khor la// A las byung ba'i byad snong bsam// 'bar ba dang ni spros pa yis// bdud rtsi lnga ni bsgrub par bya// cha yis
210a4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur ba 'di bsgoms nas/ oM gyis byin gyis brlabs la btang // oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma NAM Ad+hi nut+pan+na twAta/ oM AHhUM phaT swAhA/ de nas mnyes par byas gshegasu gsol bar bya ste/ oM badz+ra satwa sa
210a5(rgyud 'grel): ya ma nu pA lA ya/ badz+ra s+yAt+pa tre no pa tiSh+Tha/ Ti D+ho me b+hA ba/ su d+yo Sh+yo me b+hA ba// suM pe Sh+yo me b+ha be/ a nu rUk+ShA mi b+ha baM/ sarba sid d+him+l-i pra yats+tshe/ sarba karma su tsa mo/ tsit+taM shre yaHku ru hUM ha ha ha ho ho b+ha ga wan/ sarba ta
210a6(rgyud 'grel): ga tA badz+re mA med muny+dzu badz+rI b+hA ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa AHmuH'od dag ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'i cho ga'o// / rab tu gnas dang sbyin sreg dag/ dkyil 'khor yan lag nyid kyi phyir// dkyil 'tsha
210b1(rgyud 'grel): rjes su rab gnas dang // sbyin sreg gnyi ga bstan par bya// skye bzang blo ldan 'jig rten dang // mi 'gal bar ni las kun byed// de nyid bcu shes slob dpon ni// rab gnas byed par 'os pa yin// legs 'thas sa ni/
210b2(rgyud 'grel): rnam lnga yis// byug pa me tig gis brgyan po// zla ro gdugs dkar ba dan dang // mang po rnams kyis yang dag mdzes// bdug sdes 'atul ba dro zhim pa'i// yid 'phrog pa yi rab gnas sar// bzar skyur bzung /
210b3(rgyud 'grel): ga la 'am// sgrib dpon tshul bzhin gos bgos bgrong// de shUl rkang rgyun dpung rgyun dang // rna ba'i rgyan dang gzung dru rnams// bya skye mdun sor gladub tsam// ma sha lAs ni chung bya bya// sgra gzugs ras ris glags
210b4(rgyud 'grel): bum rnams// dwe nr-i dzi snyed rgyun gyis brgyan// bdag nyid lhag pa'i ltar sbyor bas// mdun du byas naste lkog gnas kyi// dang bar zhig rigs 'dzin pas// dril bu dkro pA lA bairtso no byed cing // g.yas pa rdo rje ga
210b5(rgyud 'grel): byed la// dzI bAshrIn+d+ra tshugasau gtor ma sbyin/ ba yi lnga dang shun pags // ji lta dag ni khyod par gyis// sku dang ldan pa bak+ku byas nas// mchod yin la sogs ston bzhin sbyin// slar yang rnal 'byor de nyid kyis//
210b6(rgyud 'grel): po krus la 'di ni byin gyis brlabs// yul dang dus deng shes pa yis// dgongs po lhag par gnas pa/ gi chu mas gos sa / thog phrab cheg chag btab pa'i cha // sku gzugs la sogs ba zhugs
211a1(rgyud 'grel): la/ yan lag drug gi sa bsgrub byas sgra// dzaM bzhin sbya ru de dmigs te// tshogs bcad dag gis lha rnams sku// namakhar spyan drangs yang dag mtshud// de ltar 'di ni lcug gnas bya// ji ltar
211a2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dga' ldan du ni rab tu gnas// lha mo sgyu 'phrul lhums zhugs ltar// de bzhin sku 'dir bzhugs par mdzod// rtag tu 'dor gnas mgon po rnams// me tog spros la sogs pa 'di//
211a3(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems ni rab 'phel phyir// rjes su brtse bas gzung du gsol// yang dag mchod la de nas bstod// de yis d+he su sbyang bya zhing // de nas rab tu bsrung bya ba// 'di ni lhag par gnas pa yin// mi bskyod rdo rje
211a4(rgyud 'grel): ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkhas chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje dbyangs la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po// rang bzhin 'od gsol mchog
211a5(rgyud 'grel): gi mchog/ ston pa rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// rin chen rgyal po rab tu zab// rdo rje na mkha' dri med mkha'// rang bzhin dag pa gos med pa// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che// mAM rtog na mkha'i
211a6(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chagos pha rol phyin pa brnyes// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// don yod rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// dag pa'i ngo bo nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa'
211b1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal bstod// g.yas pa rdo rje gsor byed cing // g.yon pa dril bu gzung byas te// ji bzhin don ni rab shes pas// tshigs bcad 'di lnga'i glu yis bstod// 'di dag ni lha lhag par gnas pa'o// nag pa'i rtsa ba
211b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs spangs pa// mgrin pa ring la lto po che// rdo rgyus dkar btags chu yos byugs// kha ru yal ga bzang pos brgyan// rin chen 'bru sman nang du bzhug/ rigs kyis mtshan mas mtshan pa ste// rgyal ba
211b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi yis mtshan ma yis// gdong pa'i log bzhi ldan par byas// mdzes pa'i gos kyis mgul dkris pa// rnam par rgyal ba'i bum par bzhed// gzhan yang de dang 'dra mod kyi// chung ba rigs mtshan re re yin// hUM bdun bzlas
211b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i snal ma bdun// bsgril ba'i srad bu dkar po ni// me tog phreng ba mgul du mdud// tsan dan dkar dri'i chur bcug la// dam por lhag par gnas par bya// lag pas phreng ba'i sna bzung lha// rdo rje'i dbus bcings
211b5(rgyud 'grel): steng du gzhag/ bdag po'i bsgom la 'di yis ni// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// bum pa brgyad po gzhan rnams kyi// dkyil 'khor ltar bskor bskor byas la// de mtshan bdag po'i gsang sngags kyis//
211b6(rgyud 'grel): brgya las brgyad lhag pa ru bzla// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gsang sngags kyi// bum pa bcu par 'ba' shag bzla// gang phyir bdag po nges med pa// gzhan rnams kyi ni gsang sngags brjod// oM d+ha ra d+ha ra d+hA ra ya trA
212a1(rgyud 'grel): d+hA rA ya/ mar+d+ha mar+tha/ badz+ra d+h+r-i ka A d+hI ShASh+Ta/ oM sh+tsA sh+tsA ta I d+he hi dzi nA dzaM ka U d+h+r-i tiSh+ThA/ oM badz+nyA sar+yA tAm+bo b+hi d+ha m+b+ha na sa m+b+ha yas+t+re hA rAt+na d+h+r-ika a d+hA tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra d+har+m+ma sam+b+ha yas+t+ra hU lu hu wa A ro l-ika/
212a2(rgyud 'grel): a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ o phu phu phu/ hi hI hi pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika a d+hi tiSh+Ta/ AM mo ha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Ta/ oM dwe Sha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM rA ga ra ti oM d+hI tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra ra ti a d+hi tiSh+TAM/ sangs rgyas lhag par gnas pa'i sar// bum pa 'di rnams
212a3(rgyud 'grel): mchod byas nas/ mkhas pa rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// gtor ma byin la bsdu bar bya// zhes bya ba ni bum pa lhag par gnas pa'o// de nas lhag par khang pa las// shin tu ring ba ma yin par// gru bzhi khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la/
212a4(rgyud 'grel): dpangs su khru do'i tshad du bya// sa rdo 'am so phags las bsgrubs pa// bkra shis yan lag gis nyer mdzes// shin tu 'thas par brdungs pa yis// stegs bu bzang po mkhas pas bya// 'dir ni lha ni shar bltas
212a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhag/ de la mngon phyogs 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rnyil bu 'chang gyur pas// gtor ma sbyin bya de rjes su// rang snying sa bon bsgom byas te// mkha' bzhugs sangs rgyus nang du bzhugs// ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yIs//
212a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa'i lha ma ri mo bzhin skyes// dza hUM ba~M hoH'di dag las// sgra srung bani ni spro bar bya// de yis dgug bzhug la sogs pa'i// las rnams bzhi pa bye ba yin// gsau ser g.yogs la shar mdun ba ston// bdag nyid ma
212b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs de rjes su// stegs bu'i gdan la bzhugs pa yis// sku gzugs rim pas khrus gsol bya// bris sku glegs bam lder so sogs// lha rnams cha ga rig pa yis// me long la ni gzugs brnyan bkra// de las gzhan/
212b2(rgyud 'grel): pa gzugs nyid yin// dag phyir khar ba'i snod gzhag pa'i// baM yis lnga yis dang po ru// kha nA so gsang sngags bzlos bzhin du// lha la khrus gsol bya ba yin// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA// ngur ba'i chun btsa
212b3(rgyud 'grel): rtse mo yi// pir gyis khar ba'i snod bzhag pa'i// dri zhim mar khu byug bya zhing // sngags pas de yis gsang sngags brjod// oM hUM traM hri khi/ de nasna mar khro bsal ba'i phyir// shun pags lnga btags pas rab byug/ lha la
212b4(rgyud 'grel): yi bdag nyid kyis// yang na khrus gsol bya ba yin// khar ba'i snod na gnas pa yi// sngon bstan dri zhim lnga rnams kyis// phyogs la gong gi gsang sngags ni// zlos bzhin pa yis sku khrus gsol// bkra shis glu dang
212b5(rgyud 'grel): rol mo dang // gar sogs mdzes pa du mo bya// rgyal ba dbang bskur phran tshogs ltar// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni// sprin ma la sogs pas bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs kun phyag bsnams pa'i// bam+b+ha pa bdud
212b6(rgyud 'grel): rtsi'i chus gang ba'i// ting 'dzin mchog giso mkhas pas bkru// ji ltar bltam pa tsam gyis ni// de bzhin gshegs kun khrus gsol ba// lha yis chu ni dag pa yis// de bzhin bdag gis khrus gsol lo// oM sarba ta
213a1(rgyud 'grel): thA gA tA a b+hi She ka sa mA yA shri ye AHhUM/ sku khrus gsol ba'i sngagaso// ma sha ka las mI chung bya'i// graser gyi thur myas rdul tshon las// mig sman mI mang ba blangs te// 'di dag gis ni spyan dbye
213a2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ oM tsak+Shu sa man+ta tsak+Shu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA// gos kyi chu ni phyi byas te// gnas khang yin par bstan bzhugs la// lha yi 'khor lo re re la'ang // gos ni zung zung dbul bar bya// oM badz+ra wA sa saM swA hA/ gos dbul ba'i sngargas
213a3(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bsil zhab bsil 'thor 'thung dang // mchod yon phul nas de rjes su// sbyang ba byas pa'i mtha' ma ru// mchod pa rgya chen bya ba yin// e ma puSh+pa shu pa dra bya// shu tsa yaM ku tsaM yo nA ma/ ya ma nI bi to// baMg+h+nAM pra
213a4(rgyud 'grel): Ni gr-ih+Na pra sid+d+hi me/ ba nasmA tI sa ra hri de ga na d+ha d+hA pa mu d+hA ma/ yA ma ni bi ri to bak+Sh+ya/ pr-i ti gr-ih+NA pra sad+be/ rAk+Sho g+ha sh+tsa pa pi trash+tsa/ ta mau b+hi d+ha mA nA su b+ha/ ma ya ni bi d+h+waM taM b+hak+Sha pra ti gr-ih+Na pra sid+d+he/ sa ha dz+nyA saM shro ga ki shud+d+ho gan+d+ha
213a5(rgyud 'grel): b+hAb+ha Na DiR+Ya Na/ yaM ma ya ni bi de t+yo b+hub+d+ha pra sa dA mI nai bai d+ye sarba saM yA g+haM/ kha dA b+h+r-i dzA sa man+t+ri taM/ kharni gran d+hi rA so bi taM da d+ha mi pra ti gr-ih+Na te/ oM dzaM saM swA hA/ 'bras bu thams cad dbul ba'i sngagaso// oM pra tIts+tsha ar+g+haM hUM sAhA/
213a6(rgyud 'grel): mchod pa dbul ba'i sngags// rdo rje dril bu gsor byed pa// phyag na rdo rje mtshungs nyid kyis// bkra shis tshigs bcad glu blangs nas// sangs rgyas rnams la gtor ma dbul// Na ma hUM kA ra ne bu ru/ se dza~M baM sid+d+ha ud+d+hi ru/
213b1(rgyud 'grel): A.Any+dzuk+Sh+mam+b+hats+tsha snru r+m+mAn smya sa s+yar+b+ba r+m+maN+Dam+b+har+m+ma ny+dzanA/ ut+kaR+sha/ hAr+Na N+ya kAn swA d+ha smug+sa NA d+harmA d+hAr+m+ma d+hA nA bAn+d+ha/ DU DUm+b+ha r+m+ma ga/
213b2(rgyud 'grel): oM A~M kaR+ShA na r+thA rmA/ N+Din d+h+ye t+yen ts+tsha d+han d+hiHr+m+ma/ b+hU phyugs smrab bsreg ste b+h+ring bIr d+ha'o// di dag ni rab tu gnas pa'i tshig// rash+tsa g+han+d+hes l-I so \u0f7fsu~M l-i ni/ ma ngon du rnyeng mnas // chog ma~M rlu sa
213b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams// sprin srog gis ni rtag smai par bya// ba~Msgruba~M byA mang ba'i dbye ba yis// sbyin sgrog gis ni rtogs par bya// bsgrub bya mang po'i dbye ba yis// sbyin sreg rnam pa myang bar 'gyur// gzhung mangs pa yis
213b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i phyir// mdor bsdus tsam zhig 'odar bsten byo// stegs dang phyag rgyas thaM yis// dang por sa ni sbyang bar bya// log pa gA yas pa brkyang byas la// rdo rjer bsgom la sa la gdab// aM hA na tA na kr-i d+hA hUM prAT+Ta/
213b5(rgyud 'grel): sasbyang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// thab khung rgya ru khru tshad tsam// de yo byed tsam zabasu bya// de nas gzhi dang kha khyor te// phyi ru rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// gzhi ni ge sar bcas pa ste// kha khyer chu skyes me tog+ha can/
213b6(rgyud 'grel): tshe ni sor bani zin no// zhing ring dbangs dag kun tu mnyam/ 'kho'i mo ron cher bang ral gro/ thakhung dbus su rdo rje ste// dbus kyi gang la sor gcig la// chu ru sor brgyad bri bar byo// ni la rdul chen dag
214a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ rgyas la rdul tshon ser pos byas// dbang la dmar ba gzhan dag la// nag po 'am rnam pa lnga nyid do// las kyi dbye bas phyogs dbye ste// dus dbye ba'ang brtag pa yin// de yi phyogs dang de yi dus//
214a2(rgyud 'grel): de 'dra'i las la mkhas pas dpyad// sngags pas byang du mngon bltas la// zhi ba'i las ni yang dag brtsam// rgyas la rtag tu shar du yin// mngon spyad la ni lho ru ste// dbang la nub tu bshad pa yin// dgug dang
214a3(rgyud 'grel): bskrad la de bzhin no// zhi ba rgongs mo bya ba ste// rgyas la nang par bya ba yin// gdug pa'i las ni nyi phyed la// mtshan mo'i phyed na dbang sogs bya// mchod sbyin shing gi lcug ma yin// rtse mo'i cha na ma nyams pa// bzang
214a4(rgyud 'grel): po la ma gnyis ldan pa// las kyi dbye bas dbye bar bya// rgyas pa l-i ni sngor bcu bzhi// zhi ba sor bcu gnyis pa// dbang soro bcu sdang ba dang // bskrad pa la yang sor mo brgyad// 'bru dang yam shing la sogasA nyid// bas
214a5(rgyud 'grel): nas g.yas pa'i zur du ni// ji lta bor ni bzhog bya ste// d+h+r-i kun sngags kyi mngon par bzla// lcug gnyis khu tshur sbyar byas te// gung mo gnyis nr-i rabA tu brkyang // rdzas thams cad sbyang ba'i phyag yin no// oM shrI swA hA/ mar
214a6(rgyud 'grel): sbyang ba'i sngagaso// oM swA hA/ rdzas bkru ba'i sngagaso// oM dz+riM swA hA/ 'bru sbyang ba'i sngags// oM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rdzas gzhan sbyang ba'i sngags// oM a swA hA/ yam shing sbyang po'i sngags yin no// sbyin sreg yan lag
214b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung shing // thab khyang bas thub thab khung gzhug/ ting nge 'dzin gyi me sbyar la// yid kyis mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin// de ni se sor srung ba ste// bsam gtan las byung sku mnga' ba// de la zhabs bsil zhal bsil
214b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'thor 'thung mchod yon rim bzhin dbul// ha cang ring min rtse ma nyams// shar bltas g.yas bskor ku shwa dgram// rtse mo phyogs gcig bstan byas te// kha khyer steng du bzhug par bya// tsan dan a ka ru
214b3(rgyud 'grel): shing ngam// gzhan yang dri yis shing dag gis// sbyin sreg bya phyir rlung yab kyis// me ni s+pharU ba byas nas kyang // gzi brjid bskyed cing mtshan ma brtag/ me yi dbus su pad+ma dang // nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bsgom
214b4(rgyud 'grel): la/ de nas yang ni spyan drang bya// spyan gsum zhal bzhi phyag bzhi'i lha// gsus chen ral pa'i thor tshugs can// g.yas na mchog sbyin phreng ba ste// g.yon na dbyug pa spyi blug so// las dang rjes mthun kha dog can
214b5(rgyud 'grel): ra yi skye gnas las byung bsgom// oM I hUM ma hA b+hU ta dwe bo r-i Shi dI dza satwA ma hU ti/ mahA rA sne na san+ni hi to b+ha ba/ spyan drang ba'i tshigs bcad do// mchod yon zhabasu bsil dbul byas lnga// spros khang yongs su gzung
214b6(rgyud 'grel): byas to// 'dod don dngos grub rtogs bya'i phyir// dam tshig yang dag brjod parar bya// oM badz+ra a ni la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya sarba b+hasmin ku ru sarba dr-iSh+Ta hUM phaT/ dr-i sh+ya we hUM baM ho saM mo ya ste/ sa ma ya hoHdam tshig
215a1(rgyud 'grel): su bcad pa'o// dgang gzar blugs gzar bzang po yi// rdo rjes mtshan par sa bon bsgom// lag pa g.yas gzung byas te// pus mos bar du gnas byas nas// sku gsung byin gyis brlabs byas
215a2(rgyud 'grel): b+ha/ rang rig lha yi cod pan can// rtse gsum rdo rjer ldan pa'i lce// me yi sa la bsreg blugs dbul// oM Ag+na ye swA hA/ mar gyi'o// oM sarba pA pa da na badz+ra ya badz+ra satwa s+yA sarba pA pa~M da ha na swAhA// til nag po'i'o//
215a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA// 'bras mA chags pa'i'o// oM sarba si ba de swA hA// zho dung zas mchog gi'o// oM badz+ra bi dza ye swA hA/ 'bras so ba'i 'o// oM ma hA be gA yA swA hA/ nas kyi'o// oM ma hA ba lAM ya swA hA/ mon sran
215a4(rgyud 'grel): gre'u'o// oM badz+ra g+hasmai rI swA hA/ gro'i'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dur ba gzhon nu'i'o// oM A pra ti hA ta badz+ra ye swA hA/ ku shu'i 'o// oM badz+rA ya swAhA/ u dum+b+hi raM'i 'o// oM bo d+hi brik+Sha ya swAhA/ a shwatrUM'i'o//
215a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra la tha ya swA hA/ pa lak+Sha'i'o// oM badz+ra ku ru bai ra ya swA hA/ n+ya gr-i d+ha'i 'o// oM sa ta ka rA ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o// blugs gzir mgo nas lag gAyas kyis// brta ni par gzung bya dgang gzar gyis// kha
215a6(rgyud 'grel): mthar thug blugs gzar gyis// mar gyi rgyun gyis dbang po'o// cig cer dgong gzar blugs gzar gyis// slar yang lan ni gsum gsum du// gang ba'i sreg blugs sbyin bya ba// kun nos ji ltar nus pas so//
215b1(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba la 'di thun mong ste// rgyas pa la'ang de nyid bstan// dbang la sogs pa'i las gzhan la// sregs blugs gzhan ni sbyin par bya// raM bam ni gnyis sam gsum// zhi dang rgyas pa byed pa gang // gzhung mangs pas ni 'jigs pa yis//
215b2(rgyud 'grel): cung zad mdor bsdus brjod par bya// oM pad+ma rA ga ag+ne a pr-i Na ya/ a nu ka s+ya shAM ti ku ru swA hA/ mar dang lhan cig pad+mo'i'o// oM g+ha g+ha g+ha ta ya te dze rA dzA pr-i Na shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ 'o ma dang lhan cig ut+pa la'i 'o// oM su puSh+pa ku le ba
215b3(rgyud 'grel): dz+wa la ni shrIn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ gur+ya gum dang wAnA cig ku mu ta'i'o// oM d+harma d+harmA rA dze/ da ha da hA sarba big+h+na shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ tsan dan dang ni lhan cig sih+la'i'o// oM kI li su kau li ka lArti sarba pA paM da ha a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/
215b4(rgyud 'grel): dri zhim pa'i tilka mar dang lhan cig kA ra bi rA'i'o// rgyas la a mra arka dang // kaN+Da pa lA bil+la dang // u dum+ba rA rdzas lnga rnams// sngags pas sngags 'di sbyin sreg bya// oM ga ga ni ga ga na bi lo ki te hUM phaT/ te dz+r-i r-I dza
215b5(rgyud 'grel): a mu ka s+ya puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ kha dog dri dang me yi lce// gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa yi// yon bdag dge dang mi dge ba// sreg thugs bsregs pas me pr-i brtag/ zhi la kha dog dkar 'bar ba// rgyas la ser po'i rnam
215b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ dbong la mngon spyod dag la ni// dmar dang nag pa'i me sngagaso// dbang po'i gzhu 'dra bzang po ste// g.yasu 'khyil pa mchog yin// rdza rnga'i sgra ltar zab pa dang // me lce snum zhing rtse gcig sngags// me stag rnam
216a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phro du ba mang // rim gyis ldang zhing khad kyis 'bar// mtha' mar rang 'bar gzi brjid can// tshu zhing 'od zer 'phro ba dang // rtse gsum zhib ma 'dra ba nyid// de bzhin ba lang mgo 'dra ba// de la sogs
216a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mtshan ngan pa// mi dge rnams kyang brtags par bya// sbyin sreg mtha' ru bsdu ba la// me tog spos sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// phul te bstod la 'bar ba'i me// tshigs bcad 'di yis gshegs su gsol//
216a3(rgyud 'grel): rang gi don dang gzhan gyi don// byin za khyod kyis bsgrubs kyis gshegs// de bzhin dus su slar gshegs te// bdag gis dngos grub thams cad mdzod// 'di ni ye shes ma dgyes te// rdo rje 'chang ba
216a4(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dgyes// rtag pa yis ni rgyal ba dgyes// gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang // pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dgyes// rta mchog rgyal po dgyes par 'gyur// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug che//

216a6(rgyud 'grel): lho min mi dam ci// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa dang // rgyal po chen po gang gnas dang // 'thab bral dang ni dga' ldan na// gnas pa yi ni lha rnams dang // 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang //

218a1(rgyud 'grel): byung po thams can pa'i gtar ma'i cha ga bzhugs/
218b1(rgyud 'grel): rgya gar skad du/ ba li sUd+g+ha b+hU ta/ bod skad du/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma/ dpal kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshalo// e paM rnam par nges bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje sems dpar phyag 'tshal nas// bgegs

218b3(rgyud 'grel): ba oM AHhUM// rim par lha chen brgyad dang ni// phyogs skyong brgyad dang klu chen brgyad// pad+ma'i mdog bzhin bskyod bya ste// shar du dbang phyug chen po bskyed// lhor ni dbang po bsam par bya// nub tu tshangs pa bskyed bya ste// byang
218b4(rgyud 'grel): phyogs su ni khyab 'jug go/ shar lhor 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ste// lho nub tshogs kyi bdag po ste// b+h+r-i gi ri tI nub byang du// byang shar gzhon nu karti ka'o// shar gyi 'dab mar brgya byin bsam// lhor ni mthar byed dgod par

219a1(rgyud 'grel): g.yas brkyang ba yis bzhugs// rang gi thugs ka'i sa bon las// 'od zer lcags kyu ltar spros nas// lha brgyad dag lnga gzugs khams dang // gzugs med pa yi lha bsdu'o// 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang
219a2(rgyud 'grel): maM/ phyogs skyong brgyad la rab tu bsdu// ngan song gsum dang lha ma yin// klu chen brgyad la bsdu bar bya'o// rang bzhin gnas na gzhugs pa yi// dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bya ba'i phyir// gau rI yis ni dgug byas la// chom rkun
219a3(rgyud 'grel): ma ni zhags pas 'ching // ro langasau mas ni lcags sgrogs sdom// dril bus mnyes byed zad phod ma'o// rnal 'byor pa yis thugs ka nas// 'od zer lcags kyi ltar spros pas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba sras bcas dgug/
219a4(rgyud 'grel): de la phyi nang gsang bas mchod// de dag gis na dbang bskur mthar// rang rig bdag pos dbu rgyan pa// lha chen brgyad la brtag pa yis// rdo rje yis ni phyogs skyong brgyad// gar dbang gis ni klu brgyad do// de nas cho gas
219a5(rgyud 'grel): g+hato ro ma bsgrub// rlung dang me yi dkyil 'khor la// oM las byung ba'i pad snod bsam+b+ha// bruM aM d+hi khA hUM/ go k+Sha dA ha nA las yin// sangs rgyas lnga dang sems tsAn lha// zla bA nyi m+b+ha'i dbus suM bsam// nyi dbus hUM bas
