286b2(rgyud 'grel): rig pa 'di yon te/ chos nyid ni khyab par byed pa ste/ de nyid chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba bde ba chen po'i rang bzhi no// bde ba chen po de nyid kyis chos thams cad khyab pa ste/ chos rnams dang chos nyid de la de'i
286b3(rgyud 'grel): bdag nyid kyi 'brel pa yod pas rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po thams cad bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du grub pa kho na yino// ji skad du chos las chos nyid tha mi dad pa yin no zhes gsungs// 'o na gal te de ltar yin na sgom
286b4(rgyud 'grel): ba don med pa yin no zhe na/ smras pa blo bur bI'i dri ma rnam par dag pa'i dbye ba de la yod pa ma yin te/ sgom pa don med pa ma yin no// 'di tsam gyis ni mnyam par bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor bstan to// langs nas kyang nga
286b5(rgyud 'grel): po thams cad zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis pa mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis pa bstan to// 'dir yang sngar bshad pa'i brjod par bya ba kho na yin te bshad zin to// srog chags thams cad bdag
286b6(rgyud 'grel): las 'byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rgyud las 'byung ba'i tshigasu bcad pa gnyis 'das ma thag tu bshad pa'i don dang rje su mthun pa kho na yin te gzhan du bshad par mi bya'o// ldang ba'i rnal 'byor ni mnyam par ma gzhag
287a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i rnal 'byor ro// yang dang yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni rnal 'byor gnyis po la yang rgyun ma chad pa nyid bstan to// chu bo'i rgyun ni rgyu ba bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigasu bcad pas de kho na nyid kyi rnal
287a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor gsum pa bstan to// ji ltar chu bo'i rgyun ma chad par chu'i rgyun rnams rgyu ba de bzhin du chu ba dang / mar me'i snang ba'i rgyun rgyu ba dang / mar me'i snang ba'i rgyun rgyu ba de bzhin du/ de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis gnas par bya ba ni/
287a3(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor dang 'dra ba par byed pa'o// rang bzhin gyis de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor gyis dus thams cad du rnal 'byor pas gnas par bya'o zhes ston to// de gang gi phyir de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor ma shes pas mnyam par bzhog pa'i
287a4(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor ni mnyam par mo bzhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang 'dra bar 'gyur te/ de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor shes pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod lam bzhi rang bzhin gyis lus ngag yid
287a5(rgyud 'grel): kyi las gang yang rung ba byed na de dag thams cad de rnams la gnyisu med pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin du 'gyuraro// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di zhes bya ba la sogs pa nye bar bsdu ba'i tshigasu bcad pa de go sla'o// sa dang
287a6(rgyud 'grel): chu dang me dang ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigasu bcad pa gnyis kyis mthong ba'i chos las 'gyur ba'i phan yin bstan to// de ni rnal 'byor 'di'i gnas skabs kyi dbye ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'das ma thag tu bshad
287b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas skabs kyi dbye ba rnam pa bzhi ru bstan pa yin te/ 'dir gal te lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor ngo bo gcig yin pa'i phyir de la gnas skabs kyi dbye ba yod pa ma yin te/ 'on kyang de la brten pa'i
287b2(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pa la rim gyis de dang de'i rnam pa snang ba'i phyir gnas skabs kyi dbye ba bstan to// de gang gi phyir rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor slob bzhin pas ro lhan cig skyes pa'i ro gcig pa yin na yang / dang po
287b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyin la bu mthong ba yino// de bzhin du gong nas gong du ri mo pa rtogs par bya'o// ngo bo gcig pa yin na yang / sna tshogs pa'i snang bas 'jig rten la snang bar 'gyur te/ dper na dri ma dang bcas pa dang / dri ma med pa'i
287b4(rgyud 'grel): mig ga dbang po dang ldan pa'i skyes bu rnams kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mi gsal ba dang / gsal ba lta bu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin yod pa ma yin te/
287b5(rgyud 'grel): snang ba 'ba' zhig pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro// de bas na slob bzhin rnal 'byor pa'i bya bas rnal 'byor gyi gnas skabs kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin no// 'di nyid bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ dngos grub mngon du sprin lta bu'i zhes bya ba
287b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa gsungs te/ re zhig dang po bla ma mnyes par byas pa'i slob mos dkyil 'khor la zhugs pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi phyag rgya 'am/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sbyor bas cho ga bzhin du shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang
288a1(rgyud 'grel): thob par mdor bstan pa dang rgyas par bstan pa'i bla mas slob ma la gang gi tshe lhan cig skyes pa nye bar mtshon pa de'i tshe de la dngos grub kyi sngon gyis gnas skabs yino// de gang gi phyir dbang bskur
288a2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i dus su slob ma de yis lhan cig skyes pa nye bar mtshon pa yin te/ sngon du ni ma byas// gal te sngon du byas ni slar yang sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i gnas skabs la rim pa bzhin du ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen
288a3(rgyud 'grel): nga / las kyi phyag rgya dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i sgom pa don med par 'gyur ba'i phyi ro// gal te mtshon par mi 'gyur na de'i sgom pa mi rig pa'i phyir ro// de bas na sprin lta bu ni gang gi tshe las kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi
288a4(rgyud 'grel): phyag rgya'i sbyor bas slob ma dang la bla mas dbang bskur ba de'i tshe shes par bya'o// sprin lta bu la dpe sngon du 'gro ba'i dam tshogs bshad par bya ba'i phyir/ sprin srab par bkab pa la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te/ ji ltar
288a5(rgyud 'grel): slob po'i sprin gyis bkab pa'i zla ba rgyas pa cung zad mthong bar 'gyur te/ shin tu gsal bar mthong ba ma yino// de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa yang dngos grub kyi mngon du ni slob bzhin po'i gnas skabasu mi gsal ba snang
288a6(rgyud 'grel): bar 'gyur te/ sprin lta bu nyid du bstan no// 'grub na sgyu ma lta bu'i zhes bya ba la sngar nye bar mtshon pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid rgyun ma chad pa rtag tu dad pas bsgom zhing mngon du gyur pa'i dngos grub gang /
288b1(rgyud 'grel): yin pa de la 'gyur ba lta bu ni ji ltar nor bu dang / sman dang sngags kyi mthu las 'byung ba'i sgyu ma so sor snang ba med na yang mthong bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du yid kyis sprul pa'i rig ma'i stobs ni ye shes kyis phyag rgya'i sbyor bas
288b2(rgyud 'grel): ye shes gsal bar 'char bar 'gyur te/ sgyu ma lta bu nyid so sor bstan to// de nas rmi laM dang 'dra ba ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ji ltar kha cig gnyid log pas rnam par mi rtog pa nyam su myong ba de bzhin du nang gi bdag
288b3(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi thabs dang shes rab rnam par rol pa bsgom par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya chen po bsgoms nas rnal 'byor gyi gnyid log par cig car du lhan cig skyes pa nyam su myong ba yin pas rmi lam dang 'dra ba
288b4(rgyud 'grel): bstan to// de nas rmi lam sad pa lta bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa phyi rol gyi rig ma nI las dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya ma gnyis// phyag rgya gnyis kyi sbyor ba las byung ba'i phyir snang ba lta bu yin no// rnam par mI rtog pa'i chu
288b5(rgyud 'grel): nyid la mngon du byas pas rang gi lus dang shos rab ma'i lus yod na yang mi dmigs pa'i phyir rmi lam lta bu'o// g.yeng po'i rgyu yod na yang zhes bya ba la g.yeng ba'i rgyu ni phyag rgya gnyis kyi mtshan nyid// rmi lam
288b6(rgyud 'grel): dang sang pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa la g.yeng ba'i rgyu yod na yang brtan pa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i phyir sems 'ong bar mo 'gyur te/ 'on kyang de'i dam tshig ni phyag rgya'i sbyor ba zhes bya ba
289a1(rgyud 'grel): yin no// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa nyid ni de'i sdom pa'o// de ltar dam tshig dang sdom pa'i sbyor ba yod pas tha ma thams cad las mchog tu gyur pa yin no// dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang
289a2(rgyud 'grel): dang po sprin bzhin snang ba ste// 'grub na sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur// cig car du ni rmi lam 'dra// rmi lam sad pa tha mi dang // tha mi dad pa'i mtshan nyid 'grub// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor rab tu 'grub ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
289a3(rgyud 'grel): so/ shin tu zab pa'i dgyes pa'i rdo rje la sa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'dis ni slob dpon gyi rang bzo yongasu spangs pas bdag gis rab tu byed pa 'di byas pa yin tau zhes bya ba dang / bsod nams yongasu bste/
289a4(rgyud 'grel): bab bstan pa ste/ de yang go sla'o// lhan skyes rnal 'byor dam pa la// 'grel pa byas nas dge bya gang // bdag gis bsags pa de yis ni// 'jig rten lhan skyes rtse gcig 'gyur// gang zhig brjod bya rjod byed blo yi
289a5(rgyud 'grel): dpyod yul min// gti mug tshogs kyi mtshan mo sol byed nyi ma gang // rang bdog snang bas phyogs kyi dbye ba yongs bkang ba// lhan skyes na mkha' zla ba rdzogs 'dra de la 'dud// mkhas pa chen po rin chen 'byung
289a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas zhi ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i 'grel pa snying po rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ o D+ya Na kyi slob dpon chen po bram ze tha kha nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
289b1(rgyud 'grel): paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po man+ta ka la ku sha'i zhal snga nas bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAM he badz+ra tat+tA tsa turma ma sA d+ha naM nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom
289b2(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das dgyes pa'i rdo rje'i sgrub pa'i thabs/ de kho na nyid bzhi'i rim pa zhes bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshalo// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med he ru ka/ bdag med lha mo bcas la phyag 'tshal nas/
289b3(rgyud 'grel): de nyid thob cing dang dang skal po yod pa la// de nyid bzhi yis rim pa bri bar bya// snying rje chen pos 'gro la dang por blta// gso sbyong dag nas rgyud rnams rim pas sbyangs// rgyud 'di'i dkyil 'khor zhugs shing dbang
289b4(rgyud 'grel): dag blangs// de nyid shes shing bkas gnang gnas bzhi bsgom// dur khrod la sogs dben dang nyams dga' bar// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gdan la legs gnas pa// bdag dang rnal 'byor gnas gsum bskyang ba ni//
289b5(rgyud 'grel): dang po'i bdud rtsi lnga sogs khrus byas la// tshad med bzhi bsgom lha dang bdag nyid blta// bsrung ba rak+Sha brjod nas dru gur bya// legs gnas rten la bdud rtsi sgron ma lnga// me tog l-i sogs mchod dang gtor ma bta
289b6(rgyud 'grel): zhing skyes sogs dang legs sbyangs rigs ma dang // grogs bzangs rten dang gcig pu dogs med sgrub// bdag nyid snying ga'i sa bon hUM nag las// 'od zer lnga spros bskul sbyangs na mkha' bsten// bla ma dgyes rdor
290a1(rgyud 'grel): 'thor lo spyan d+ha m+b+ha smra// ga bzhin lags bsgoms phyug 'tshal la sogs bya// rang cad nAg spro bsta rtsa dang nAng // gsang ba'i lha mo rnams kyis rim par mchud go n+te dkAr mA ri dgas
290a2(rgyud 'grel): nam pan// tsa nr-i dmar mo rang 'ab+h+ring me tog thogs// ber+d+ha lA~M ni ser mo na chags m+b+ha/ g+has+thA nA ljang gAs bA spyan yang 'dzin// br-iH sIts+tsha phyug nA sha smA tshugs// shi bA nI dkar sna tshogs ra mi prAga~M/ tsat+tA lA~M d+hamyu
290a3(rgyud 'grel): dang rin chen tshogs// na gI sgra gsum bde ba chen pos mchod// Ti ba~M phyag rgya rang gi sku lo'i b+h+rid // de kho na nyid myi chod pa gnyis med// sdig shugs yi rang bsngo dang lus dbuli dang // lam bstan pa dang gis
290a4(rgyud 'grel): gdab pa dang / tshad med bzhi bsgom ga shweg+nas d+ha N+yes lha// chos rnams sgyu ma rang sems rdul dang bral// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na bodz+nyA swA b+hA bi At+ma k+Sho haM/ zhes brjod la sngags kyi don de dran pa las bdug gI de khe nA nyid gnas
290a5(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// chos nyid de las ra mi dang hU~M// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur dang // de nas e las ches 'byung bsgom// daM ni saM yaM ra~M ba~M li dang // sde dmar dkar se ra sa bon dag/ gyur nas 'byung ba zhi'i dkyil 'khor ba ni//
290a6(rgyud 'grel): rang sems kyis bsgyur zhal yas khang // thar pa'i grong mchog rnam par snang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi lha mos mtshad// dra ba dra phyed tA ra ne// ka ba brgyad dang rta babs pa ni// rgyan dang chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs//
290b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyurgyas zhing rgyasna mchod pa yis// tshogs kyi dur khrod brgyad na shing brgyad sogs// hA ra ts+tsha ta a shA ka/ a shwat+tha dang ka rany+dza// dza la ti dang parti par// be te b+hU tra phyogs dang mtshams// zhing stong phyogs skyong lha dang k+Sha// zhing
290b2(rgyud 'grel): skyeng brgyad kyi zhal dang mdog/ phyogs skyong brgyad dang mdog de bzhin// gri gug thod pa g.yas dang g.yon// gter len zhing dag legs par skyong // brgya byin dkar po glang po'i bdag/ rdo rje dril bu ga yA dang g.yon//
290b3(rgyud 'grel): go shin rje thig nag ma he zhon// dbyug pa thod pa de bzhin no// chu lha dkar po chu srin mnan// sbrul zhags g.yas dang pad+ma g.yon// gnod sbyin sor po rta la zhon// dpal 'bras ne'u le g.yas dang g.yon// 'byung po'i
290b4(rgyud 'grel): bdag po dkar po ni// khyu mchog dkar po mdung thod 'dzin// me lha dmar po ra la zhon// spyi blugs dbyug gu rtse gsum bsnyams// srin po kham nag mi ro'i khri// gri dang thod pa g.yu dang g.yin// rlung lha dung kha
290b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// g.yas na ba dan zhags pa g.yon// thams cad rin chen rgyan ldan te// srin po rus pas brgyan pa'o// chung ma bru 'khor phyogs mdog bcas// mdog rnams zhi byed tshes legs skyong // steng gi mkha
290b6(rgyud 'grel): la lha chen brgyad// shar du brgya byin mngon dang 'dra// lho ru tshangs yag gser gyi mdog/ spyi blugs dbyug gu rtse gsum 'dzin// nub tu khyab 'jug dmar po ste// 'khor lo g.yas dang g.yon na dung // byang du lha
291a1(rgyud 'grel): chen thal ba'i mdog/ rtse gsum thong pa g.yas dang g.yon// dbang ldan gzhon nu drug gi bu// dkar po mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa// shar lho tshogs bdag dkar po ni// g.yas g.yon la phug
291a2(rgyud 'grel): la du 'dzin// bden bral b+h+r-i gi ri ti smug/ ral gri g.yas na phu ba ni g.yon// rlung du legs ldan nag po ni// g.yas pa paM dbyug pa ngan g.yon// thams cad lha rgyun dag dang ldan// 'dod pa'i lha rnams kyis bskor nyi zla
291a3(rgyud 'grel): gza'// 'og nas klu brgyad phyogs dang mtshams// 'jog po dung skyong rigs ldan dang // mtha' yas pad chen dga' bo dang // nor rgyas bu dang pad+ma rnams// phyogs skyong mdog dang sbrul zhags g.yas// gdengs ka dang ldan pad+ma/
291a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yon// sprin brgyad chu brgyad mchod rten brgyad// bya dang can zan r-i yi tshogs// sgrub pa'i mchog thob rnal 'byor bzhugs// gzhal yas ning du pad+ma brgyad// rdo rje phreng ba nag pos bskor// dkar ser rA ga dmar dang nag/
291a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dang rtsig po rim pa ro gnas// dbus su bdud bzhi nyi mas mnan// 'dab maM lha brgyud zla bas mnAn// nye steng hUM dang aM nag bsgom// de 'og A l-i nyis 'gyur las// me long zla ba shes rab gzugs// sum cu rtsa
291a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis 'byung po la// steng du kA li nyis 'gyur las// Da d+ha da d+ha la ya gnyis// mnyam nyid nyi ma thabs kyi gzugs// dpe byad brgyad cu 'grub par byed// thod dkar dri sngon nyi zla dang // sa bon mtshan pa so sor rtog/ bskul
291b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyaspyang gcig nan tan yin// gcig gyur sku ni chos kyi dbyings// sku ni mthing nag chen po nyid// zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi phyag bcu drug/ dbu skra dmar ser gyen du 'khyil// steng du zhal dung mdog mche ba gtsigs// rus pa'i
291b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo spyan gsum dmar// 'og ma g.yas dkar g.yon pa dmar// dbus zhal gzhan rnams sku yi mdog/ spyan do mar gsum gsum mche ba gtsigs// sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa'i thod// rna cha mgul ba rgyan dpung pa'i
291b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyar+ya/ phyag gdub zhabs gdubu rus pas brgyan// khrag 'dzag lnga bcu'i phreng ba 'phyang // stag gi sha ma thab thal bas byugs// rdo rje dril bu dang po'i phyag/ yum la legs par 'khyud pa'o// g.yas kyu gnyis pa ral gri
291b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzin rnaMde nas mda' dang 'khor lo shor// dbyug pa rtsa gsum lcags kyu ri ma// g.yon ni rim bzhin pad+ma gzhu// kha T+wAM thod pa rin po che// sdigs mdzub zhags pa bsnams pa'o// yum gyi sku mdog yab dang mnyam//
291b5(rgyud 'grel): zhal gcig phyag gzhi dang po gnyis// rdo rje dril bu yab la 'khyud // gnyis ni mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa'o// thod skam bco lnga'i phreng bas brgyan// rgyan rnams rus pa yab dang mnyam// gtso bo zhabs bzhi g.yas
291b6(rgyud 'grel): brkyang nas// brgya byin tshangs pa nye dbang drag/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa'i// steng nis 'jigs dang sgeg pa gar// bzhad drag snying rje rngo ma dang zhi// gar dgus rnam par gyur par sgom// pad+mo rdo rje byin
292a1(rgyud 'grel): gyis brlab// oM pad+ma su kha d+hA ra ma hA rA ga su khaM dat+ta tsa tu rA nan+da wa gi wa sha/ hUM hUM hUM kar+yaM ku ru ShA me/ oM badz+ra ma hA dwe Sha tsa tu rA nan+na da ya ka kha ga mu khe ka ra so nA tha/ hUM hUM hUM kar+yaM ku ru Sh+Ta me/
292a2(rgyud 'grel): de ni sbyor ba dang po yin// dkyil 'khor sprul pa de ma thag/ lha rnams zhal zhugs snying gar gnas// a nu rA gau brjod nas 'byung // gaM tsaM be paM shaM laM DaM/ brgyad po phyogs dang mtshams rnam su// lha yaM gdan snying du
292a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phros pas// mngon byang lnga las lha mo bskyod// gaM dang gri gug las byung ba'i// gau rI dkar mo phyag bzhi ma// mnga' gzhu gri gug zod khrag bsnams// shar gyi 'ong ba mar tshangs pa mAn ni// tsam dang Da ma rus bsgreng pa
292a4(rgyud 'grel): tsirI dmar mo phyag bzhi ma// 'khor lo lcags kyu Da ma ru// lho yi 'dab mar brgya byin mon na// baM dang rus sbal lngas grub pa'i// bet+tA li dkar phyag bzhi ma// chang chu ral gri thod pa bsnams// nub kyi pad+ma r-inya
292a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang mnan// g+ho dang sbrul las yang dag bskyed// g+hasma rI ljang phyag bzhi ste// me thobs dgra sta thod khrag bkang // mi 'jigs phyag dang drag po stong // byang gi 'dub mar bsgom par bya// pi dang seng ge dag las
292a6(rgyud 'grel): byung / puk+ka sAM ser phyag bzhi ma// dpag bsam lcug ma thod shos bkang // rin po che dang mchog sbyin phyag/ gshin rje mnan po byang shar bsgom// shaM dang dge slong las bskyed pa'o// sha ba ri dkar phyag bzhi ma//
292b1(rgyud 'grel): kha T+wAM thod pa rdo rje zhags// gnod sbyin mnan pa shar lhor bsgom// lam dang 'khor lo bskyed pa yi// tsaN+Da lI sngon phyag bzhi ni// rlung ras bya ngan thod pa dkar// srin po mnan pa lho nub bsgom// DaM dang rdo rje las byung ba'i/
292b2(rgyud 'grel): bi ni sngo phyag bzhi ni// thod pa bshol dang babA ngan dang // mdung rtse gsum pa lha ma yin// maunan pa nub byang pad+mar bsgom// sgo bzhi dziHhUM baM hoHdang / rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri sngo zhing mngon byang las// rta gdong phyag
292b3(rgyud 'grel): gdong khyi seng gdong // zhal bzhi phyug ro yi gdan// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dang po sngo// steng zhol rta gdong ljang gur gnas// phyag gnyis gling bu gzhan gnyis ni// rdo rje lcags kyu bsgom pa'o// g.yas sngo ga
292b4(rgyud 'grel): dmar dang po sder// steng zhal phog gdong dmar po gnas// phyag gnyis pi wang gzhan gnyis ni// rin po che dang zhags pa 'dzin// g.yas sngo g.yon dkar dbus ma dmar// steng zhal khyi gdong ser po gnas//
292b5(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis rnga chen gzhan gnyis ni// pad+ma dang ni lcags sgrog 'dzin// g.yas sngo g.yon dkar dbus ma lhung // steng zhal seng gdong dkar por gnas// phyag gnyis rdza Ta de bzhin gnyis// ral gri gsang ba 'dzin
292b6(rgyud 'grel): por mdzad// shar sgo la sogs rim pa ri ni// pad+ma nyi re'o steng du bsgom// thams cad spyan gsum dmar zhing zlum// dbus skra dmar ser gyen du 'bar// gcer bu rked la stag lpags bkris// rus pa'i phyag rgya
293a1(rgyud 'grel): lnga dang ldan// mgo bo skam po'i phreng ba 'byung // g.yon brkyang sgeg dang 'jigs pa'i gzugs// phyogs mtshams rang rang gdan la bzhugs// yi ge la zhugs gtso bo zhu// nyi ma'i steng nA hUM
293a2(rgyud 'grel): dang A// bde ba'i thig le dbyibs su gnas// de nas 'khor gyi lha mo rnams// rang ring gats+tsha bo ma mthong nas// yid tsho ra gdungs rdo rje gus// bzhengs par bzhed nas gtso bo bsgral// rje btsun thugasaN+ye'i
293a3(rgyud 'grel): kyis gzhengs// gdan la bde ba chen por sbyor// stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas su// puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs// khyod mi bzhugs na bde gi 'gum pas// thugs rje rgyun chad ma mdzad bzhengs// stong pa'i rang
293a4(rgyud 'grel): bzhin ci ste bzhugs// sha pa nAM 'bras grub par mdzod// dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer nas// stong pa nyid lnga bzhugs sam ci// gtum mo bdag ni gsol 'debs na// bcom ldan rdo rje rdo rje bzhengs//
293a5(rgyud 'grel): bdag gi khyod kyi thugs 'tshal g+hi// mig 'khrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig/ DaM bi bdag ni dran mnyam par// snying rje chen po chad mdzad bzhengs// rmi lam lta bu sgyu gsan nas// bcom ldan ster bzhin dgyes
293a6(rgyud 'grel): rdor bzheng so// sku mdog la sogs sngar bson bsgom// dkyil 'khor rnams la legs par blta// lha rnams thugs kar pang nyi zla// rang rang phyag mtshan sa bon bsgom// de ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mtsha
293b1(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo'i thugs ka'i 'od zer gyis// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs la// shar+ya gyi dur khrod na mkhar bzhugs// phyi nang gsang bas legs mchod la// gau rI la sogs lha mo bzhi// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa dgug bzhugs
293b2(rgyud 'grel): bcing // dgyes pa bskyed nas gnyis med bsgom// mig la sogs pa'i dbang po drug/ mngon shes bskyed phyir sbyang bar bya// maM d+haM naM raM aM naM dag/ dkar nag ser dmar ljang khu nag/ pad+ma zla sa bon gr-i gug lnga//
293b3(rgyud 'grel): gti mug zhe sdang sder sna rnams// 'dod chags phrag dog bdag med ma// rdo rje'i ming can lha mo drug/ bskul sbyong byas nas lha mor bsgom// phyag rgya lnga dang gri gug thong // thams cad g.yon brkyang bsgom par
293b4(rgyud 'grel): bya 'tshegs ma snying gi mgrin pa ru// oM dkar A/ dmar hUM nag las// kha dog gsum gyi gri gug las// bskul sbyangs sku gsum byin brlabs las// sa spyod mkha' spyod bdag med ma// dkar dmar nag
293b5(rgyud 'grel): po gri gug 'dzin// phyag rgya lnga ldan+da r-i yi gdan// g.yon brkyang skye dang bcas pa bsgom// yang ni rang snying sa bon las// 'od zer lnga spros bskul sbyang byas// bla mo dkyil 'khor rgyal ba rnams// khro bo rig pa'i lha
293b6(rgyud 'grel): mor bcas// mchod pa gsum gyi legs mchod la// dbang bskur don du gsol ba gdab// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/ mi bskyod la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// spyan ma la sogs sku las byung // bdud
294a1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa lha dbang bskur// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ta sa ma ya shrI ye hUM/ sgrib gnyis sbyangs nas rgyas gdab pa// bdag dang gau rI puk+ka sI// bcom ldan mi bskyong legs par bzhugs// sha
294a2(rgyud 'grel): rI dang tsau rI la// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin bzhugs// tsaN+Da lI dang bet+tA lI// rin chen 'byung ldan bsgom par bya// DaM bi dang ni g+hasmA r-I// dbu la snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs// de nas bdud rtsi myang bar bya// shar lhor dur khrod nam
294a3(rgyud 'grel): mkha' la// sgo ma bzhi yi dbu steng su// rnam par snang mdzad rim bzhin bsgom// yaM raM aM gsum hAM na gro oM// mas ya ri rim pas bsgomi par bya'o// hUM brjod rang snying hUM 'od kyis// hU~M bskul mu drung dkyil 'khor dang /
294a4(rgyud 'grel): mgo bo gsum dang pad+ma brgyad// sa bon bcas pa'i thod pa bsgom// de bzhin hU~M 'od yab bskul bas// a yi 'od kyi sa bon rnams// gyur nas bdud rtsir gyur pa ni// hUM las rnam sprul bruM l-is dr-i// dzA l-Is dkar po aM las
294a5(rgyud 'grel): dmar// kham las chur 'gyur phyogs kyi ri// nAM las mi shwa haM las rta// naM langs glang po ShaM las ni// lce spyang gi las pa glang sha/ hUM gi me sbar bdud rtsi bskol// a yi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lhung // hUM nyid rdo rjer gyur nas
294a6(rgyud 'grel): ni/ lan lngar 'phar zhing dkrug byas nas// rdo rje hUM dang oM 'od des// ye shes bdud rtsi spyan drangs 'dres// lha rnams ljags la hUM nyid las// rdo rje sbu gus bdud rtsi myang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mr-i ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba at+ma ka \u0f7f/
294b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams// dkyil 'khor lha la rim bzhin mchod// mchod pa'i go rims la sogs pas// phyi nang gsung ba'i mchod pa 'bul// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rig pa'i lha mo thams
294b2(rgyud 'grel): cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lha la bstod pa mdzad// lha mo dkyil 'khor bcom ldan bskor// g.yo dang mi g.yo khyod kyi thugs// sems can kun gyi ngan mdzad rnams// bcom ldan mchog tu dgyes rdo rje// zhal gyi thugs kyi
294b3(rgyud 'grel): dgongs pa grub// thugs dgyes mdzod cig dgyes rdo rje// oM sarba tA thA ga ta stu tI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ brtan par gyur nas 'khor lo bskor// lha rnams phyogs phyogs spro bya ste// na mkha'i mthar thug 'gro ba rnams//
294b4(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor lha ru gsal bar bsgom// brtan par gyur nas tshur bsdus lnga// rang nyid dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom// las kyi rgyal po'i 'khor lo mchog/ de ni lha yi de nyid yin// bla ma la brnyas dang med sngags la rlom//
294b5(rgyud 'grel): glegs bam mthong bas khengs shing dbang bskur dI man// de la sgra yi tshig kyang brjod mi bya// dang ldan de nyid bzhi thob gus par sgrub la brtson// bla ma'i lung thobA drinA dAn bla ma la gus de dag ni// de ni rI dbang rtse la ste lhung
294b6(rgyud 'grel): gyur pa// ltung bar mi bya snyam yang ltung bar 'gyur// sdig bral ye shes rim pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin// lha'i de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste dang po'o// da ni ye shes kyi de kho na nyid bshad de// thams cad rang gi sems yin to//
295a1(rgyud 'grel): lha rnams rang la bsdus pa ni// ji ltar me long dkyil 'khor la// tas+ya btabya rim+ba pas 'du ba bzhin// rta gdong la sogs sgo ma bzhi// yan lag bzhi la bsdu bar bya// lha mo brgyad ni zhal la bsdu// zhal dang
295a2(rgyud 'grel): phyag rnams rim bzhin te// bdag yul zhal re phyag gnyis pa// gzhan nas bsten pa'i 'khor lo bzhi// bsgoms nas 'og nas 'byung ba yi// rtags brgyad 'byung bya bsgom pa 'am// mau dgag rgyu don man ngag yin// 'dir ni
295a3(rgyud 'grel): bla ma'i mAn ngag gis// lha yi lung thob dang 'dra bor// bar dor phyag rgya chen po 'thob// gsang ba'i pad+ma mtshan nyid dang // sems dang ye shes 'dres gyur pa'i// mngon par byang chub rim pa dag/ oM shes dbang la nyam par 'tshal
295a4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub rim pa'i rdo rje can// gnas bzhi la nI yang dag brta no// yod du 'ong ba'i gnas dag tu// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// 'dod chags la sogs rim spangs te// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos kun la// snying rje phan
295a5(rgyud 'grel): bar bsams nas su// mnyam pa'i sems ni bskyed par bya// 'og dang 'og min sgra yi mtha'// de bzhin gsang ba'i pad+ma ste// cha dang mdog ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin du ni gdan dag ste// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yis// cho
295a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi dbyings kyi rol pa'o// bsdus te gong bu'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid 'gyur// chu dang me yi khams dag ni// ro gcig 'gyur bas go 'phang mchog/ shes rab thabs dang sbyor ba las// dbang po drug po sang
295b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas nyid// yang dag bstan bcos de nyid shes// slob dpon lung gis rjes 'gro zhing // gsang chen de nyid don bsgom pa// gcig nas rgyud de de nyid can// stong pa de nyid la sogs mtshan// thams cad sngon bzhin mtshan byas nas
295b2(rgyud 'grel): dri ma bkrus pa'i lus kyis ni// mngon par byang chub rim pas grol// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sems dpa'i bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zer 'phros pas// kun nga zla ltar dkar ba'i mdog
295b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag gnyis sems dpa' dkyil 'khor bcos// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas// nyid kyi thugs kar bsdams par mdzad// gzugs mdze
295b4(rgyud 'grel): shin tu rdzogs pa yi// ye shes pad+ma'i gdan du bsam// snying ni chu shing me tog 'dra// lte ba nas nI 'phyangs te gnas// sngon bzhin pad+ma rgyas par brgyan// 'dab ma brgyad kyis brgyan pa yi// ge sar dang ni zla ba bcas//
295b5(rgyud 'grel): sa bon yi ge dgod par bya// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor lha bzhugs pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar po'i mdog/ dri chen dbus su bsgom par bya// dA yi dbus su rnam shes dang // ye shes gnyis su med par bsgom// sngon du bya
295b6(rgyud 'grel): pa ldan pa yi// shar gyi 'dab mar mi bskyod pa// snying rje chen po lho sgo ru// rin tshon de nyid sa bon no// dga' ba nub sgo'i 'dab ma la// 'od dpog med kyi sa bon dgong // btang snyoms byang gi 'dab ma la// don yid gtso bo bsam
296a1(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// dbyangs yig shar sogs sa bon ni// zla phyed thig ler ldan pa dag/ gos dkar ldan pa'i rim bzhin dgod// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi po ru// sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod// de ni dbus
296a2(rgyud 'grel): su rang gi sems// yi ge nyid du bsgom par bya// stong pa mtshan nyid med pa los// ji ltar yi ge bsgom par bya// sems ni ya mtshan skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan bshad pa ji ltar legs// de nas bcom ldan bka' stsal pa
296a3(rgyud 'grel): ji bzhin de nyid rdo rje nyon// stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las// chu shing me tog bdud rtse bzhin// snying po med pa'i snying por 'gyur// dbus kyi rnam shes ye shes te// ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing // mtshan nyid med pa'i
296a4(rgyud 'grel): mtshan nyid can// dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// kha dog gzugs dang yi ge med// gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus dag tu// rnal 'byor can gyi de nyid gzung // mnyam pa nyid kyi sems
296a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis ni// mtshan nyid ji bzhin bsgom par bya// de yi rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam// bla ma nyid kyi lung bzhin du// da ni myur du mthong bar 'gyur// rnam shes ye shes gzugs dag ni// bstan bcos las ni mtshan nyid
296a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan// de nyid kho na dpa' bos bshad// 'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa dag// 'di ni rtag tu bsgom par bya// sgeg pa lnga yi mchod rten la// bdud rtsi sa bon bsams nas ni// 'od zer skar po gsal ba'i mdangs// bdud
296b1(rgyud 'grel): rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag pa las// snying ga'i pad+ma'i ge sar la// mthe bong tsam gyi zlum po la// de yi dbus su sa bon naM// A li kA li dag las btung // mdog dkar de naM shin tu mdzes// zla ba'i 'od zer kun tu 'phro// de yi dbus kyi
296b2(rgyud 'grel): sgo rnams la// thig le bsgom par rab tu grags// sgra yi rtse mo brgya yaM che// rdul phran gzugs rtag tu gnas// rnam pa'i shes pa'i dngos po yi// mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can// sems kyi mtshan nyid mi shes
296b3(rgyud 'grel): bas/ thig le gnas kyi go 'phang blta// snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo dang ni// thig pa lam gyi skr-i dag tu// bla maSh+Ti lung las gus pa yIs// rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya// phyi rol pa yi lam dag dang // bstan bcos las
296b4(rgyud 'grel): ni mi rnyed cing // bstan yang ni rnyed slar te// de sbyor bas na rnyed byar dka'// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur gus pa yi// thabs dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// bla ma'i zhal gyis ni// mkhas pas 'di ni bsgom par bya// mi gA yo 'tshe ba
296b5(rgyud 'grel): myemed pa ru// mnyam par bzhag ste dngos po bsgom// chos kyi ston 'gro yid yin te// yid kyis 'jug cing yid kyi 'dag/ yid kyi rgyal po'i bka' drin gyis// smra ba dag ni byed pa 'byung // de bas thams cad yid rang bzhin//
296b6(rgyud 'grel): blo ldan yid las byung zhes bya// gal te bzla 'dod rnal 'byor pa// snying ga'i bsam dang bsgom pa ste// sdom dang rgyud 'gyur sa bon ni// de nyid kho na gzugs med do// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i sa bon no// ye shes de nyid mthong
297a1(rgyud 'grel): ba med// gzugs sogs srid pa'i 'dod spyod la// sa bon lnga ni bsgom par bya// kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang // 'gro dang 'gro min yang dag gnas// rtag tu rtsu ba gzer bar bya// ye shes rnam shes sa
297a2(rgyud 'grel): bon ni// thig le'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis// ngag gi yi ge spangs nas ni// yid kyi bzlas dang yang dag ldan// rtag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi// mi g.yo go 'phang rgyun tu gnas// rtag tu
297a3(rgyud 'grel): 'phang zhing gos med pas// ye shes las ni rnam shes thim// rnam shes ye shes nyid 'gyur na// byang chub rim pa mthong 'gyur zhes// myar me lta bu thams cad la// snang 'gyur mtshan ma dang po ste// srin bu me
297a4(rgyud 'grel): khyer lta bu dang // rdul mthong mtshan ma gnyis pa yin// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i mtshan nyid bdagos// rdul phran dkar po rnam par ni// phyogs su de bzhin mthong 'gyur ba// rtag ni gsum pa yin par shes//
297a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa lha yi longs spyod rnams// sems kyis mthong ba bzhi pa ste// gzugs kyi lha mthong lnga pa yin// gzugs med spyad drug pa ste// chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa bdun// sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyud pa ste/
297a6(rgyud 'grel): rnal 'byor pas ni ma g.yongs bsgoms// snying rje ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rtse gcig bsgoms pas mchog thob 'gyur// oM shes te sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gang du 'pho ba'i mon ngag ni// bla ma'i rgyud
297b1(rgyud 'grel): yod la blang // 'chi ba rnam rtog mkha' spyod 'gro// gang zhig dang med brtson med blon po shes rab med// bla ma'i skyon blta nyes brjod g.yo sgyus bla ma bslus// tshogasu mi blta lkog tu brnyas byed 'dzum tshig smra// bu dang rgyal po
297b2(rgyud 'grel): dge slong rigs bzang yin yang spya // skyon rnams spangs pa'i gzugs spros ma yin lA// bla ma la gus snying rje gzhan phan shes rab thabs dang ldan// spyod lam rnam bzhir mo yengs bsgom la brtson zhing
297b3(rgyud 'grel): rim par ston// de lta bu la sngags kyi de nyid legs par bstan par bya// ye shes kyi de nyid kyi rim pa ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas sngags kyi mtshan nyid bshad// rnal 'byor pa rnam
297b4(rgyud 'grel): rtag tu bzla/ sngags dang yi ge tha mi dang // gnyis med rtag tu bAzla bo nAM// gal te bzla 'dod rnal 'byor pas// snying gis bsam dang bsgom pa ste// rdo rje rgyu gyur sa bon nI// de kho na nyid gzugs med do// rlung gi snying gar sa
297b5(rgyud 'grel): bon gsal ba lA// bswam+b+ha gtan sngags kyi bskor la bzla// oM daM byA pi tsu badz+ra nU hUM hU~M phaT swAhA/ snong po'o// oM an+d+ra na nA ya/ paM ga u~Mr+d+ha ke shaM ban+d+ha m+b+ha ni/ tsa turbaM sha ti nai trA ya/ Sho Ta sha b+hU dz+nyA ya/ kr-iSh+Ta d+hI mU tAM bA bu She/
297b6(rgyud 'grel): ka pA la mA lA ne kaM d+ha ri Ni/ A d+hA ta kru ra tsit+ta ya/ an+ten+d+ra daSh+Ti Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA r-i yaM/ kA re yaM kI ra ya/ gardza ye gardzi ya/ tardza ya tar+tha ya/ sho Sha ya sha Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rAn/ ban+taM ban+d+ha/ nA gASh+Ta kAM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sarba
298a1(rgyud 'grel): drAn+na sha d+hA/ \u0f7fhU hUM hUM hUd+hAHhaha ta/ haHphaT+Ta s+yAt+ma/ rtsa ba'i sngagaso// oM badz+rab+hU dz+ra s+yA t+yA pU ra m+bA a kA sh+tsa r+ya ka b+hA la/ mU la ra d+ha ri Na du d+hA ra pra ye nA/ pA s+yai hUM phaT swAhA/ gau rI'i skying ba'o// oM badz+ra tsan+da
298a2(rgyud 'grel): shwa raM kha T+wAM gi ma hA badz+ra ka pA la mA l-i ku ho// AM kau Da D+ha ya/ sarba duSh+TAM hr-i daM yA/ A kar+d+ha b+hu hUM phaT swA hA/ ts+yai nI'i'o// oM badz+ra pret+tA lI kha kha khA hUM khA hI sarba duSh+Ti bi ka Ta/ be She ta rI ni bi ki tA l-i ka ra b+hu Shi ta/ ha na hA na/ da hA da ha/
298a3(rgyud 'grel): pa tsa pa tsa/ ba laM ba sa ma nusma ra/ pra sha ya mA d+hi lA ma te/ u ta paM ya sarba hUM hUM hU~M swA haM/ bed+d+haM li'aM'o// oM badz+ra ma he shwa ri haM haM he haM ru lu b+hI hUM phaT/ ba khro yaM sarba duSh+Tan naM nirma tha ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ g+hAsmA ri'i'o// oM badz+ra/
298a4(rgyud 'grel): Na b+hA ba ti badz+ra gu dza sha rA bo hAM/ pi ts+ya ta bi shrI ta ri ni/ sarba tA thA ga ta dz+nyA s+the sa mya ya mau nr-i me ra hA na he na/ raM ga raM ga ya/ s+phA ra s+phu ra yA/ be sha sarba b+h+yo ti taM/ na d+ha na d+ha sa twA ya/ ha he ha hA hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ br-ik+ka sI'i l-i// oM bI shA rtsi bar+t+ta sha
298a5(rgyud 'grel): ba rI s+yAr+b+ba ma r-I re br-i sha ma ni/ nA trI ts+tsha mo hA pu ta rI hUM phaT swAhA/ ri krod mA'aM'aM// oM badz+ra su lo ni b+hin+da sar+b+ba dASh+Ta hr-i dA ya/ Ak+ShaR+ShA ya/ A kaR+ShA yA/ ha~M na trA na/ dItwA dA ha/ nIrma thA ra ya bi l-i ga~M/ sa mAM ye mA nusmA ra d+h+waM hUM phaT swAt+ta/ tsa~MN+Da
298a6(rgyud 'grel): lAlnga'i'o// oM badz+ra ba ra ma g+hu dze ka sa la bi b+hu Shi ta sarba duSh+Ti mo ha ni sri ye/ dz+ye hi ga pa te badz+ra b+hA tri se ri b+ha hU~M/ baM baM ba sa pi ri ni sarba duSh+Ta~M/ tsi ni ri hUM phaT/ DoM bi ni'i'o// oM badz+ra pa ta ba mu khaM lo gaM shwa ri/ hi hi hi ha~M dzaHhUM phaT swA hA/
298b1(rgyud 'grel): gdong ma'i'o// dzi ta pa ra/ oM badz+ra daM yu d+ha ra tA mU khI traM hUM phaT swAhA/ phag dong ma'i'o// oM badz+ra sA d+hA sA dz+wa la nI ma hA yak+Sha ni yak+Sha nai r+yA ba nai ma hU pa la ya nir nA twe/ krA ma rU pa tI ti trad hU~M hUM phuT swA hA/ khyi gdong ma'i'o// oM tsan+d+ra
298b2(rgyud 'grel): dUs+yAr+yA hUM tra sa naM si haM nIr ta si haM ba ga taM/ saM hI ni taM tAM ti bAM baM hUM pheMTaM swA hA/ seng ge gdong la sogs pA'i sngag so// oM AM swA hA/ bdag med ma'i'o// oM I swA hA/ gau rI'o// oM AM swA hA/ tsau rI'i'o// oM I swA hA/ bet+tA lA'i'o//
298b3(rgyud 'grel): oM aM swA hA/ g+hasma rI'i'o// UM swA hA/ puk+ka sI'i'o// oM raM l-i swA hA/ tsaN+Da l-I'i'o// oM li swA hA/ DoM bi ni'i 'o// rtsa ba'i'o// oM ha ya gri ba hUM phaT swA hA/ rta gdong ma'i 'o// oM badz+ra pu ra gri bAM hUM phaT swA hA/ phag gdong ma'i 'o// oM ku ru
298b4(rgyud 'grel): ku ru gri ba hUM phaT swA hA/ khyi gdong ma'i'o// AM r-i swA hA/ sha ba R+Ya'i'o// oM badz+ra sing ha gri be hUM phaT swA hA/ seng gdong ma la sogs pa'i snying po ring po'o// rnal 'byor zlos la brtson pa yis// gnas la phyag 'tshal yi ge lnga// zhi
298b5(rgyud 'grel): ba'i thig le dbyibs mdog brlan// bde ba mi rtog stong pa nyid// mi rtog stong pa gnyisu med// bla mi'i man ngag sa la bzla// bla ma tha mal bar mthong dug sel bdud rtsi spong // rig dang bsnyen bkur gyis khengs 'jig rten chos
298b6(rgyud 'grel): brgyad 'tshol// de 'dra'i slob ma 'ong ba snying rjes dge ba de yang gzung // del 'jam brtson zhi bka' sgrub thos sam sgom pa pos// rigs gnas 'byor pa dgos kyang de ni gzung sbyang bya// dbang bskur rgyud bshad sngags
299a1(rgyud 'grel): dang gdams drug bstan par 'os// sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste gsus pa'o// da ni bdag gi de kha na nyid bshad// de nyid shes pas mnyam bzhag med// dngos po rnams ni thams cad/
299a2(rgyud 'grel): kyis/ rnam dag de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyi nas rI re dbye ba yis// lha rnams rnam par dag par bya// mi shes sgrub g.yogs rnams sbyangs nas// lus can phung po khams skye mched// rigs lnga yum lha rdo rje ma//
299a3(rgyud 'grel): gcig gnyis gsum bzhi lnga dang bcu// brgya stong khri 'bum bye ba dag/ grangs med sku yi gsang ba bsam mi khyab// gsung dang thugs kyi gnyis med byas ma mi khyab// rnal 'byor rnams la phan pa'i phyir// lus me
299a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje can de nyid// shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog/ khams gsum 'di dag thams cad ni// rmi lam sgyu ma ji bzhin du// tshes brgyad rtogs pa ring du dor// gnyis med mAM rtog maM dris par bya// pha rol phyin drug spyad pa
299a5(rgyud 'grel): yis/ sangs rgyas dngos grub myur du 'grug// sems can mi rtog sgyu mas byas// chos kyi dbyings la bang rtog spyod pas// sreg po med par gcig pur n+ya// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// ji ltar bde bor g+hin so par
299a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ ji ltar bdud rtsi don gnyer ba// snying po blangs nas rtsigs ma mdo ro// de bzhin bdud rtsi lnga brnyed nas// rtag pa thams cad spangs nas su// sangs rgyas thams cad bstan pa bzhin// rtog med ting 'dzin longs
299b1(rgyud 'grel): spyod bya// rgyud rnams kun ras rgya lta bas bstan// rtog pas dmyal bas 'gro 'gyur zhing // 'gro drug rgya mtsho 'khor bar 'gro// rtog pa med na grol bar 'gyur// phyag rgya chen pa'i gnasu 'gro/ bas rnal 'byor bdag nyid ni//
299b2(rgyud 'grel): don yang dag don rigs pas// snying rje 'gro don bsdam pa can// dmigs pa med par brtan par dpyad // dogs med seng ge bzhin du rgyu// 'on kyang slob dpon smad mi bya// rdo rje spun lo mi dgu min// rtsa ba yan lag dam
299b3(rgyud 'grel): tshig rnams// gtan med sgyu mas spang bya zhing // de nyid ban+d+ha shes bskyed rdzogs kyis// thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub par bya// rnal 'byor chen po sna tshogs ye shes rdo rje sems dpa' rjesu brgyun// lA las nyon mongs
299b4(rgyud 'grel): byed lam bzang lam can lus dag yod sgrub 'bras bu ni// rgyu ma smig rgyu dri za'i grong 'ad+ma ting 'dzin dag la blo gnas pas// 'dod tshogs la sogs nad can ye shes sgyu ma'i sman gyi bdag gzhan gso bar bya// bdag byin
299b5(rgyud 'grel): rlab pa man+ta ngag dag/ gang gi bla mu las ma bsgrubs// rtag dang chad pa la dmigs pas// maM de phyir log gyur pa yin// mchod pa thams cad rnam spangs nas// bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsam// de mnyes pas ni kun
299b6(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa'i// ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur ra// bla med thob pa'i slob dpon ni// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod byas pas// de yi bsod nams ma byas shing // dka' thub ma bsnyen gang zhig yod// de nyid mi zad 'dod pa yis// /
300a1(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dga' ba gang dang gang // shin tu khyad par can de nyid// de dang de nyid bla mas byin// bla ma yis ni sdig pa 'phrog/ slob dpon gyis ni 'jigs pa sel// slob dpon gyis ni sdug bsngal
300a2(rgyud 'grel): g+h+raM/ rgya mtsho 'jigs las pha rol sgrol// gang zhig nga rgyal gyis khengs shing // yang dag min+da pa sun 'byin drang // de nyid ches brnyas bcas pa la// de la de nyid bstan pa min// bla ma lA gus bden par smra// rnam par mkha
300a3(rgyud 'grel): shing rgyad gcig la// dam tshig spyod par bsrung ba dag/ rim pa de la bstan par bya// bdag gis de kho na nyid kyi rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// / de nyid bzhi bsgom rnal 'byor pa'i// sgrib sbyang
300a4(rgyud 'grel): bar chad zhi ba dang // tshogs bsags mkha' spyod 'pho ba'i phyir// chos sbyong mkha' 'gro gtar ma byin// shAr gyi dur khrod na mkha' la// chos 'byung sum rtse bar ma ni// lte bar maM las sa yi lha// gser mdog bum pa 'dzin
300a5(rgyud 'grel): byed mA// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgya ni// pad zla'i gdan la legs bzhugs ma// mkha' ya yi dgras tshogs kyis bskor// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang mtshams// dur khrod bstan pa phyogs skyong 'khor//
300a6(rgyud 'grel): steng gi pad+ma'i lte ba la// baM las tshangs pa gdong bzhi gser gyi mdog/ g.yas na mi 'jigs 'phreng ba 'dzin// g.yon na spyi blugs rtse gsum 'dzin// gzugs khams lha yi bskor nas bzhug so// paM las pad+ma
300b1(rgyud 'grel): k+She ba la// prA las pad+ma dkar po dkar// gdengs ka sbrul zhags pad+ma 'dzin// phyogs mtshams klu chen brgyad po ni// durar+ya khrod lta bur bskum// phyogs mtshamus lha rnams spun ltar bsgom// 'dod pa'i wA mU la
300b2(rgyud 'grel): gyi bsgrer// dzaHhUM baM hoHrim brjod nas// gau rI la sogs lha mo yis// dgugs zhugs gnyis maud gyur nas kyang // phyogs sbyong 'khor bcos thugs kyi rigs// mi bskyong rang nyid dur khrod brgyan// mthing nag
300b3(rgyud 'grel): rdor dril yum dang ba ces// zhal gcig g.yas brkyang bsgom par bya// lha rnams sku yi rigs yin te// dkor pe dur khring brgyad dang ldan// rdo rje dril bu yum dang bcas// zhal gcig g.yas brkyang
300b4(rgyud 'grel): bsgom par bya// klu brgyad gsung rigs dmar po// lha rnams sku yi rigs yin to// dkar pA dur khrod brgyad dang ldan// rdo rje dril bu yum dang bcas// zhal gcig g.yas brkyang bsgom par bya// klu brgyad
300b5(rgyud 'grel): gsung rigs dmar ba ste// 'od dpag rang bzhin dur khrod brgyad// mdog dmar dzar dril yum dang bcas// zhal gcig g.yas brkyang bsgom par bya// rang rang rgyan dang sku gsung thugs// lce rnams rdo rje sgra

301a1(rgyud 'grel): l+yA ar+N+Na sad+d+ha s+thAH/ s+yA da pa b+hUny+dza b+hU b+h+raHd+hU pA mA sa d+d+hi b+hU an+maklAt+sA khyAn+ta b+hU NAM d+hA nA g+hA ta/ au Ak+ShA rA mU khA smArbad+har+m+mar+N+Na/ Ud+ya nud+b+han+na tAt+tha smr-i AHhUM phaT sAt+ma/ k+Shok+tha e ran+ti
301a2(rgyud 'grel): a bo lA mum+ma Ni ri kAk+ko lA/ b+h+r-i Na kaM pi tAM ho// bAdz+dza au/ kA ru NAM/ ki a i na re lA ta hiM ba la khaMdz+dza i g+ha DaM/ ma a rbA bid+d+ho I a i/ hi li kA liny+tsi rA pa NaM/ A i/ du d+hau ru bad+d+ha ai i/ tsa u sA ma
301a3(rgyud 'grel): krAts+tsha raM sih+la krAp+l-i ra lA i A a/ mA lA In+d+ra NaM/ sa l-iny+dzA ta hi b+hA ru khA i a i/ pe kha Na khe Ta ka ran+te/ shud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ mu ni ni au i/ ni raM ta la aM gai tsa nAM wI a i wi ta i/ ti dza saM r+ya ba ba ni a i/
301a4(rgyud 'grel): TiN+DaM ma ta hai tsa~M badz+ra a i zhes bya'i rdo rje'i glus so// yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ste/ phyi nang 'thor 'thung byin la/ oM badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ mai nu pA la ya/ badz+ra sa tra tre no pa tiSh+Tha/ dr-i D+ho me
301a5(rgyud 'grel): b+hab+hob+ha ba/ su te Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+hi m+me pa yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa mau/ tsit+ta shre yaHku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha hi/ b+ha ga ban/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra mA maM muny+tsa badz+rI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya/ ma nu bA
301a6(rgyud 'grel): la ya satwa oMHrang nyid lhar bsgoms lag gnyis kyis// pad+ma'i phyag rgya bskor bar bya// hUM hUM hUM gsum brjod dril bu dkrol// rdor dril thal mo thugs kar sbyar// snying rje chen po bskyed nas ni// rdo rje glu blangs sman
301b1(rgyud 'grel): lam gdab// mchog gsum sdig dang sgrib med cing // 'dod chags la sogs skyon dang bral// gzungs dang 'dzin dang rnam par spangs// de bzhin nyid bdag phyag 'tshal// chos rnams sgyu ma lta
