303b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyu gar skad du/ shrI he badz+ra sA d+hA na/ bod skad du/ dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ pal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'ama'o// dpa' bo thod pa'i phreng ba can// na mkha' khyab par gur mdzad cing // bdan/
303b2(rgyud 'grel): mad ma dang gnyis med gzugs// bde cheni de la phyag 'tshal 'dud// de nyi rnyed dka' de bas kyang // bla ma'i bka' don shin tu dka'// bdag gzhan don 'byung sngags kyi tshul// 'gro phan lam la brtson par gyis// yon tan brgyad
303b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan sngags pa yis// bde ba'i bstan la nyer bdug ste// sems nyid rang gi snying gar bsam// 'od kyis bdag dang sems can gzung // de las chos 'byung yangs la blta// mi 'gyur ba nyid yengs gyur las// dpal ldan
303b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo he ru ka/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis nag po che// gar gyi zhabs kyis nyi ma man na// phyag rgya drug gis brgyan pa ste// rdo rje thong ba g.yas g.yon 'chang // gri gug thod pa 'dzin pa yi// bdag med mi yis myugul nas
303b5(rgyud 'grel): bakhyud// spyan gsum dbusgra sgra gyen du 'bar// bde bas gang ba'i rang bzhin du// bdag nyid rnam par bsgom par bya// skyong gar ye shes sems dpa' yi// 'odi kyis grub pa'i lha bkug ste// mtshad pa la sogs bas
303b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i mthar// bdag dang gnyis su med par bsam// de nas dbang bskur byin gyis brlab// yang na mchod pas mnyes bya ste// dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor ba yis// dang po sangs rgyas mchod par bya// bde chen dam pa blangs na//
304a1(rgyud 'grel): lte ba'i rtsa bar ngal bso ste// bdud rtsi btung bar bya ba nyid// de yi lus ni rnam dag 'gyur// lte ba ra tsaN+Da li 'bar bas// bde bar gshegs pa lnga bsregs te// bsregs pa l+h+wam las ri bong 'dzag
304a2(rgyud 'grel): thog ma tha ma dbus med cing // 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bdag dang gzhan yang yod min pa// 'di ni mchog tu bde chen po// de lta bud ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dang po nyid du bden pa'i byin brlabs brjod// gnas dang
304a3(rgyud 'grel): yul du rgyu ba'o// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// bdag la byin gyis rlobs shig ces brjod la// mthar yang ye shes 'od ni shin tu zab// rdo rje snying po mkha' dang mtshungs// rdul bral thar ster zhi ba ste// nga yi pha ni
304a4(rgyud 'grel): nga nyid do// 'dir ni rigs skyes dam tshig ldan// rje su chags par dgyes rdor 'chang // bla ma la gus snying rje can// skye zhing skye bar bdag gyur cig/ lag pa rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// zab mo'i chos 'di 'don pa dang // btsun me
304a5(rgyud 'grel): khu bas mnyam zas can// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ de nas gtor ma btang nas su// 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab// bde bar gshegs pa'i sngags bzlas shing // lha yi sbyor bas rgyu bar bya// rtag tu slob ma
304a6(rgyud 'grel): bsdu bya zhing // rtag tu dam chos bshod par bya// sems can thams cad rtag tu bskyang // he ru ka dpal rtag tu mchod// sA tsha sbyin sreg mchod sbyin bya// chu sbyin rang gi sbyin par bya// bla ma bide gshegs bdun bdar te//
304b1(rgyud 'grel): maN+Dal byi dor byas nas su// mchod cing bstod de gshegs gsol gyi// gling bzhi nyi ma re re bya// de bzhin thun mtshams gzhan la yang // bdag la byin gyis brlab par bya// skyil krung bcas nas mig brtan te// sna rtser bsams
304b2(rgyud 'grel): ba mi g.yo bas// brel kyang skad cig skabs bshol la// khyim pa yis kyang bsgom par bya// spyod lam dag la bab na yang // sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur bsgom// lhan cig skyes pa'i yid kyi nyal// sems can don la chags phra
304b3(rgyud 'grel): ljang / blo bur nyid du dran bya zhing // blo bur tshul du rnal 'byor spyod// mkha' la rgyu ba'i bya ba bzhin du// sngags pas chags pa med par gnas// gzhan du g.yeng bas chags sogs dang // gnyid kyi zil gnon ma gyur cig/ sgrub
304b4(rgyud 'grel): pa'i thabs ni rin po che// rnal 'byor pa yang skal ba bzang // bzang po nga yis mdor sdus pas// dge can gang yin rol par shog/ dpal he ru ka zhal gcig pa'i sgrub thabs slob dpon yan lag med pa'i rdo rjes mdzad
304b5(rgyud 'grel): brdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badz+ra pA Ni dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba sman byan tshwas 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shrI haM badz+ra sA d+ha naM/ bod
304b6(rgyud 'grel): skad du/ dpal kye rdo rje'i sgrub thabs/ dpal kye rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang // sgo bzhir gnas pa'i b+ha rI sogs// mtshams kyi skul byed ma bzhi la// sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal te// rnal
305a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byor blo gzhan don du ni// bdag gis dgyes pa'i rdo rje yi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sgrub thabs 'di// mi nus bzhin du brtsam par bya// slob dpon de nyid thos pa dang // dbang rnams tshul bzhin
305a2(rgyud 'grel): mnos pa dang // bsgom dang cho ga mkhas pa dang // bka' yis gnang ba thob pa yis// dngos grub 'dod pa'i sems kyis su// dur khrod dang ni lha rten te// rang gi khyim dang chu 'gram du// 'jigs pa'i sems med bsam gtan
305a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ dran thar rnam pa bdun dag gis// lus sogs bdun po dag nas ni// skad cig ma yi rnal 'byor mas// rdo rje sems pa'i lus byas te// snying gar pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom// de steng nyi dkyil hUM bsams te// 'bar ba me yis
305a4(rgyud 'grel): rab bsregs pas// ye shes mig dang ldan bya ste// sngon du dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang // lha mo brgyad dag mngon par mthong // phyi dang nang dang bla med pa'i// mchod pa rnams kyis yang dag mchod// sngon 'gro rjes su phyag byas te//
305a5(rgyud 'grel): sdig pa byas pa bshags pa dang // phyis mi byed par sdom pa gzung // dge ba byes rjes yI rang bya// sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i rdo rje dang // de gsungs pa yi chos rnams dang // ma brgyad lha mo dge 'dun la// bdag ni dong pos sgrubs
305a6(rgyud 'grel): sem mo// byang chub sems kyang bdag gis bskyed// theg pa chen po gnas po gyi// kun gyi don ni bdag nyid 'bul// de yang rgya cher bsngo bar bgyi// dang po byams pa bsgom par bya// gnyis bstong rje bya brag bsgom// gsum
305b1(rgyud 'grel): dgar ba bsgom pa ste// kun gyi tha mar btang snyom so// dang po stong pa'i byang chub sems// gnyis pa la ni sa bon 'dus// gsum pa la ni gzugs rdzogs te// bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod// de 'og stong pa'i byang chub ni//
305b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi dang nang med stong sman ni// bsam gta de nyid kho na yi// lus sgyu yang dag bsgom par bya// oM shUn+ta trA dz+nyA nA badz+ra s+yA b+hA ba Ut+ma ko haM/ sngon gyi snron lam d+hus dAn na// de kho na nyid las langs nas// 'og phyogaso pad+ma 'ad
305b3(rgyud 'grel): brgyud la// de stengs nyi ma hUM bsams pas// hUM las rdo rje sa gzhir gyur// de stengs bgegs bskrad hU~M bsams pa'i// rak+Sha sgra dang ldan pa yis// tshogs kyi bgegs rnams sel bar byed// slar 'dus rdo rje gur du gyur//
305b4(rgyud 'grel): zlabla ro yang ni bsgom par bya// steng 'og phyogs med rdo rje dbyibs// sku oM dbyibs 'dra nyid du bsgom// oM gzugs bdag med ma 'dra bar// bsams te de las 'byung 'gyur ba'i// chos kyi 'byung gnas de dbyibs ni//
305b5(rgyud 'grel): glu gsum gyen dkar yang dag ldan// de yis dbus su bsam pa ni// yaM dang raM dang ba dang l-i// de steng bdag nyid rnam shes ni// oM ba nyid ni yang dag gnas// sgo dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yi// gzhol yas khang du gyur pa
305b6(rgyud 'grel): thog gcig pa ru bsam par bya// ngos bzhi pa li sgo bzhi pa// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhis kyang rnam par mdzes// dra ba dra phyed kyis brgyan pa// lha mo brgyad kyi 'od kyis kyang // gsal bar lha yi rnam
306a1(rgyud 'grel): pas bya// de nas pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa// kha dog dmar po nyi ma gnas// de steng bdud bzhi rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa dbang po nye bar drag/ shar sgro la stsogs bzhir gnas pa// tshangs pa dang ni dbang po dang //
306a2(rgyud 'grel): nye dbang dang ni drag po rim pa bzhin du gnas pa'o// mtshams bzhi por na shes bya ba// gshin+da rje dang ni nor bdag dang // bden bral dang ni thag bzangs ris// puk+ka sI sogs gdan du btags// de ltar pho brang bye brag rdzog
306a3(rgyud 'grel): debazhin gshegs pa 'byung ba yi// nga rgyal 'di yi bya ba ste// nga 'am rtag tu bsam par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ dbus kyi gzhi stengs A lI ni// bcu drug rim pa gnyis shes bya// de 'gyur zla ba
306a4(rgyud 'grel): gnyis pa ni// me long lta bu'i ye shes// de steng yang dag bsam byA ni// kA lI bzhi bcu nyis 'gyur las// rta bdun pa ru gyur pa ste// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// de dbus hU~M las 'byung ba ni// rdo rje nag po rtsi lnga pA/
306a5(rgyud 'grel): lci ba hUM gis mtshan pa ste// so sor rtags pA'i ye sheso// de la 'od 'bras sems can don// b+h+r-i sa tI bzhi pa nyid la bsgom// 'og gi gong bur gyur pa nAM// bya bya nan ta na ye shes so// de las thig le brgyad chad de// ga
306a6(rgyud 'grel): tsa dang ngi dang b+he// baM dang sa dang laM dang Te// zla ba nyi mar yang dag ldan// sa bon brgyad las gyur pa ni// gr-i dang rje'u chung ru spel sku la// seng gi dge slong 'khor lo dang // rdo rje la sogs rim par skyes// rga nr-i shar gyi sbyim
306b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas// tsaun+ti l-I yi sgo na gnas// nub kyi sgro ru bet+tA lji// byang gi sgo ru g+hasma rI// puk+ka sI ni dbang ldan du// ri khrod ma nI byin za'i grwar// gtum mo bden bral lA gnas te// g.yung mo 'di ru rlung na gnas// lha mo bskyed pa rdzogs nas su//
306b2(rgyud 'grel): gtso bo 'od kyi gong bla la// lha mos bdag po med mthong nos// gong bu ma tshig la gsal ba gdub// snying rje yid kyis bcom ldan 'das bzhengs// puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyabs// stong pa'i ting 'dzin spangs nas ni// bdag la 'dod pa'i
306b3(rgyud 'grel): bde ba mdzod// khyod mi bzhugs na bdag 'gum pas// stong pa'i rang bzhin yongs sbyangs te// rI khrod ma 'bras grub pAr ni// kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ 'jig rten phyir smon 'dod pa'i gats+tsha// ci phyir stong pa nyid la bzhugs// khyod mi
306b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs nA phyogs mi khums// gtum mi bdag ni gsol ba 'bebs// g.yung mo bdag ni yid rmongs pas// snying rje rgyun chad me mdzad par// khyod kyi 'og ga ni thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul lta bur khyed bzhengs shig/
306b5(rgyud 'grel): bskul ba'i glu'o// bskul bas sngon gyis byang chub ni// smon lam rje su dran te bzhengs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis nag po che// gcer bu spyan gsum+b+ha mche bya gtsigs// phyag rgya lha dang yang dag ldan// sna tshogs rdo rje
306b6(rgyud 'grel): spyi bar gnas// g.yas na rdo rje rtse lde 'dzin// g.yon pa na ni thod pa 'dzin// zhabs kyi bdud bzhi rnam par mnan// brkyang bskum tshul du gnas pa'o// gau rI kha dog nag mo ste// tsa r-I kha dog btsod dang mtshungs// ro langs ma
307a1(rgyud 'grel):  nI gser bsregs mdog/ za phod ma ni marka ta mtshungs// spos mo'i mdog ni sngon mo'o// ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od// gtum mo na mkha' ljang gu ste// g.yung mo sna tshogs pa ru 'dod// gau rI g.yas nA gri gug ste
307a2(rgyud 'grel): g.yon na nya ni de bzhin no// chom rkunA gA yas na Da ma ru/ gar+tha na ShaT+Ta na tsA / !yi g.yas na sbrul// g.yon pa'i lag na thod pa'o// spos mo g.yas na seng ge ste// g.yen gyi phyag na dgra sta 'dzin// rjen pa
307a3(rgyud 'grel): mya g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon pa na ni sil byed do// gtum ma g.yas na 'khor lo ste// g.yon pa na ni thod pa 'dzin// g.yung mo g.yas na rdo rje ste// g.yon na sdigs mdzu pa de bzhin no// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyi gnas
307a4(rgyud 'grel): gau rI la sogs phyag gnyis shes// spyan gsum skra ni gyen du yin// phyag rgya lngas ni shin tu mdzes// tshangs pa la sogs gdan la bzhugs// de ltar sku rnams rdzogs pa dang // rang gi snying gor pad+ma bsam//
307a5(rgyud 'grel): de dbus nyi ma hU~M las bsam// de las rdo rje rtse lnga pa// de las hUM gis mtshan pa ste// de 'gyur ye shes sems dpya' bsam// de nyid pad nyer hUM rdo rje// ye shes semusna dpa' rdzogs pa'o// de ltar rim+b+ha pa kun+da la
307a6(rgyud 'grel): yang / de ltar nang du shes par bya// de las 'od 'phros bde gshegs rnams// dzaHhUM pau ho bka' lung gis// gau r-I la sogs rnams kyis ni// spyan drangs nas ni de stims nas// ye shes 'khor lo chen po @
307b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' ni// bsgrubs te gzhan na yod ma yin// maM las gti mug rdo rje ma// daM las zhe sdang rdo rje ma// maM las ser sna rdo rje ma// raM las 'dod chags rdo rje ma// aM las phrag dog rdo rje ma// naM las bdag med
307b2(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje ma// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus yid rim bzhin de ltar dgod// phyag gnyis zhal gcig ro yi gdan// gri gug thod pa phyag na bsnams// aM las mkha' sbyong mar shes bya// a las sa spyod ma ru 'dong // hUM las zhabs bskyed
307b3(rgyud 'grel): 'og nas bsam// de ltar sku gsung thugs de yang // rnal 'byor ma ni rigs gsum 'dod// rang snying sa bon khyad par spro// lcags kyi gzugs kyi 'od zer gyis// sangs rgyas spyan drangs mdun du mchod// dbang bskur ba ni bslang
307b4(rgyud 'grel): ba ste/ mgon po de bzhin gshegs thams cad// khyod kyi bdag la dbang bskur cig/ de bzhin gshegs po thams khro bo dang // lha rnams kyis ni mdun bdar nas// bum pas de la dbang bskur bas// bi tsi ta/ pi pa ka/ bi maH/
307b5(rgyud 'grel): bi laM/ skad cig bzhi la'o// A nan+da/ pa ra mA nan+da dang / bi ra mA nAn+da dang / sa mai dzA nan+da'o// dga' ba bzhi'o// rgod pa dang / blta ba dang / lag bcangs dang / 'khyud pa ni slob dpon dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang /
307b6(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po de kho na nyid do// mtha' ru dbang rnams 'bras bu ni// rtsa bar mi bskyod pas brgyan pa'o// sems dang phan pa rin chen dang // 'od dpag med pas brgyan pa'o// gau rI tsaM rI bet+tA lI// g+hasma rI rnams brgyan pa'o//
308a1(rgyud 'grel): mi bskyod sangs rgyas rin chen dang // tshe dpas med kyis brgyan pa ni// spos mo ston mo gtum mo dang // g.yung mo la sogs brgyad po'o// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsa tu mAM sarba tA thA ga ta ho// 'bud dang 'brur dang
308a2(rgyud 'grel): thod pa dang // 'dzin pa lnga dang 'bros bu lnga// de 'gyur bdud rtsi ro myang ba// rdo rje nas kyi 'bru bsam ste// dgyes pa'i rdo rje glag go// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ a mr-i ta sa nA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ lha mo brgyad rnams spros nas ni// mchod
308a3(rgyud 'grel): pa brgyad kyis sngon bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gtso bo nyid la mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza~M badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ rnal 'byor ma rnams de dag gis// 'khor lo'i gtso bo la bstod la// khyod ni rnal 'byor brgyad kyis bskor/
308a4(rgyud 'grel): nyid kyi thugs kyi khyod dgongs 'grub// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'khor ba kun 'grub pa// snying rje thags kyis sems can byang chub tu// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i sgrub pa'i yid dgyes mdzod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu ti badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de yan chad
308a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnyen pa dang nye ba'i bsnyen pa bshad nas/ sgrub pa dang sgrub pa chen po bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor lha rnams lus la bsdu// lte bar tsaN+Da lI sbar la// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te// spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs
308a6(rgyud 'grel): teHbsregs pas haM las ri bo 'byung // dang po sprin dang 'dra ba mthong // gnyisu du pa 'dra ba mthong // gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me 'dra ba dang // lnga pa thams cad snang ba ste// sprin med na mkha' 'dra ba ste//
308b1(rgyud 'grel): phyis ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtshungs// rmi lam rnam pa skud cig go// rang gi snying ga 'di nyid du// spros dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// spros med bsgom pa'i sbyor ba ste// thogs mtha' dbus med pa yis// 'khor med mya ngan 'das pa med
308b2(rgyud 'grel): de ltar ma yin dmigs ma yIn/ zhes mAr me'i rtse mo'i bar du'o// bar chod bgegs kyi mi tshugs phyir// gtor mA rgyun tu sbyin par bya// aM in+na dza ma dza la/ yak+Sha b+hU ta/ bah+ni ba u/ rAk+Sha tsan+na/ stu d+b+h+yAM/ mU ta pab+hU/ ta la
308b3(rgyud 'grel): pA tA la/ An+d+ha sat+su/ i daM/ ba laM/ b+h+yAM dza/ dzaM g+ha puSh+pA/ d+hU pa/ mAM sa/ pai g+ha/ aM b+ha sap+pa/ kadz+dzA sA d+ha/ khan+ti khu ni pe Ta gA da/ au A kau ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NAM/ Ad+ya nut+san+na tAta/ ai AHhUM phaT swA hI/ au trai l-ik+kA k+She ba hUM hUM hUM/ phaT/
308b4(rgyud 'grel): phaT swA hA/ snying po'o// bsam gtan mi nus rnal 'byor gang // de ni dag pa rjes su drAn// snying rje'i spyan ni dmar b+h+yo ste// yan lag nag po byams pa yin// phyag rgya lnga ni sangs rgyas yin// khros pas gdug pa 'dul ba yin//
308b5(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum po ni sku gsum mo// rus pa badren pa bzhi po'o// gzugs kyi phung po rdo rje ma// tshor ba gsang ba'i gau rI ma// 'du shes phung po chu ma'o// 'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// rnam par shes pa bdag med ma//
308b6(rgyud 'grel): don dam la ni phung po med// skye mched drug ni dag pa ni// mig ni gti mug rdo rje ma// rna ba zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sna la ser sna rdo rje ma// kha la 'dod chags rdo rje mau// lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// sa ni puk+ka sI ru bshad// chu yi
309a1(rgyud 'grel): khams ni rngon pa mA// d+hod ni gAd+d+ham mor shes par byA// rlung ni g.yung mo rab tu grags// gzugs ni gau rIr yang dag brjod// sgra ni chom kun ma rab brjod// drI ni ro langs mA ru bshad// ro ya chus
309a2(rgyud 'grel): za pang ma// reg byas spyod ma zhes bya// chos kyi dbyings ni mkha' spyod ma// de ljor dge pas sa dran byA// bdag gi sgra sgrub thabs rim pa 'di// blo zhen don du bdag gis brtsams// de yi dge ba gang yin pas// sems can/
309a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor ba las sgrol shig// dpal dgyes pa rdo rje'i sgrub thabs// slob dpon chen po bde ba'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d+har+m+ma tsan+d+ra dang / lo tsa ba d+harmA ts+tshan+d+ras rang bsgyur
309a4(rgyud 'grel): zhing gtan la phab pa'o// zhal gcig phyug gnyis pa'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ rat+na dz+wa la sA d+hA da na nA ma~M/ bod skad du/ rIn che ni 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i
309a5(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo// rtogs pas b+hAdz+dza gas pa'i gnas don ji snyed la// khyab pAr+ya bzhugs nas de dog spyad mdzod pa// shes rab thabs gnyis dga' bzhi thig le bzhi// sku bzhi spros pas 'gro don
309a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod la 'dud// ha cang rgyas dang ha cang bsdus pa yis// 'jigs pa bdag dang de 'dra rnamos kyi phyir// kye yi rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i 'am// rir chen 'bar ba'i zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs brtsam// rnal 'byor pa gang
309b1(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos dang // byang chub sngags spyod rim par gus// dal zhing zla ba lA rig kun+da mkhas// sngags rgyud sbyor bas bde byed cing // rdo rje dril bu ye shes dang // lha dang dkyil 'khor sbyin sregs dang // sngags dang rdul mo na tor ma
309b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / dbang bskur de nyid bcu rigs pas// dur khrod sha chu 'gram shing // ri dang tshang tshing bya skyibs sogs// me tog 'bras bu sogs brgyan par// bdud rtsi lha dang dris byugs nas// sgrub pa'i sngon du bsnyen par bya// de med na ni 'grub
309b3(rgyud 'grel): mi 'gyur// las kyi cho ga gang dag la// nye bar bsnyen pas 'grub mi 'gyur ba'o// dngos dang dngos bral kun+da dro bo// kye yi rdo rje 'khor bcas la// mchod gtor ldan par thun bzhir ba sgom// thun mtshams bzlas pa 'bum 'am khyi/
309b4(rgyud 'grel): yang na mtshan bzang mthong ba ste// tshogs 'jol bgegs zhi don grub pa'o// dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las// bsnyen pa'i bya ba ste drang po'o// / mkhas pas grong dang grong khyer dang // ri
309b5(rgyud 'grel): 'am sa phyogs nyams dga' ba 'am// me tog tshul dang dbyen gnas dang // rgyal sras khyim 'am dkyil 'khor sa rA// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di bri ba'i phyir// dang por+ya sa ni legs par brtags// chu ni g.yos 'khor
309b6(rgyud 'grel): shar dang byung // dma' ba dkar sogs grwa bzhi sogs// brkos nas slar bkang lhag gyur pa// khru phyed brkos nas chu yis dgang // gom pa brgyar ni 'gro bar bya// myur 'ongs de ltar nyid na bsngags// uM dum+ba ra n+yA gro d+ha//
310a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ku la dang ar+d+ha nA ra// bcas pa ru sbrul rgya pA 'dra spang // rang bdag sbyor bas gtor ma sbyin// de nas sa ni bslang bar bya// sa phyogs 'dir bdag che ge mo// dkyil 'khor rgyal po kye rdo rje/
310a2(rgyud 'grel): bzhengs kyis 'dri na gnas pa'i bgegs// 'di nas gzhan du 'gro bar gyis// dgun zla ra ba sogs brtsams te// zla ba gsum gsum lnga 'phye'i mog/ lho dang nub dang byang dang shar// bltas te g.yon pa'i zur gyis
310a3(rgyud 'grel): nyal/ pus mo lte ba rked tsam du// dngos grub rjes mthun lte nas brko// phug ma gseg ma rdo ba dang // shing bu sol ba la sogs daMr// rin chen 'bru sman nang du gzhug/ de nas shIshAn tu thos par brdung // gal te de
310a4(rgyud 'grel): ltar ma nus na// mkhar bsnams lag man nI sngags 'di bzla// oM ha nA ha na kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM b+hU khaM hA/ sa na mkha' byin gyis brlab pa'o// mchod dang gtor mar ldan par ni// rim bzhin bsgoms te mtshan
310a5(rgyud 'grel): ma brtag/ bkra mi shis na spong ba 'am// drag po'i sbyin sreg zhi ba 'ang bya// de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo yis// bgegaso dgra tshur bcad bsrung bar bya// rdo D+he ra ba bla re gur// hUM las gsal bar bsgom par
310a6(rgyud 'grel): bya/ der ni hUM bcu'i sbyor ba las// khro bo bcu ni rim par dgod// gshin rje mthar byid shes rab mthar// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed// Tak+ka khro bo dbyug pa bzhin// stobs chen mi g.yo mgon gyi
310b1(rgyud 'grel): yang / gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang // rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa'o// rdo rje khro bo skyes bu che// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// snying gar g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub// g.yas nA rang gi mtshon tshwa 'phyar// gshin rje
310b2(rgyud 'grel): gsod pa'i dbyibs tho ste// gzhan gyi mi thub rdo rje dbyug/ rta mgrin la ni dbang mchogo dmar// mi phyed bdud rtsi thal sbyor la'o// Tik+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste// dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa//
310b3(rgyud 'grel): maM g.yo mgon po rdo rje ste// chu skyob dkar po rgyal po yi// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// gtun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la'o// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o// dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar// mthar byed mthar
310b4(rgyud 'grel): byed bsgom par ba// gzhan gyi mi thub rdo rje ni// 'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu 'dra// pad+ma'i khro bo dmar po che// rdo rje bdud rtsi bdag nyid gnag/ mtshams kyi khro bo cher gnag cing // spyi bor rdo rje 'chang ba 'dzin// gshin rje rnam
310b5(rgyud 'grel): snong nyid kyis te// rdo rje sems dpas dbyigs pa tsan+da// pad+ma'i bo rnam gzigs rjes// rdo rje sems dpas thal sbyor la'o// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya// 'og tu pad+ma'i gdan bsam
310b6(rgyud 'grel): nas/ khro bo bcu rnams bsgom par byo// bsrung ba'i 'khor laM gzi brjid che// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar// dpag tshad brgya yi tshad tsam du// oM rok+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ dpal kye
311a1(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje'i bya ba'i rig pa'i lam las sa'i cho ga'i bya ba ste gnyis pa'o// / blo ldan 'khor lo'i sa dbus su// legs ldan sngon 'gro nas brtsams te// mchod bstod par gyis sbyor
311a2(rgyud 'grel): ldan pas// sangs rgyas rnams la gsol ba gdab// ma lus phyogs bcu bzhugs pa yi// mgon po bdag la dgongasu gsol// rdo rje 'chang chen che ge mo// bdag ni kyai yi rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor mchog 'di 'dri bar byed// bdag gi
311a3(rgyud 'grel): sgrub bya sgrub pa'i phyir// mthu chen ldan pa khyed rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab tu gsol// dpa' bo rdo rje dril 'dzin la// slob ma 'am 'khor sprul gsol ba gdab// de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba// de bzhin gshegs
311a4(rgyud 'grel): ba kun gyis gnas// chos kun bdag med ma yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs// kun tu bzang po s+t+waM yi mchog/ dkyil 'khor
311a5(rgyud 'grel): dam pa bshad du gsol// zhi ba chos mchog las byung ba// ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong mdzad// kun tu bzang po gsung gi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshud du gsol// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa d+hIm
311a6(rgyud 'grel): med/ kun tu bzang po thugs kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol// langs te mkha' bzhugs rgyal phyag bya// sangs rgyas kun sbyor nga rgyal bskyed// sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' bdag/ rdo rje nyi ma 'ang bdag nyid de// don yod
311b1(rgyud 'grel): rdorje chos bdag nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de nas kye rdo rje khros bltas nas// 'khor lo mkha' la gdegs par bya// yi ge ma Tas nyi zla'i mig/ phyogs dus thams cad sbyar ba dang // blo ldan 'gro la bltas nas
311b2(rgyud 'grel): ni/ 'khor lo'i sa ni yongasu bskor// rkang 'og rdo rje 'bar ba dang // rdo rje gsor bar gshin+da tu brtson// rol pa'i rdo rje 'gros kyi ga rau// mche ba gtsigs bcas hUM sgrogs pas// me tog snyim pa'i sbyor bas bya// spros la yul ga'i
311b3(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba nyid// mar me mthe bong brtan par bya// byug pa de yi rnam pa yang // lag pas mig dang de bzhin na// rkang pa zur gyi g.yas phyogs su// pheg rdob pa yi sbyor bas bya// de bzhin du yang g.yon du bskor// rgyun gyis gar
311b4(rgyud 'grel): byos te 'og tu// bskyod pa'i gar byas de yi rjes// myur bskor de bzhin gar byas te// 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor bar bya// g.yas brkyang ba dang grwa yon brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang / dkyil 'khor
311b5(rgyud 'grel): dong / sna tshogs thams cad dang / ru sbal gyi rkang stabs dang / bung ba'i dro ba dang / rgya mtsho bskyod pa dang / raM bo'i mchog dang / mdzes pa'i gom pa dang / khro bo'i gom pa ste/ rkang stabs kyi bkod pa'o// ral gri'i lugs dang / 'khor
311b6(rgyud 'grel): lo'i tshul dang / rin che'i tshul dang / pad+ma'i lag pa dang / ral gri'i lag pa dang / mdung gi tshul dang / gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang / 'phan gnyis pa dang / 'phan gsum pa dang / me tog gi tshul dang // bdug spos kyi tshul dang / mar/
312a1(rgyud 'grel): gzhu'i tshul dang / dbyug pa'i tshul dang / dbyug tho'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang / kha bcu pa'i tshul dang / ral gri bu mo'i tshul dang / sna tshogs dbyigs pa'i tshul dang
312a2(rgyud 'grel): mdung gi tshul dang / gong bu skyong ba'i tshul dang / 'phan gnyis pa dang / 'phan gsum pa dang / me tog gi tshul dang / bdug spos kyi tshul dang / mar me'i tshul dang / bri ri tshul dang / lA s+ye'i lag pa dang / glu'i lag pa dang / gar gyi lag
312a3(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / gling bu'i lag pa dang / pi wang gi lag pa dang / rdza lha'i lag pa dang / ku mu ta'i lag pa ste/ lag pa'i bkod pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang / skyil krung phyed pa dang /
312a4(rgyud 'grel): bkra shrIs kyi 'dug stangs te/ 'dug stangs kyi dgod pa'o// sgeg pa'i ro dang / dpa' bo'i ro dang / mi stag pa'i ro dang rgod pa'i ro dang / drag pa'i ro dang / 'jig su rung ba'i ro dang / zhi ba'i ro dang / rnam pa'i r-i dang / snying rje'i ro dang /
312a5(rgyud 'grel): drug gis rjesu bskyed pa'i glu dang / drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang / bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang / lnga pa'i rjes kyi grwa dang / blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang / 'khor nyan pa'i glu'o// nyung ngu'i dbye ba dang / sgrol ba'i dbye ba dang / 'jigs pa'i dbye
312a6(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / dbye ba phyed phye ba dang / rnam par 'dre ba dang / 'dod tshogs gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang / lkog ma nyid pa dang / rkang ma nyed pa dang / lce nyed pa dang / so nyid pa ste/ glu'i dgod pa'o// sa bzhi yongs gzung dus su yang //
312b1(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig 'du na rab bskul pa// sa shes rdo rje can gyis bya// 'di ni dam tshigs rim pa sku chog/ lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi// blugags kyu chags rnams thams cad nyan+ta// nga ni snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan// bsrung
312b2(rgyud 'grel): bya'i 'khor lo sbyor b+ha po// rdo rje yiswa ni gsal bA'i lus// sku gsum las ni skyes pa ste// gal ti la la 'da' byed na// 'jig par 'di la the tshom med// lus srul po dang kha cig gang // bde chen ye shes 'byung ba dang /
312b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems da pa'i rang bzhin skyes// zur gcig bgegs ni chen po rnam sa// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo na mo badz+ra kr-i d+hA yA/ ma hA daMSh+To ta kA Ta b+he ra ny+dza ya bAdz+dza san+do ha dAr+m+ma ya/ a m+l-i ta kuN+Da laM hUM phaT ces bya ba 'am
312b4(rgyud 'grel): ninenamaHsa man+ta krA ya bA kA tsit+ta badz+ri na ma/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ ma hA den+d+ho ta ka rA b+hai rA bA ya/ a sau muM sa la/ pa rU sha gr-i hi ta hastA ya/ oM a mri tA kuN+Da li/ kha khe khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tISh+Ta/ ban+d+ha ban+d+han+ta/ hai na ha na/ dra ha da ha/
312b5(rgyud 'grel): gar+b+ha gardza/ b+hi spr-i Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba badz+ra big+h+nAM/ bi na ya kAn+d+ha/ maM hA gr-i Na pa ti/ nI pi tAn+ta kA rA ya hUM hUM phaT phaT+wA~M ces brjod par bya'o// de ltar sa ni yongasu bzung la// bgegs med phyir ni phur bu gdab// stod du bge/
312b6(rgyud 'grel): 'joms khro bo la// smad du rtse gcig bsams nas gdab// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya haM b+ha ga wAn/ bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ oM g+hA g+hA/ g+ho ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ti phaT/
313a1(rgyud 'grel): kI lA yA sar+b+ba pA paM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra kI la ya phaT+Ta/ Udz+nyA pa ya twAM kA ya b+hUk+tsit+tA badz+ra nakI la yA hUM phaT/ bgegs med sa ni phyogs bcings nas// de nas lhag par gnas par bya// mchod
313a2(rgyud 'grel): gtor rgya cher bshams nas kyang // dkyil 'khor dbus su drisa~M byugs nas// lha mo bskyed de mchod byas la// lhag par gnus t+ye gshegasu gsol// kye yi rdo rje khros pa'i dra pa'i// mA ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin// !
313a3(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni dbang du gyur// che ge mo bdag dkyil 'khor 'dri// lha yi gnasu nges pa der// ba yi lho dang dri zhim sogs// sa byugs me tog tshom bu dgram// mkhas pas lha yi gnas de la// dkyil 'khor rang sngags yi ge sprul//
313a4(rgyud 'grel): spyosbyin drangs mchod bstod par du bya// de nas skyob ldan pus gtsugs te// lags par spros thog gsol ba gdab// bcom ldan kye yi rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin rgyal phyag 'tshal lo// slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed
313a5(rgyud 'grel): rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// thugs rje bdag nyid can rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor bdag nI 'dri bar bgyid// bcom ldan bdag ni gus pa dang // de ni gnang bar mdzad pa'i rigs// sangs rgyu sna 'gro 'khor bye don
313a6(rgyud 'grel): spyil/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bras gnas dang // gang gzhan gsang sngags lha rnams dang // 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang // gang yang 'byung po mthu can dang // gang su lha'i spyan mnga' tho'i// sems can bsnyen
313b1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba rnams// bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// bdag snying 'di zhes bgyi ba yis// kye yi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni// 'gro ba dag par bya ba'i phyir// yo byad ci 'byor pas 'dri na// de dang bdag slob mar bcas la// thugs ni
313b2(rgyud 'grel): rtse bar dgongs nas su// dkyil 'khor du ni tshogs pa kun// byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol// de ltar lan gsum gsol btab nos// bum pa lhag par gnas par bya// bumu pa rtsa ba nag po med// mgrin pa rnying ba ts+tsha
313b3(rgyud 'grel): cha dkar pos byugs te mtshan mas gI dag// kha rnams yol g+ha gos brgyan du// ti la dang gro dang sran mA dang // nas dang 'bras ni 'bru lnga'o// hA saM de ba ka pa ra// krI tA dz+r-i ma ni bri ha pA lA// kAr ni ka ni s+thAn lnga yin// gse
313b4(rgyud 'grel): dngul mu tig byi ru dang // nor bu rin chen rin chen lnga// mar dang 'o ma sbrang rtsi mngar// lan cha spos dang dri bzangs bzhugs// hUM bdun bzlas pa'i srad bu gang // me tig phreng btags rdo rje ni// dri chur bcug pa steng du bzhan
313b5(rgyud 'grel): bum par lha bskyed nas ni// phreng ba'i mgo nas lag gzung la// nyin re bzhin du thun gsum du// gtor ma byin zhing bzlas par bya// de nas bum pa so sor+ya bzhag/ las kun byed pa byang shwa ra du'o// slob ma yan lag kun
313b6(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs shing // shin tu dul dang spyod pa zhi// chos gsum la ni mngon dga' zhing // theg pa che la dga' ba'i blo// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor ba dang // bzo sogs thams cad rtogs 'dod cing // sbyor dang bsam gtan
314a1(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba dang // nyan dang klog la brtson pa dang // rtag tu bla ma gus 'dod dang // sbyin pa la sogs dge la dga'// de bzhinA la 'dod la mi dga' ba// longs spyod lA ni mi gnas pA// nga rgyal
314a2(rgyud 'grel): khro ba med pa gzung // gang+gA zhig tshul khrims 'chal pa dang // slob dpon dang ni rgan+da pa'i lha// sems can kun la spyod pa dang // ngan pa'i bdag nyid gdug sems dang // rtag tu sdig pa'i blo ngan dang // tshig kyul
314a3(rgyud 'grel): ngag rtsub smra ba rnams// 'di dag 'dra ba spang bar bya// glal te bde gshegs dgongs pa ni// sgrub pa don gnyer brtson ldan na// gzugs ngan yon tan med pa 'am// dman pa 'am lhag gnas bya bar rigs// ston pa de la 'di
314a4(rgyud 'grel): skad brjod// tshe 'di'i 'bras bu 'dod par gyur pa la// 'jig rten pha rol don mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol don mi 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol don gnyer skyes// 'jig rten 'di yi 'bras bu rgyas// de phyir 'bras bu mchog
314a5(rgyud 'grel): 'dod bya// de skad brjod nas slob ma de// rtag par bsam la gsol ba gdab// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgron po chen bdag 'tshalo//
314a6(rgyud 'grel): dam tshig de nyid bshad du gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po grong mchog tu// mgon po bdag ni 'jug par 'tshal//
314b1(rgyud 'grel): de skad lan gsum brjod par bya// de nas dpa' bos slob ma yis// yon tan dmigs byas tshig 'di brjod// khyod ni tshul chen snod yin te// bu tshur theg pa chen po yi// gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bstan par
314b2(rgyud 'grel): bya/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang // da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams// 'gro la phyan phyir bzhugs pa rnams// de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di mkhyen nas// dpa'
314b3(rgyud 'grel): bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags spyod pa mnyam med de// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// bdud sde shin+da tu mi zad pa// dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob pa'i
314b4(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ bdag gis thog ma med dus nas// log rtog dbang gis sdig gyis pas// thugs rje mnga' bdag khyed rnams kyis// spyan sngar bshugs kyi slan chad sdom// rgyal dang de yi sras rnams dang //
314b5(rgyud 'grel): 'gro ba'i bsod nams ma lus pa// de la yang dag yi rang zhing // byang chub dam par bsngo bar bgyi// gangang+gA dang gang gis 'dul 'gyur ba// de dang de yi skur ston pa// sna tshogs gzugs nar ji lta bu'i// rdzogs sangs rgyas la sgrub
314b6(rgyud 'grel): su mchi// kun rtog ma lus dag gyur pa// rang rig yang dag ye shes bskyed// lhan cig skyes dga'i ngo bo nyid// dam pa'i chos la'ang skyabasu mchi// go ri mas ji bzhini dbang bskur thob// ma log lam la nges gnas dang // sras
315a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dus tshogs mchog la// rtag tu bdag ni skyabasu Shan+ti/ yang dag ye shes me bo che// gti mug mun pa bsal ba dang // sgrib pa ma lus sbyang ba'i phyir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// rgyul sras dpa'
315a2(rgyud 'grel): bo rnams kyi lam// spyod pa dpag yas gang yin dang // mo bcos ji bzhin gnas lam la// da nI yang dag gnas par bgyi// de nas bla mas byang chub sems// ma skyes pa ni bskyed par bya// bskyed po slar yang dran du bzhug
315a3(rgyud 'grel): las kunu byed pas bsrungs nas nI// snying ga lkog ma spyi bo ru// rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo dwagA/ hUM AHoM las de dag dgod// spos chu rdo rje khu tshur dgo// snying ga lkog ma spyi bor gtug/ de bzhin hU~M AHoM brjod bya// oM AHhUM
315a4(rgyud 'grel): brjod// me tog la sogs rim bzhin byin// spyi bor me tog mdun du spos// mar me drini snying ga ru// kun byed bzlas nas gus pa yis// slob ma rnams la sbyin par byA// a shwata u dum+bA ro yaM// so shing sbyor mo bcu gnyis pa/
315a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yo ma gas srog chags med// rtse mo me tog bcas pa byin// sharA ram byung du khyA bas bzhag/ bcusA nus bltos pa med par ni// ba ko tsam du byug par dor// zhi la sogs pa'i dngos grub bstan// 'thor 'thung skyes bu
315a6(rgyud 'grel): gsum blud // oM A dza~M hA saM ba ra d+ha ni hUM phaT/ sa shing las bzlas pa'i sngags// oM hU~M biH bud+d+ha sarba pA paM ni tsI sho d+ha ya sarba bi kalpan a pa na ya hU~M/ 'thor thung blud pa'i sngag so// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i sngags bzlas pa'i//
315b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung skud dpung pa g.yus par btags// ku sha'i snying po rtse ma nyams// d+hi las byung ba bsam par bya// dang por spyi bor/ cig gzung bya// gzhan dag sngas dang stan phyir byin// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dum+ba ra'i me tog
315b2(rgyud 'grel): bzhin// brgya la ma na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung 'gyur yang ni mi 'byung ngo// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// gang zhig mnya ma med sems can don// mya ngan mi mnga' byed par nus// bskal pa
315b3(rgyud 'grel): bye ba du mar ni// sdig pa byas par gyur pa gang // de kun dkyil 'khor 'di 'dra bar// mthong bas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// grags pa mtha' yas sngags brjod pa'i// tshul la gnas pa smos ci dgos// skyob pa gsang sngags bzlas
315b4(rgyud 'grel): nA ni// go 'phang bla na med par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo glos shin tu mi g.yo bo// de dag gis ni ngan 'gro'i rgyun// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu 'chad// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam
315b5(rgyud 'grel): med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcas pa// bdag nyid chen po kun gyi ni// bstan pa 'di la khyod rnams kun// yongasu ba zung ste skye bzhin pa// de phyir khyed rnams thams cad la// sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur// theg pa chen po
315b6(rgyud 'grel): cher 'byung ba'i// la mo mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams der ni dong bas na// rang 'byung bskol pa chen po la// 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen pa yis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su 'gyur// don bshad bsrung ba byas
316a1(rgyud 'grel): s+yAma?// sha'i stan la nyal du gzhug/ la m+b+ha gang+gA dag cemazung ba// dkun dang ba rnyang la smras// rmyi la m+b+ha bzung ngan dus nas na// ma dge la sbyor dag gis gnam// dpal kye d+ha r+t+ti byung ba raswA ba
316a2(rgyud 'grel): las sku gon bya ba gsum pa'o// / mkhas pa mnyam zhing yid 'ong ba// ba yi lha dang bdud rtsi lnga// dri zhim chu yi legs byugs la// yaM rgyu ni khyA bdun pa// nang gi khru gsum mthe bong gsum// dkyil
316a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor cig ni gdob par bya// thig skung gsar pa mdzes par ldan// rigs lnga'i sa bon+da de mdog byung // ye shes lnga ldan sred bu gang // lnga phrag lnga ni rnam phyed la// nyi zla'i bar mig lcogs kyus dgug/ las kun byed pa'i slad bu yang //
316a4(rgyud 'grel): gtsang mas legs bkal dri zhim dang // bdud rtsi spang shing yi ge gsum// thig 'dzin gragrogs dz+dza yis btang zhing rang yang zla// khu tshur g.yon pas lte bor bzung // nub dang shar nas blo ljin gyis// mkha' dang 'og gi thAg gAng byA
316a5(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra sA ma ya sU tra ma taM kra ma hUM/ numA mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams// khyed kyis 'gro don mdzad dus lags// thig gis sgra yis bskul nas ni// de rnams 'dir gshegasu gsol// ltas dAn gyis ni dngos mo
316a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grub// thig smad tshad na slob dpon 'a chi// ring 'thung khyer na nad kyi thebs// phyogs 'khrul pa yis slob ma dang // slob dpon la yang nyes par gsungs// slob dpon slob ma shar nub tu// bltas te tshangs pa'i thig gdab bya// 'phes
316b1(rgyud 'grel): 'grib med pa'i shing shun sogs// phyed dang phyed du bgos byas la// phyed kyi phyed na lho byang du// bya rog rjes btsal chang thig gdab// de nas dkyil 'khor phyed tshad kyis// g.yas dang g.yon du rgya gram bya// shar nub phyogs dang
316b2(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs thig/ byang lho shar nub po ltas pos glang ba// mer gnas rlung po lngas bden bral nas// dbang ldan bltas te tshangs thig gdab// phyed la phyed phyed phyed du bgo// tshangs thig ngos rer brgyad brgyad 'gyur// dang po phyed
316b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyud de nang phyong // lhur byas sgo 'khyud phyi nyid dkyil// gnyis pa phyed phyed dang po lnga// phyed phyed byas pa legs shes bya// de rgyu ba me tog chun 'phyang ste// de rgyob rta babs ka ba yis// gsum pa'i phyed rgyob de phyed nang // rdo ro phreng
316b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa lha rnams yin// lnga pa'i phyed phyed dang po la// phyed phyed byis po chen lnga'i gnas// ba ra gnyis 'dod yon mthar lhur byas// sgro 'gram rin chen pha gu'ang de// drug pa'i phyed nAng mu tIg phreng // de rgyab phyed nang phyed
316b5(rgyud 'grel): phyed byas// ya phub tha ma dz+ha rje gdung // bdun pa rta babs ngag tu 'gyur// brgyad pa pad+ma 'khor lo gdugs// nga rgyab nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te// sna tshogs pad+ma rdo rje rU// me 'od ri mo bzhin bskor bar bya// de nas mkhas pas
316b6(rgyud 'grel): mtshon rnams la// buM aM dz+riM khang hU~M rnams kyis// rdul tshon lha yi rnam par sbyor// 'bar ba'i blta bya ye shes sbar// yang dag gzi bskyed sngags bzlas mchod// oM badz+ra tsi tra sa ma ya hUM/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste//
317a1(rgyud 'grel): sems can khams ni dag par byed// kye yi rdo rje rgyal chen gyis// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshang ngu par bya// bla mas g.yon pa'i khu tshur gyis// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// dkar dang ser
317a2(rgyud 'grel): dadang de bzhin dmar// ljang gu dang ni nag po nyid// mnyam zhing g.yas bskor rgyun ma bcad// mu g.yo bar ni tshonA rtsi dgye// sgra yi nyi shu chu ru nI// ri mo mnyam par dgye bar bya// sbom por bkye bar nud kyis 'debs// phra mos
317a3(rgyud 'grel): nor ni rnam par 'jigs// yon pos rnam 'grus chad pa yis// bla ma drung ni sleb mA 'chi// g.yas bskor minA bAr bgyi bA yis// tsha na ni phur bus btang byar 'gyur// dku ba rdo rje rtse rang bzhin// gnyis pa gser las
317a4(rgyud 'grel): dmigs pa ste// pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin rtsi// de bzhin gzhan dag mAnat+ta yIn// neg po'i nang du shes bya ste// 'di ni tshon gyi rim par bshad// shar du dkar po chen po ste// lhorar+ya nI ser po yang dag ldan+da// nub kyi tsha la dam+bAr ba
317a5(rgyud 'grel): ste/ byang ni ljang gu yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa bzhi cha dag ni// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od gsal bar// rtag par bdag nyid shes rab thabs// shin tu mnyayaM bzhag legs par bri// ri mo par ni nang gang gis// ma reg par nI bri
317a6(rgyud 'grel): bar byo/ kha sbyor gcig pa sgo bzhi pa// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyib// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje thig gis rnam par brgya na// ri mo lnga dang nges par ldan// der ni bum pa brgyad bri bya// rin chen lnga phyed rang bzhin no//
317b1(rgyud 'grel): yang na 'bras lnga sogs pa'o// dur khrongs pag drug gis bsam// de bzhin dur khrod sol bas so// ded bus pad+ma 'dab ma ni// brgyad pA ge sar ldan par bri// de dbus thod pa dkar po ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan par bri//
317b2(rgyud 'grel): dbang ldan+ta du ni seng ge ste// me yi mtshams ni dge slong ngo // bden bral du ni 'khor lo ste// rlung du rdo NAM bri ba ri bya// shAr gyi sgor ni gri gug bri// lhor nI cang twe'u bri bar byA// nub tu ru sbrul bri byA ste// de bzhin sbrul ni byang du
317b3(rgyud 'grel): 'o// lha mo kha dog dbye ba yis// phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grag/ bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs sngags// blo rgyun 'og rgyuni bri bar bya// mchod gtor rgya cher ba sha mos bkram la// 'brur mig lnga sogs gong lta bur/
317b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje sems dpa'i snyoms byas lo// rkang pa g.yos pa brgyad byas te// phyug gnyis kyi rdor rnal 'byor gyis// sleb dpon dkyil 'khor 'jog par bya// lus bkrus gtsang sbra dri nI me dang // sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/
317b5(rgyud 'grel): sgra yi nga rgyal byed// ha~M hi b+h+yo yis 'jigs par byed// de ltar dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskur// maM rAg ma tshang skyon rnams bsal// de nas slob dpon rang lha yis// spyir tshogs gtso bo'i bdag nyid kyis// dkyil la
317b6(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa rdul mtshon dang // gnyis med mkhar gnas kyang der gzhug/ byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur gyi// bar rdzogs byas nas 'chad pa yi// tshigs dkyil 'khor rab tu mchod// rang lces rdo rje bdud rtsi myang // phyi rol
318a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po'i gtor ma sbyin// sgra dro rgyus pa'i sbyin sreg bya// ma drug la sogs nyes pa rnams// rgyal ba rnams la bzod par gsol// dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las/ dkyil 'khA
318a2(rgyud 'grel): gyi bya ba'i rim pa ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas slob dpon rang lha y-i// sbyor nas dkyil 'khor legs bltos la// mchod dang bstod pa la sogs bya// phyi nang sbyin sreg dag gis kyang // 'khor lo mtshad
318a3(rgyud 'grel): de bdag nyid kyang // slob ma'i rim bzhin dbang blangs la// gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'khor lo ru// slob ma gzhug phyir bden pa bsgrag/ na mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa'
318a4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje che rang bzhin// kyai yi rdo rje drang 'grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyis rgyal// mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa maM mnga' rtag pa
318a5(rgyud 'grel): 'ang khyod// 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags pa// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba tshwa// bcom ldan de nyid kyis 'grub mdzod// shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang
318a6(rgyud 'grel): bo kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po rgya mchog gis// grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa// rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ sems can kun gyi
318b1(rgyud 'grel): yid khyab cing // snyems can kun gyi yid la bzhugs// sems can+da kun gyi yid la bzhugs// sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid// 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'o// bden pa bdag gis ye shes mchog/ shes rab
318b2(rgyud 'grel): thabs bA dag dkyil 'khor yin// bden pa yis mgon bdag la ni// khyed kyi 'dod pa rab rdzogs mdzod// chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med// gzung du med cing badz+rod du med // bden
318b3(rgyud 'grel): pa 'di yis dkyil 'khor du// gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni// kun gyis dri ma med mthong shog/ de ltar bstod cing phyag bgyis nas// 'di ltar yang ni gsol ba gdab// dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor
318b4(rgyud 'grel): du/ slob ma rab tu gzhug par gyi// sems can don du bdag gsol 'debs// bzod pa mdzad de dgongs su gsol// de nas slob mas slob dpon gyis// zhabs la gtugs la 'di skad brjod// dga' chen khyod bdag
318b5(rgyud 'grel): ston pa bas// slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'chalo// dam tshig de nyid sprul du gsol// byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol// sangs rgyas chos dang dge
318b6(rgyud 'grel): 'dun te// skyabs gsum dog kyang bdag la stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon po chen po bdag 'jug go// slob dpon gyis bsgo ba// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun las
319a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par gyur pa'o// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang // blo chen gyis ni gzung bar bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do//
319a2(rgyud 'grel): slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya// bla mA sangs rgyas kun+da dang mnyam// 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// zung
319a3(rgyud 'grel): zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam tshig khyod kyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad+ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par bshad// las kyi rigs
319a4(rgyud 'grel): mchog chen po la// sbom po thams cing ldan par ni// yang dag nyid du gzung bar bya// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// / de las gzhan yang bcu bzhi 'di// phas pham pas ni rab tu ba
319a5(rgyud 'grel): spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do// nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum du// nyin re zhing ni bzla bar bya// gang tshe nyams 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// kha nA ma tho sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyi srog chags bsang
319a6(rgyud 'grel): mi bya/ ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod lo log par mi spyad cing // brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// phung grol kun gyis rtsa ba yin// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// sems can gdul phyir ma gtogs pa// bya ba ma yin
319b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sbyang // dam pa nges par rten bya zhing // rnal 'byor pa kun bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhin rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// tsaM nus par ni rje su sbyong // theg
319b2(rgyud 'grel): pa sman la 'dod mi bya// sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor ba dag kyang yongs mi spang // rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba la// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhin po mtshon cha
319b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / mtshan ma go mos par mi bya'o// 'di dag dang tshig yin par bAshad// rjes mthun sdom pa rgya cher ni// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// slob mas brjod pa// dkon mchog gsum la
319b4(rgyud 'grel): skyabasu mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rje yaM rang // sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang tshags mchog lo// byang chub bar du skyabasu mchi// nga gzhan don
319b5(rgyud 'grel): norab sgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// byang chub mchog gi sems bskyed pogyis nas// sems can thams cad bdag gis mgron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'od sbyang bar bgyi// 'gro la phan
319b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/ sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams kun// bdag la dgongs pa mdzad du gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// dus 'di nas ni gzung
320a1(rgyud 'grel): nas sku/ dzAM srid byang chub snying po'i bad+ma dza ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges pa yis// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// tshul khrims kyi ni slob tu
320a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang // som+b+ha sa can don byeng tshul khrimasmai gsum// bdag gis so sor brtan por gzung // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa ni//
320a3(rgyud 'grel): deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po le// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rim chen rig mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la//
320a4(rgyud 'grel): nyin re bzhin du dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnams bzhi rtag tu sbyin// byang chub chen po ltos byung ba// pad+ma'i rigs mchog dag pa la// phyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni ma lus bzung // lam+ba kyi rigs mchog chen po la//
320a5(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni// yAs nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang tsaM n+yAs bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla na med// dom bla bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa ma
320a6(rgyud 'grel): lus bzung // mo bsgril ba rnams bsgral bar bgyi// ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgodo// zhes len gsum du bzlas//
320b1(rgyud 'grel): de nas slob mas gos dmar pos// gdong g.yogs me tog phreng bzung la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i bum pa'i chus// bsrung zhing sku gsung thugs sbyangs la// bu sdug khyod su tsi lnga dga'// slob dpon gyis ni gzhug
320b2(rgyud 'grel): phyir bri// skal bzang bde chenu bdag dga' zhes// slob ma blo chen gyis sku'o// de nas byang chub sems bskyed phyir// oM sarba yo gA tsat+ti ut+pA da ya mi/ brjod nas daM yi snying gar ni// rdo rje gzhug cing bsams nas
320b3(rgyud 'grel): kyo / s+phu ra twe mA yas+t+waM hUMHsid+d+hi badz+rA ya thA su khaM/ dang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob par 'gyur gyis/ de bzhino gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba 'di// khyod kyis dkyil
320b4(rgyud 'grel): 'khye mo mthong ban+d+he sa~M m+b+ha smra bar mA byed gcig/ dong pa dang mi ldan pa rnams la yang ma yI n+don zhes brjod par bya'o// gau nI la sogs rang rtags kyis// dam pa dgug dang gzhug pad+ma / yi ge l+yA nga
320b5(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du// badz+rad de dam tshig mchog 'dzin gzhug/ deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs zhugs kyis// ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dngos grub thob
320b6(rgyud 'grel): nas dngas grub gzhi ni lta smos kyang ci dgos par 'gyur ba rdo N+Di rdo rnaMmi shes bskyed par bya yis/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor tshon pa ma mthong ba rnams la sme bar ma byed cig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta ro//
321a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i snying gar rdo rje bzhag la// oM he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyis// snying la yang dag zhugs par gyur// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thAg tu d+hal nAs gshegs// pad nas yi ge gsum gyis sbyar// ma~M
321a2(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa 'thung du gzhug/ 'di ni khyod kyis dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na bsreg par 'gyur// dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub ster// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thungs shig/ oM badz+ro da ka tha tha wa/ dam bcas brtan par bya ba'i phyir// 'di
321a3(rgyud 'grel): skad brjod do// deng phyin chad khyod kyi dpal he ru ka nga yin gyis/ dus 'di byos shig ces bgo ba gang yin pa de yang bya dgos// khyod kyi nga la brnyas par ma byed cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs par khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar lhung bar
321a4(rgyud 'grel): gyur ta re zhes brjod do la/ de nas slob ma la 'di skad brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la// dpal he ru ka bdag la 'bab por gyur cig ces smos shig ces bsgo'o// do skad brjod nas de'i snying gar
321a5(rgyud 'grel): dbang chen dkyil 'khor mtsham su ni// rdo rjes mchin pa kha dog ser// laM las 'byung bar hUM bsgom bya// baM byung chu yi kha dog dkar// buM bas mtshan cing yongasu zlum// yaM las byung ba g.yo ba'i rlung // ba dan sngon pos mtshan
321a6(rgyud 'grel): gzhu'i dbyibs// de la sku gsungs he a bsgom// rkang 'og dz+haiMHni rab 'bar ba// rlung las raM byung gru gsum par// gnas par spar la slob ma dbab// de nas 'jig suM rung ba yis// rdo rje glu dang gar bya'o// a be sha ya staM b+ha ya/
321b1(rgyud 'grel): rang ra ra tsA la ya tsA la ya hUM a ha dz+haiMHlce la a ni dmar po zhig/ bsams te babs la slar yang bgo// 'dod chags rdo rje de gnas pa// smos shig rdo rje dge mi dge/ bsam pa de ni brtan bya ba// de la tiSh+Tha badz+ra brjod// me tog phreng
321b2(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo dor// pra tits+tsha badz+ra hoHzhes brjod do// de ni spyi bor bcing bar bya// pra ti gr-ih+Na tAM I maM satwa ma hA ba la/ blangs pa 'am ma blangs pa gnyis ni// mtshan ma gnyis 'am nye tshan ma nye bar ni// babs sam dang kyang de'i sbyor/
321b3(rgyud 'grel): bamig tu 'bar bcasi oM bsams la// he ru ka dpal deng khyod kyis// mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad// mig thams cad 'byed par mdzad// rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// de la bla mas 'di skad brjod// dkyil 'khor 'di la
321b4(rgyud 'grel): da lta nyid// dad pa'i shugs kyis blta byar bya'o// khyod kyang sangs rgyas rigs las skyes// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs// sngon ma byung ba mthong ba'o// slob ma yon dang bcas pa yi// bla mya'i zhabs la phyag
321b5(rgyud 'grel): byas te// de nas 'di skad brjod par bya// oM rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag bzlog so// oM rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor bdag gis de ring mthong // oM bsang ba'i dkyil
321b6(rgyud 'grel): 'khor chen po yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bdag dbang bskur// de nas gtso bo nas brtsams te// dkyil 'khor mtha' yi bar du bstan// nang gi dkyil 'khor phyed tshad tsam// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor
322a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di la khru do bar// dkyil 'khor gnyis par slob mar bzhag/ mchod yon zhabs bsil la sogs sbyin// bag chags sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// sleb ma shis par 'dod pa yis// bla mus bkra shis
322a2(rgyud 'grel): glu blang bya// phun sum tshogs 'dzin gser gyi ri bo lta bu'i mdog/ 'jig rten sum mgon dri ma gsum ni rab tu spangs// sangs rgyas chu skyes 'dab brgyud lta bu'i spyan mnga' ba// bkra shis des ni deng 'dir khyod
322a3(rgyud 'grel): li zhi byed shog/ de yis nye bar bstan pa mchog rab mi g.yo ba// 'jig rten gsum na grags pa lha dang mis mchod pa// dam chos rab mchog skye dgu rnams la zhi byed pa// 'jig rten bkra shis gnyis pa ding 'dir khyod la shog/
322a4(rgyud 'grel): dam pa'i chos dang ldan zhing thos pa'i bkra shis phyug/ dge 'dun lha dang lha ma yin dang mis mtshad pa// ngo tsha dpal gnas tshogs kyi nang na rab kyi mchog/ 'jig rten bkra shIs gsum pa ding 'dir khyod la shog/ dga' ldan
322a5(rgyud 'grel): lha yi gnas kyi dkyil nas 'gro don du// sngon gyi dus su brgya byin lha dang bcas pa yi// 'khor gyi tshogs bcas gshegs pa'i bkra shIs gang yin pa'i// bkra shris des ni ding 'dir khyed la zhi byed shog/ lum pa'i tshal
322a6(rgyud 'grel): du mgon pa'i sku ni khrungs gyur cing // srid mthar mdzad tshe me tog ge sar bcas pa dag/ rab 'bar 'bab pa lha mang gis mthong bkra shis gang // bkra shis de ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par
322b1(rgyud 'grel): gzhom par bya ba'i phyir// mAtshan phyed dka' thub tshal du mngon par dgyes bcas pas// brgya byin lhar bcas rjes 'brangs gshegs pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des kyang ding 'dir zhi byed shog/ chu bo'i 'gram du yon chab ste
322b2(rgyud 'grel): mer yongs bskor to// zhi phyir ngo mo tshar rab skyes srid pa dag byed pa// lto 'phye'i rgyal pos legs par bstod pa'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ grong khyer rab mchog ser skya zhes ni bya ba der// lha chen
322b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab 'jug la sogs rnams kyis bstod byed pa// bde gshegs thog mtho'i med par dge ba'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des nI ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ sems can thams cad la ni phan phyir byang chub po// rin chen chos
322b4(rgyud 'grel): mdzod thub pa las ni gang byung ba// sems can don grub nus pa rgyas pa'i bkra shis glang // bkra shis des ni dang 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ gser gyi 'od ltar shin tu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' ba// bai DUr+ya'i mdog 'dra ba'i rtswa bkram
322b5(rgyud 'grel): pa la bzhugs// skyil krung legs bcas mi g.yo'i sku mnga'i bkra shis gang // bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ sa dang mkha' las sna tshogs dbye bas kun 'byung ba// byams pa'i stobs kyi bdud sde las rnam par
322b6(rgyud 'grel): rgyal/ shing gi rgyal po'i rtsa bar bcom ldan bkra shis pa// bkra shis des ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ pa ra NA ser bzhugs nas bde bar gshegs bstod pas// sa dang mkha' la shin tu ngo mtshar gsal byung ba'i// chos
323a1(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo dam pa rab bskor bkra shis gung // bkra shIs des nI dIng 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ bsod nams las byed 'phags pa'i skye bos mngon bsten pa// bcom ldan shAkya steng ges ma lus
323a2(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa yi// phan byed dam pa bzang po'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis nges ni ding 'dir khyod la zhi byed shog/ dril bu dkrol zhing rdo rje gsor// glu dang ldan pa'i bkra shi sngo// gse ru la sogs pa'i bstan gnas
323a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ dar ni de ni dbang bskor bya// slob ma nges par byed du bzhugs// de bzhin de bzhin dbang bskur lo// lha yi sbyor ba gang yin pa// de yi phyag rgyas 'phrag nas 'khyud // dang po chu yi dbang yin te/ gnyis pa dbu rgyan dbang
323a4(rgyud 'grel): yin no// gsum pa rdo rje'i dbang yin no// bzhi pa rang bdag dbang yin te// lnga pa ming gi dbang bskur bya// drug pa yang dag sangs rgyas brjod // bdun pa bum pa'i dbang yin te// brgyad pa gsang ba'i dbang nyid do// dgu pa
323a5(rgyud 'grel): shes rab dbang gis te// de nyid rdo rje rab 'byor bas// brtulnga zhugs dang ni lung bstan pa// 'di dag rim par sbyin par bya// rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus// bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis// rdo rje 'chang bsams dbang
323a6(rgyud 'grel): bskur bya// rdo rje thugasu bsgom pas so// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi tAM/ rdo rje nyi ma rnami bsams nas// de la dbu rgyan sbyin par bya// rang gi rag mo skyes bu'i chus// bum pa brgyad pa thams cad kyis// rnga rje 'chang bsam
323b1(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra rat+na ka badz+rA shi li ho// thams cad sgyu ma bzhin bsgoms la// rdo rje tshigs bcang rab tu sbyor// rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pA// rang gis lagra pas snying gaR+Sha bya// slob ma'i 'jig rten dbang phyug gzugs// rdo rje sems
323b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje dbang gis ni// de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// shin tu 'grub phyir rdo rje long // oM shrI he ru ka a d+hi pa ti tAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa tiSh+Tha bI ra sa me yas+t+waM/
323b3(rgyud 'grel): slob ma d+hA mchogo bsnams byas lA// lha mo sgrol mas skye la 'khyud // rdo rje'i bdag pos dbang bskur bya// lag pas rdo rje dril bu dkrol// oM badz+ra d+hi pa ti tAM/ a b+hI Shiny+tsa mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa mA yA s+t+waM/ slob ma rnamasar mdzad
323b4(rgyud 'grel): bsam// ming gi dbang ni bskur bya// oM badz+ra satwa a b+haM ShIny+tsA maM badz+ra nA ma a b+hiSh+Te ka ta/ kyai dpal che ge moM rdo rje/ gang glang snang ba de kun ring // rang 'dod lha la sogs pa der+yA// rang bzhin dge pa'i dri med chos// sangs rgya
323b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes bAl+la bur+ya bya// 'di daM sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje snrums dpa'i phyag na bsnams// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bzung // rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga tA sid+d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya tiSh+Tha sa ma yA
323b6(rgyud 'grel): s+t+waM d+ha ra ya mi hi haM hiM hiM hi hUM// bdag gis bcom ldan tshigs bcad ni// rim pa bzhin du bsdu bar bya// bde ba can na bcom ldan 'das// nyid kyi gang tshe chos bstan pa// de tshe gsang ba'i dbang pos zhus// mi rnams
324a1(rgyud 'grel): ltar dbang bsgyur bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgod pa dag pa slob dpon te// de bzhin blta ba gsang ba'i dbang // lpags pas rag pa shes rab ste// de nyid gnyis gnyis 'khyud pa
324a2(rgyud 'grel): yaMyi/ dbang bskur ma 'ongs pa yin// bla ma'i zhal nas gsal bar 'gyur// 'di ni dbang bskur drug yin// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni// phyag 'tshal nas ni mdun 'dug ste// 'og nas 'byung ba'i tshogs bcad 'dis//
324a3(rgyud 'grel): slob mas bla ma la gsol gdab// mi ldog 'khor lo'i dbang stsol cig/ dkyil 'khor lha yi de nyid dang // skyob dang na gyis ni las rnam dag/ mgon pos bdag la bka' stsol cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshigs
324a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / gsang ba'i sbom po'i mchog rnams dang // sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon bgyi// de ltar slob mas gsol btab nas// bla mas skad cig ting 'dzin lo// gnas nAs de dbang
324a5(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba ri phyir// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mchog spro bya// nye 'khor ba dan rgyul mtshan stsogs// glu dang rnga sogs sa rA ni// gdugs dang bla res bres nas su// 'dug ste 'di ltar brjod par bya// rin po che
324a6(rgyud 'grel): yi dbang 'od ni// khams gsum pa yis phyag byas po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsum gyi ni// gnas las byung ba nga yis sbyin// dang po dum pa'i dbang yin te// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang yi no// gsum pa shes
324b1(rgyud 'grel): rab ye shes te// bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa'o// thams cad thabs kyi cho ga'o// bla med mchod pas mchod par bya// de nas lag nas lag tu ni// slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin// sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// rdo rje saH/
324b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun dga' nyid// rdo rje snyems ma'i bdag po bdag/ shes rab pha rol phyin ma las// byung ba'i dril bu'ang de la sbyin// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rdo rje dril bu'i ming nyid do// 'di de sangs
324b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas thams cad kyis// shes rab dbyangs kyis rjes 'gror bstan// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu gzung // byang chub mchog tu rgyal bas bzhad// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA hA/ 'di'i don ni/ rdo rje che dang dril bu che// gzungs cig
324b4(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rab gnas pa// deng khyod rdo rje slob dpon te// khyod kyi slob ma gzung bar gyis// mkha' 'gro lnga dang yang dag ldan// dam tshig lnga rnams yongs gang ba'o// mkha' 'gro mA yi tshogs dang ldan// slob ma rdo rje 'chang dbang
324b5(rgyud 'grel): bskur// dkyil 'khor pad+mo zhesu brjod// yid kyi dkyil 'khor mchog yin te// gzhal med khang zhes bshad pa ste// sems ni gzhil yas khang brtsegs 'phags// de yaM phyi rol gru bzhi ste// tshed ma mnyam por gyur
324b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o/ byams pa la sogs sems ni gang // thig skud bzhir ni brjod pa'o// thig gdab yang dag gang bshad pa// chos kyi dran pa'i rnal 'byor// lta ba thams cad rnam grol ba// ye shes thig skud dag tu brjod// rgyun
325a1(rgyud 'grel): ni yang dag gang bshad pa// tshul khrims mchogs kyi sdom pa mchog/ dang dbang la sogs sems gnyis ni// ra ba lhur ni byung ba nyid// gang zhig sgo bzhis bshad pa ni// rnam thar bcu ma
325a2(rgyud 'grel): dbye ba'o// rta babs ka ba bzhi pa ni// yang dag spong bzhi zhes brjod// ya phubs bzhi po gang yin pa// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi// sgo khyud bzhi ni gang yin pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhin gang yan pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi zhes
325a3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ me tog phreng bas brgyan byas pa// byang chub sems ni yan lag bdun// ka ba rnam pa brgyad po ni// 'phags pa'i lam ni yan lag brgyad// rnga yab ces nI gang grags pa// lam gyi bye brag ye shes brjod//
325a4(rgyud 'grel): dran pa yang dag gang bshad po// nyon mongs 'joms pas dra ba ste// yang dag 'gog pa'i rang bzhin gyi'o// 'khor los bskor ba gang yin pa// tshogs gnyis kyi ni rnal 'byor// nyon mongs phyed ni 'joms byas na//
325a5(rgyud 'grel): dra ba phyed par 'joms pa'o// 'di ni dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid do// phung po lnga ni mdor bsdus na// sangs rgyas lngar ni rab tu grags// rdo rje skye mched ngos par ni// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ sa
325a6(rgyud 'grel): ni spyan zhes kun tu brjod// chu yi khams ni mA ma kI/ gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma ni// drod dong rlung du rab tu grags// gti mug gti mug longs spyad pas// gti mug zad pa gshin rje gshed// des na phung pa
325b1(rgyud 'grel): mthar byed dang // de bzhin shes rab mthar byed pa'o// nyes pas nyes pa ljongs spyod pa// nyes zad shes rab mthar byed de// des na sems ni mthar byed dang // des na nyon mongs mthur byung dang // des na sems na mthar byang dang /
325b2(rgyud 'grel): des na nyon mongs mthar byed yin// 'dod cha gos 'dod chags longs spyod pa so// pad+ma mthar byed 'dod chags zad// des na gsung gi mthar byed yin// de bzhin sbyor ba mthar byed// nyon mongs thams cad zad pa dang //
325b3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin las kun zad pa dang // sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni// bgegs ni mthar byed ces brjod do// 'di lha'i kho na nyid// phyir mi ldog pa slob dpon gyi dab // de nas slob mos bla ma la// legs bslabs bzhin bzang
325b4(rgyud 'grel): mitshig kyus ring // gzugs dang lang tshes brgyan byas ma// phul la 'di skad brjod par bya// bcom ldan zhi ba che po kye// rdo rje rnal 'byor cig 'bad pa// mi phyed phyag rgya rab sgrub byed// rdo rje rnal 'byor yang dag 'byung
325b5(rgyud 'grel): ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che// gtso bo bdag lo yong de mdzad// 'khor ba'i 'dam gyi tshog su ni// bying ba skyabs med bdag skyabs mdzod// maM bskyod sbyor btong byos te// rtag pa'i sbyor bas rjes dran bya// slob ma drung
325b6(rgyud 'grel): du bzhag byas la// de yi rje su bla ma yis// gos la sogs pas mig bkab nas// brtags pa'i stan lo bzhag par bya// shes rab ldan par rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas// rang 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor gyis/
326a1(rgyud 'grel): slob ma rtag par bsams byas la// 'dzag pa'i rigs zhes bya ba ni// ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la// byang chub sems rnams dbang bskur ltar// nga yis gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// rgyun tu gyis khyad
326a2(rgyud 'grel): la dbang bsgyu ro// zad med de ni zad dogs na// nya phyis la sogs zhen pa spangs// dag po'i lce yi rtse mo yis// gnyis ka las byung blang bar bya// 'di ni de nyid bla na med// gnyis med ye shes brjod mi nus// chos dbyings rnam pa
326a3(rgyud 'grel): lta bur ni// zhi ba'i bde bas yang dag myang // g.yas pa mchog sbyin khu tshur gyis// snying gar chos gos grwa nas gzung // lag pas dril bu mgul du bsdam// bla ma rdo rje 'chang ba yis// dbugs dbyung thams cod yang dag
326a4(rgyud 'grel): blangs// shAkya thub pa nyid gyur pas// slob ma chen po lung bstan byed // khyod ni sangs rgyas the tshom med// skye dang rga dang 'chi mi 'gyur// 'jigs dang mya ngan nang mi 'byung // bde chen thag pa 'di la ni// bu khyod nga yis lu
326a5(rgyud 'grel): bsgyun te// de sbyar nga yi lung bstan khyod// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro nyid las bton// kye rang 'dod lU de bzhin gshegs// sa bla sa 'og sa stengs 'grub
326a6(rgyud 'grel): 'odi ni gsang ba'i dbang las lung bstan pa'o// / byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas kyis// chen po'i chen pos ji ltar byin// bdag kyang bsgral ba'i don du ni// ma mkha'i rdo rjes bdag la stsol// rigs pa dang
326b1(rgyud 'grel): yang na gzhan// rgyud gzhan las gsungs rimA yis// tshe dpag med kyi rnal 'byor sbyin// phyag rgya bzang mo rab brtags pa// lha mo mthar byed dga' ster ma// sna tshogs gzugs can brtser ldan ma// zung zhig zung zhig sems
326b2(rgyud 'grel): dpa' che// gzung bar byas nas mchod par bgyi// de nas chos dbyings rdo rje maM// do ma tshig sdom pa 'di skad ston// nus sam khyod kyi rdo rje can// dI chen dri chu bza' btung yan// rak+ta mAM sa ga pur dang // bud med mos par dang
326b3(rgyud 'grel): nus sam// b+ha ga'o byeng mi rtog gam// ltos shig rdo rje bde ba can// de nas de ni rdo rje can// rab tu rgod cing 'di skad smra// lha mo ci phyir bdag mi theg/ ga pur maM swa bdag 'tshal gyis// shes rab yang dag dud par bgyi//
326b4(rgyud 'grel): de nas lha mo gcer phyung nas// bdag nyid pad+ma ltar gzhug go/ rmad byung nga yi pad+ma yin// bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan// rtag tu rim bzhin 'di la spyod// 'di dang nam yang mi 'bral// chos dbyings 'di ni rnam par
326b5(rgyud 'grel): dag/ sems can khams ni rnam par grol// bde chen rgyal po 'di nyid ni// rang bzhin thams cad la mdun nas// nang gi rtsa yi 'khor lo lA// pad+ma la bzhugs par du gsungs// b+ha ga nang du na mkha' bzhin// 'byung po lnga
326b6(rgyud 'grel): bo brgyan bzhin 'chang // lte ba la ni ge sar bcas// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan// der gnas nas ni bsgom par bya// mi 'chi lha yi gzugasu ni// 'di la rtag tu 'joms pa yin// shes rab kyi ni de ltar gsungs
327a1(rgyud 'grel): badz+ra k+Sha hoH// de nas sngags pa rdo rje can// de yi rgyu yis dbang la// b+ha ga'i nang gI rtswa las ni// 'bad pa las ni rnyed pa la// bslab pa bla ma'i dam tshig gis// mdzub mos rab tu brud nas ni// lce
327a2(rgyud 'grel): yis yang yang rol mo mdzad// des ni rab tu rgyas par 'ong // de ltar rol mo mdzad tsam na// dra bas kyang ni shin tu rgyas// rtag pa'i bde ba rab tu byung // pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa dang // stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams
327a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / sa bcu po ni las 'das pas// rdo rje mtshan mAr de 'gyur ro// rdo rje bcing ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// rdo rje sems ni nges phyung nas// rdo rje lce yis bza' bar bya// mnyam par 'byung
327a4(rgyud 'grel): ba'i cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// ting nge 'dzin las sbyin sreg ste// de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor la/ rab zhugs dam pa mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun+da lba
327a5(rgyud 'grel): des grol bar// deng khyod yang dag gnas par 'gyur// bde chen theg pa 'di la ni// phyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur po yin// mi thub pa dang mi 'chi ba// sus kyang mi tshugs dga' bar gyis// srid pa shin tu dag pa'i
327a6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod 'daso// shin tu srid pa grub pa'i phyir// ston pA mchog tu gyur pa yin// 'di ni khyod kyi rtag tu bsrungs// grub pa'i dam tshig sdom pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi mnyam par gsungs/
327b1(rgyud 'grel): dam pa rtag pa'i bka' lung yin// slob dpon sman par mi bya zhing // bde gshegs bka' las 'gom mi bya// rdo N+De spyanA la smad pa ni// nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// sems n+dan rnams la byams dman min// bskal min
327b2(rgyud 'grel): de kho na gtam min// skal ldan sems can spangs maM byaM// bdag gis lus ni mi smad cing // dam pa'i chos ni tshang mo gzung // gzhan gyi chos la brnyas mi bya// byang chub snying po'i mthar thog tu// dkon mchog gsum ni
327b3(rgyud 'grel): spang mi bya// rtag tu dam tshig bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dril bu gzung bya zhing // dbu rgyan rtag tu gzung bar bya// rtag tu sbyin bsreg dgang bar bya// dkyil 'khor rtag tu bri ba ste// rtag tu bde gshegs rab gnas bya// 'byung po
327b4(rgyud 'grel): chen pa'i gtor ma sbyin// de la sogs pa dbugs dbyung rgyas// shes rab kyi dbang la brjod par bya'o// ston pa sa gsung ba sems dpa' che// yang dag dam par dga' ba thob// sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la//
327b5(rgyud 'grel): bde ba chen po gsung bar bya// de ni thog ma dbus mtha' med// srid dang mya ngan 'das pa min// 'odi ni dam pa'i bde chen te// gzhan med dag kyang med pa ste/ ye shes 'di ni ches phywa ste// snying po ts+tsho mkha' lta bu// rdul
327b6(rgyud 'grel): bral zhi ba thar pa ste// khyod ring yang ni pha de'o// 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// gnyisu med dang gnyis kyi gzugs// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// g.yo dang mi g.yi nges

328b2(rgyud 'grel): laM las// rlung mi chus dkyil 'khor du// b+h+rUM las 'khor lo de steng du// srid pa ba ro ma'i bag chags bsam// de dag las gyur pho brang ni// zur bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs bzhi// dra ba dra phyed ka ba brgyad// rgyan rnams kun gyis
