328b5(rgyud 'grel): dang g.yon// sngon po dmar po lhag ma gnag/ glang po rta bod glang rnga mo// smyos pa seng ge bI la g.yas// sa chu rlung me zla nyi dang // mthar byed nor sbyin g.yon na'o// lha mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis gnag/ gr-i gug thod pa g.yas g.yon
328b6(rgyud 'grel): na'o// oM bdA su kha d+ha ra ma hA su khaM da ta tsa tu rA nan+da b+ha ka bi sA ts+tshi tsu sh+tsa/ r+yaM ku ru Sh+wa me/ oM badz+ra ma hA dwe Sha tse tu rA nen+da da ya ka kha ga mu kha oM ka ra so nA tha/ hUM hUM hUM kar+yaM ku ru Sha mo/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu ra ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba A
329a1(rgyud 'grel): ko haM/ gnyis gnyis sgras bskul sa bon las// gzugs sgra dri ro'i rang bzhin dang // sa chu me rlung rnam dag pa// lha mo brgyud rnams rim pas bkod// dbang po tshangs stengs gau rI gnag/ phyag gnyis kyi
329a2(rgyud 'grel): gugA ro hi ta// gshin rjer rkun ma dbang po'i steng // dmar po cang te'u phrag pa can// chu bdag nye dbang ro langs ma// dmar ser ru sbrul thod pa bsnams// lus ngan drag por za phod mo// ljang gu sbrul dang pad snod can// dbang ldan
329a3(rgyud 'grel): gshin NAM puk+ka sI// dbang sngon steng g.yas dgu sna g.yon// byin zar raM khrod nor sbyin steng // dkar mo dge slong khar bsil 'dzin// bden bral de steng gtum mo sngo// g.yU sa na 'khor lo thaM da pa g.yon// rlung mtshamasna
329a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yung ma min steng // rdo rje sdigs mdzub sna tshogs ma dA gau/ yang na sbyor smras / haMHgnyis dbugs nas sbyor ba yis// rig ma dang btsas zhu baM las// puk+ku s+t+wa~M sogs glu yis bskul// snying rje'i thugs kyi
329a5(rgyud 'grel): rje btsun bzhings// puMk+ka sI dge skyebs mdzod tsig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin sbyangs nas ni// bdag la pAdo chen rnal 'byor mdzad// khyod dang byul na bdag 'gum mo// kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin sbyangs ni
329a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzod la// ri khrod ma ni bdag don bsgrubs// 'jig rten 'gron gnyer 'dod pa'i gtso// stong pa nyid la ci phyir bzhugs// gtum mo bdag ni zhu bar bgyid// khyod ma lags na phyogs ma 'tshal// bdag gis nyid kyi thu
329b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal gyis// dbang po'i dri ldan khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas// thugs rje rgyun 'chad ma mdzad cig/ bskul bas smon lam rjes dran nas// hUM dang aM las rab bzhengs pa// rnam thar bsdu dngos stong
329b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams ngag/ zhal brgyad zhabs bzhi bcu drug phyag/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing spyan// gsum gsum lhag ma bung pa mtshungs// nyi mar zhabs g.yas brkyang g.yon bskums// lhag mar gar gyi tshul
329b3(rgyud 'grel): gyis bzhengs// g.yas par glang sogs nad rnams bsdud// g.yon par sa sogs dbang phyug brgyad// thod pa snyam rlon do shal thong // phyag rgya lngas brgyan bdud bzhi min na// rnam shes dag pa bdag med gnag/
329b4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na gri gug thod pa ga yin// skra ser spyan gsum rgyan rnams rdzogs// yab yum 'khor bcos thugs kAr ni// pad nyir sa bon phyag mtshan las// ye shes sems dpa' bskyed par bya// sangs rgyas byung
329b5(rgyud 'grel): chub 'grub 'gyur bas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs bya// gau rI la sogs lha mo bzhi// dgug gzhug bcing dang dgyes pa bskyed/ oM k+Shani a kaN+Da ya nga a a tsi ni tha ba waM/ A~M badz+ra bet+tA lI s+pho TA ya baM/ oM badz+ra g+has+pho rI ba
329b6(rgyud 'grel): shaM ku ru heHmaMg dang rna ba sna lce lus// yid kyi skye mched rnam dag pa// gti mug zhe sdang ser sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog rdo rje mo// bdag med ma rnams rang gnas dgod// lus ngag yid gsum rnam dag pa// mkha
330a1(rgyud 'grel): stongs spyong sa 'og mA// sku gsungs thugs kyi gnas su'o// 'od zer gyis bsku'i dpa' ba'i chags// mchod byas gsol btab dbang bskur mthar// rigs kyi bdag pos dbu lha brgyan//
330a2(rgyud 'grel): e sdang gti mug sner sna dang // 'dod tshigs rdo rje gaur+m+ma sogs// gnyis gnyis rim bzhin phyag rgyas gang gi/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi Sho ka ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko hi/ rlung me'i steng du thad par ni// bruM AM dz+nye kha~M hU~M dang na/
330a3(rgyud 'grel): go ku da ha nA las nI// bdud rtsi rdo rje lce yis myang // oM sarba ta thA ga ta a mr-i ta sA d+hA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM/ de nas mkha' 'gro tshigs spros pas// zla nyi chus sman rdo rje ro// tsang te sgra dang 'khyud pa ste// gtse ba nas
330a4(rgyud 'grel): brtsams rim bzhin mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dzA badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ka hUM/ 'gro ba dugu cheni mi bzang pas// khyab par bzhugs nas he rAM kas// sna tshogs tshul gyis bdud rtsir bsgyur// sprin mchog dpa' bo khyo
330a5(rgyud 'grel): la 'dud// sarba ta thA ga ta stu ti badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma k+Sho haM/ de ltar byede bA ra gshegs drug gos// bas ma ga tAn rab tu 'bad pas bya// bsam g+hatAn mi nus rnal 'byor g+hang // daM ni dag pa rje su dran// de nas mkhas+t+ra pra
330a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags bzlas te// yeb yu ma~M zhal nas 'gal mo yi// 'khor lo bzhin du bskor bar bya// kha dag las kyi dbye bas dbye// oM aSh+NI na nA ya/ paM gor+d+ha ke sha war+d+ha ne/ tsi tu rbaM sha ti ne tA ya/ Sho Ta sha b+hu dzA ya/ kr-iSh+Na dzI nA
330b1(rgyud 'grel): tathA She/ ka b+hU l+yA mA lA ne ka d+hA ri Ne/ A d+hA ta krU ra tsit+ta ya/ Ar+d+hen+na paSh+TaM Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA rA yA/ kA rA ya kA ra ya/ gar+dz+dza ya gardza ya/ tardza ya tardza ya/ sho ShA ya sho Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rAn/ bar+N+Na ban+d+ha nA gASh+NA kAM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na sha trAn/ ha
330b2(rgyud 'grel): hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau hi ha phaT swAhA/ dpa'i tsai kyai rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las bskyed pa'i rim pa'i bya ba ste drug pa'o// / bskyed pa'i blo sbyang rnal 'byor pas// rjegs pa'i rimA paM las gnas
330b3(rgyud 'grel): par bya// lte bar gtum mo sbarA bi yis// de bzhin gshai Da ba lnga bsreg ma rgyun pa me pa rdzas 9// bsregs pas haM las ri bong 'dzag/ sgong skye gnasu chu skyes ni// 'dab po rgyad ge sa r-i bcad de laM// yab lnga yum bzhi kun+da gyi ngos// kun nas
330b4(rgyud 'grel): mi 'chi rgyan gyis mtshud// snying dbus zla bar gzhom med ni// sna tshogs 'od ldan d+he rdo rje// rdo rje bdag mkha' 'gro ma// cho gas bskyal bA bsgom par bya// mkha 'gro sna rtser yungs kar tsam// mchog dga'i tshul du thams cad
330b5(rgyud 'grel): bsdu/ rang 'dod lha'i rim rdzogs nas// snying ga'i sA bonA 'od zer las// A lAM kA l-i'i dkyil 'khor dag/ spros pas mchog bcu'i 'jig rten dag/ gnyis gnyis sgra yi rim bzhin du// lhan cig skye yi nywa zlar gyur//
330b6(rgyud 'grel): 'od zer bye ba brgya stong nas// ma lus bzhugs pas byin gyis rlob// de nas zla nyi nyi rir las// zer yang spu rtse de 'bum cha// 'bum cha'ang mi dmigs tshul de nyid// dga' ba chen po bsgom par bya// rdo ro dril yid 'ong mtshan
331a1(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ g.yas kyi gasbyor zhing g.yon gyis dkrol// bcu drug chu la yang dag rdzogs// thams cad thams cad bdag nyid la// chu bo rgyun tu 'bab pa dang // mar me rgyun tu 'bar ba dang // rtag tu de nyid rnal
331a2(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pas// nyin dang mtshan du gnas par bya// rdo rje pad+ma'i rnal 'byor gyis// der ni sa ni skye bar 'gyur// ga shaR+sha ba'i rnam pa byang chub sems// chu yi khams ni 'byung ba'o// bsgrubs pas me ni skye bas te// 'gro ba rlung du rab
331a3(rgyud 'grel): tu grags// bde ba na mkha' yi ni khams// gang phyir 'byung chen bde ba yis// lnga dang yongs bskor bas te// de phyir bde ba de nyid min// lhan gcig skyes gnyis gang skyes pa// de ni ldan skyes zhes su brjod// rang bzhin ldan
331a4(rgyud 'grel): cig skyes zhes bya// rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig/ thugs rje thabs yin rnal 'byor pa'o// phyag rgya rgyu dang bral nyid// snying rje stong pa thA dad me // 'di ni byang chub sems zhes bi // sngags 'dzub dka' thub sbyin sreg
331a5(rgyud 'grel): da/ ky-il 'khor tsan dang dkyil 'khor te// sngags bzlas pa'i thub sbyin sreg de// pa la 'khor lo // ti 'dzin gyi rang bzhin// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos sgrib no// nye bar thub par gyur pa'i rtags//
331a6(rgyud 'grel): dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba nyid// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa dang // bzhi pa mar me nye bAr ba// lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste// sprin med na mkha' 'dra ba nyid// phyi nang sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar// rmi lam rnam pa skad cig
331b1(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam lngas/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i bya ba'i ste bdun pa'o// / mkhas pa sngags kyi mthar phyin ci
331b2(rgyud 'grel): bstan bcos kun la 'jigs med pas// 'jig rten tha snyad rjes 'brangs te// rab tu gnas pas cho ga bya// lus bkrus dris bsgres gos btsang bgos// do shal rkang gdub dpung rgyan dang // rna cha gdu bu sor gdub sogs// rgyan rnams
331b3(rgyud 'grel): kun gyis brgyan byas te// zla ba dag dang tshes grangs dang // bza' dang skar ma bzang po la// gnas ni yid 'ong 'du 'dzi sogs// skyon spangs rnam mdzes bla gab can+da// ba yis rnam lnga dri zhim byugs// me tog sil ma sna
331b4(rgyud 'grel): tshogs dgram// gzugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan la stsogs// bla re mchog ni bre bya zhing // bkra shis rnams kyis brgyan pa yi// bum pa rin chen sogs gang dang // pi wang gling bu 'khar rnga sogs// glu gor dga' ston cher bya'i phyir// /
331b5(rgyud 'grel): ci 'byor mchod pa legs bshams nas// gong ma'i cho gas bsrung bar bya// de nas gtor ma legs byin nas// sku gsungs thugs kyi mtshan ma gang // sku gzugs glegs bam mchod rten sogs// dang po nyes pa bkru bo'i
331b6(rgyud 'grel): phyir/ ba yi lci ba chu dang zho// 'o ma mar gyis bkrus 'og tu// 'bru mar gyisau kyang byug par bya// 'bru mor shun pagos lngas gsal por bya'o// u dum+ba ra shi r-i Sha// a shwata tha dang n+ya gra d+ha// pa ra ka ta ya shun pags te//
332a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas dri lngas khrus gsol ba// tsan dan gnyis dang gur gum dang // la gu gran ta ka lnga'o// phyi dro sku gzugs 'du byas pa// 'og nas 'byung ba'i rim nyid kyis// lhag par gnas bya buM pa yang ka/ snga mAM
332a2(rgyud 'grel): cho ga bzhin du'o// lhag gnas phyogs char khrus sa ni// zur bzhi khru bzhi khru do dpangs// yid 'ong mdzes byas gdan stengs bzhugs// bkra shis rol mor bcas khrus gsol// ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis kyang // lha rnams kyis
332a3(rgyud 'grel): nikhrus gsol ba// lha yi chu ni dag pa ste// de bzhin bdag gi khrus gsol lo// khyod ni sbyin pa'i rang bzhin chus// ser sna'i dri ma sbyong mdzad cing // gtong ba'i dri yis rjes bsgos bya// khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud//
332a4(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni tshul khrims rat+na bzhin chus// khrims 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad cing // tshul khrims dri yis legs bsgos pa// khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// khyod ni bzod pa'i rang bzhin chus// zho sdang dri ma sbyong mdzad
332a5(rgyud 'grel): cing / byams pa'i dri yis legs bsgos pa// khrus legas+ho mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud // khyod ni brtson 'grus rlung bzhin chus// lo lo'i dri ma spyod mdzad cing // brtson 'grus dri yis legs bsgos pa// khrus logs
332a6(rgyud 'grel): mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// khyod ni bsam gtan rang bzhin chus// rnam g.yengs dri ma sbyong mdzad cing // ting 'dzin dri yis legs bsgos pa// khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chu bo drug gis khrus mdzad/
332b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod ni shes rab rang bzhin chus// shes 'chal dri ma sbyong mdzad pa// ye shes dri yis legs bsgos pa// khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chu bo drug gis khrus mdzad cing // dri ma rnam drug spyod mdzad pa// rgya chen
332b2(rgyud 'grel): yon tAn drug ldan pa// khrus legs mdzad la phyag 'tshalalo// gang la nyes pa mi mnga' zhing // yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas de la thar don du// dang baMs bdag gis khrus gsol// oM sarba ta thA gr-i ta/
332b3(rgyud 'grel): kA ya bi sho d+hi ne swe hA/ ba oM rnam lnga'o// oM hAM trAM hrIMHmar khu'i'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta A b+hi She kA ta so ma ya shrI ye AHhUM swAtA/ sku khrus gsol ba'i sngags// de nas mkhas pas bak+ku shis kyis// tshigs bcang 'di
332b4(rgyud 'grel): yang brjod par bya// nyin mo bkra shis mtshan bkra shis// nyi ma gung la gnas bkra shIs// nyin mtshan rtag tu bkra shisr-i pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ding 'dir stsol// nyin mo bkra shisna mtshan bkra shis// nyi ma'i gung
332b5(rgyud 'grel): la gnas bkra shis// nyin mtshan rtag tu bkra shi swa pa// dam chos rnams kyis ding 'dir stsol// de ltar kun la sbyar/ dge 'dun rnams kyis ding 'dir stsal// rgyal sras rnams kyis ding 'dir stsol// phyogs skyong rnams
332b6(rgyud 'grel): kyis ding 'dir stsol// rgyal sras rnams kyis ding 'dir stsol// phyogs skyong rnams kyis ding 'dir stsol// srung ma'i tshogs kyis ding 'dir stsol// de ltar khrus gsol de 'og tu// gos kyis phyi zhing dri lngas byug/ sku la/
333a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni// bdung rtsi 'khyil pas bsrung bar bya// de nas sku sogs mi dmigs la// rang gi sngags dang phyuglu rgyu ste// de la sgra sogs rdzogs pa la// spyan drangs mchod pa la sogs
333a2(rgyud 'grel): b+h+yabyA d+h+r-i wAr sa sA r+m+ma sa thams cad drug/ dga' ldan du ni gnas nas// lha mo skye 'phrul lhums gshegs pa// de bzhin 'dir ni gshegasas gsol// oM badz+ra~M gr-i nA~M A kaR+Sha yA dzA oM badz+ra tsan+da br-i tha~M sha ya s+t+waM oM badz+ra bed+d+ha wI ba
333a3(rgyud 'grel): oM badz+ra g+hasmA r-I kr-i shA~M ku ru hoH'dir ni rtag tu bzhugs nas kyang // bAN+ye ga~M sA dz+dzas suM gzung ba dang // byang chub sems ni rab 'phel phyir// brtan par 'dir ni bzhugasu gsol// oM badz+nyA d+ha re d+ha rA/ d+hA ra ya~M d+hA rA s+yA/ ma
333a4(rgyud 'grel): dz+dza dz+yAk+ShA saM dz+yotrIn+tu/ AM sa n+d+hi pUR+ShA ma s+yA sh+tsaH/ s+yair+b+hi d+h+r-i dz+nyAM na dzaMk+ShA a d+h+waMd+h+r-iSh+Ta/ s+yAM b+h+yAMHsmr-in+na ti ma b+hid+hIn mo sa mA mas+sa hI rAt+sa d+h+waMk+ShA sa dz+hi Sh+Ta/ smr-i badz+dza d+hAr+m+mas ma yAs+sir+N+Nasat+sa lu A rauSh+Ta kaM A d+h+waMd+hi/ prA thA thAM tsitsi hU~M/ b+hud+d+he
333a5(rgyud 'grel): ad+d+hid+hiSh+Tha/ oM ma he rat+naM a rai d+hi tISh+Tha oM dI Sha ra ti oM d+h+waM tiSh+Tha/ aM nA ga ra~M d+hi a d+hi d+hi mu ga sogs// rdo NA~M ga sam+ba ni gnas gsum dgod // dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyis// rang snying gan suM ya~M sa
333a6(rgyud 'grel): bsam// ye shes bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba yis// mchod pa'i rim par dbul bar bya// 'chang par 'gyur ba'i cho ga yis// rgya cher rab tu mchod nas ni// blo dang ldan pas bstod par bya// mi bskyod rdo rje ye shes che// rdo rje dbyings ni mkha
333b1(rgyud 'grel): chen po// rdo rje gsum mchog dkyil 'khor gsum// rdo rje dbyings la phyag 'tshal bstod// rnam par snang mdzad dag pa che// rdo rje zhi ba dga' chen po// rang bzhin 'od gsal mchog gi mchog/ ston bya rdo rje phyag 'tshal// rin chen rgyal ba
333b2(rgyud 'grel): rashA t+yA za ba// rdo rje na mkha' dri ma med// rang bzhin dag pa gos med po// rdo rje sku la phyag 'tsha lo// rdo rje mi 'chi rgyal po che// mi rtog na mkha' rdo rje 'dzin// 'dod chags pha rol phyin pa brnyas// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tsha'o// don yod
333b3(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje rdzogs sangs rgyas// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs mdzad pa// rang bzhini dag pa nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshalo// der ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang // sbyin sreg gter ma'ang rgya ste par blo// mthong dag ma mtha
333b4(rgyud 'grel): 'bras bu drug/ phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur// dpal kye rdo rje bya ba'i lam las/ rab tu gnas pa'i bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// / blo ldan khrus byas rgyan rnams brgyan// dkyil 'khor bsgrub dus gnas

334a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste// rin chen cha ru sprin rab bskor bya// rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni// dgug pa'i las ni yang dag brtsam// gdug pa'i sems kyis bsang ba ste/ me yi char
334a2(rgyud 'grel): sprin gdab par bya// zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po ste// rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste// dbang ni zla bo phyed pa 'dra// dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs// bsad dang zhe sdang las la ni// na mkha'i khams dang mtshungs pa'o// khru gang pa
334a3(rgyud 'grel): dang khru phyed par// rgyu dang zla bas ni zhi ba ste// khru dro pa dang khru gang ba// rgya dang zabs ni rgyas pa yin// dbang dang dgug pa 'ang khru gang po// khru phyed rgya dang zabs bstana?// ser mo nyi shu de yi phyed// rgya zabs bsang dang zhe sdang

334a5(rgyud 'grel): la dmar po gragaso// gsod dang zhe sdang nag po'o// 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri rdo rje ci rigs dgong // rang 'dod lha'i rnal 'byor gyis// las kun byed pa'i sbyin sreg ste// tshad dang dbyi bos dang kha dog dang / zhi ba dang mthun
334a6(rgyud 'grel): shar blta'o// dgang gzar dbye ba bshad par bya// gser ni m+ba mchod sbyin zhing // yu ba khru do mchu sor brgyad// zhang zabs rdo rje sar bzhi pa// kha ni pad+ma'i rnam po mtshungs// ska rags gru bzhi mdzes pa ste// 'og tu pad+ma logs
334b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya// ran tshan sar gnyis su ba'i mgor// tha mar rdo rje saru drug pa// da ni dgang gzar mtshan nyid do// blag gzar yu bA khru gang ste// mchur ni sngar drug zhang dang zabs// rdo rje sor gsumu pad 'ang ba mtshungs// rin chen sngar
334b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig gsum rdo rje// gzhan yang da gang gzur blag gzar gyis// yu ba khru gang bya ba ste// 'og tu rdo rje rim tshon bya// / de yi gang gzar rgyur sa ra bzhi// zabs su sor bzhi nang rdo rje// sor bzhi'i mthar ni rdo rje ste// bar du pad+ma'i
334b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dab ma'i dbyibs// blugs gzar pad dbyibs sor gnyis te// zab su sau ra gtsug nang rdo rje// dgang gzar blugos gzar kha rang gi// lha yi sa bon rab 'bar bsam// re pha 'ang de yi khar dgod bya// yang na ser mo lnga dang gisu//
334b4(rgyud 'grel): bcer bas kyang ni bya bar gsungs// me tog bdug spos mar me dang // de bzhin dri yis dung sogs g.yas// g.yon du sngags kyi mcho yon snod // mdun du snod ni bzhag par bya// mchod sbyin shing sogs ya ga les// rtse ma
334b5(rgyud 'grel): mchog ni ma nyams pa// bzang po lo ma gnyis ldan pa// las kyi dbye bas dbye bar bya// rgyas pa la nI snor bcu bzhi// zhi ba sor ni bcu gnyis pa// dbang li sdor bcu sdang ba dang // gsang pa la yang sor mo brgyad// sha lnga dang
334b6(rgyud 'grel): ni bdud rtsi lnga// rgyan 'bru a mra sbrul 'jigs dang // kha 'dzag skyes ma rtse mo ni// 'bras bu rnams ni sbyin sreg bya/ tsam pa a shwa kaM dang glu// ka ti pa dang srid bsgrub nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas// mai ta ga~M 'dis ni
335a1(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya// yid kyi mar khu bsam pa dang // 'bras so chags med 'bras dang ni// 'bru dang zho yi zan dang ni// til dang de bzhin mnyam pa shing // dUr ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid// bAsamA gtan rdo rje
335a2(rgyud 'grel): sbyin sreg bya// me tog la sogs rdzas rnams ni// las kyi dbye bas kha dog dbye// dkar ba zhi bar byed par brjod// sar pa rgyus pa sgrub thabs la// dbang dang dgug par dmar po NAM// b+h+ra ma'i las la nag po'o// skyil gyis zhi
335a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas pa zho// tsher mas de bzhin bsad pa la// zhe sdang sogs la'ang tshor mar brjod// dbang dang dgug la ut+pala'o// bdud rtsi 'khyil sngags yungs kar bzla// khu tshur gnyis kyi 'dod lha la// rang gi bskor bas rab bas/
335a4(rgyud 'grel): to/ gnyis kyi bar du sbyor bar+ya bya// gcig car khu tshur gnyis dag gis// g.yas su bskor bya yang bya'o// sngon bzhin yungs kaR+Sha me snong la// snang bar bya phyir gzhug par bya// oM sarba b+hA pAM da ha na bAdz+nyA ya badz+ra satwa
335a5(rgyud 'grel): sarba prA pa dA ha swA hA steng ba'o// me shes rnam shes nang ba kug ste// snyim pa sa r+m+ma ni blang byas nas// bskor te stong phyir m+b+hi ru yang // ny-i ka bzhin du bzhug par bya// oM hU~M ta Ta phaT nye rog go// de nas maM shing lha sogs rdzas// bAsang
335a6(rgyud 'grel): la sbyangs phyir sngags 'di gdon// oM shrI swA hA/ mar sbyang ba'i sngags// oM a swA hU~M/ rdzas dkru ba'i sngags// oM badz+ra swAhA/ 'bru sbyang ba'i sngags// aM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rdzas gzhan sbyang ba'i sngag so// oM a sAhA/ maM
335b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyang ba'i sngagaso// sbyin sreg yan lag las byung zhing // thab khung bas khung thub khung bzhug/ ting nge 'dzin gyis me sbar la// yid kyis mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin// de ni so sor snang ba ste// bsam gtan las byung sku mnga' ba// de la
335b2(rgyud 'grel): zhabs bsil bzhol bsil dang // mchod yon 'thor 'thung rim bzhin dbul// ha cang ring min rtse ma nyams// g.yas bskor shar nas ku sha dgrom// rtse mo phyogs gcig bstan bya ste// stegs bu'i steng du bzhag pa
335b3(rgyud 'grel): bya/ tsan dan+t+ra a ka ru shing ngam// gzhan yang dri yis shing dag gis// sbyin sreg bya phyir rlung yab kyis// me sbar gzi bskyed mtshan ma brtag/ kha dog dri dang rtse mo 'khyil// gzugs dang sgra lA sogs pa yi// dge dang mi dge
335b4(rgyud 'grel): bar gyur te// zhi ba kha dog dkar 'bar ba// rgyas pa ser po'i rnam pa ste// dbang dang mngon smod dag la ni// dmar dang gnag po'i me ni bsngags// brgya byin bzang po'i gzhu 'dra ste// g.ya su 'khyil pa'i mchog yin no// dang
335b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i sgra ltar snyan pa dang // me lce snum zhing rtse mo can// sgeg blugs bsres pas yon bdog phyir// me ni khong du chung phyir bar+d+hag/ me rtag rnam 'phro du ba mang // rim gyis 'bar zhing khyad kyis 'phro// mtha' mar rang 'bar
335b6(rgyud 'grel): gar+b+ha byin tshun// cha nang 'od zer 'bri ba dang / rtse gsum zhib mo 'dra nyid dang // de bzhin pa lang 'gro 'dra ba// de la sogos pa'i mtshan ngan pi// mo dag rnams kyang rtag par bya// ma yi dbus su bsgom bya ba// pad+ma nyi ma'i
336a1(rgyud 'grel): dkyil 'khor la// spyan gsum zhal bzhi phyag bzhi'i lha// gsus chen ral pa'i thor tshags can// g.yas pa mchog sbyin phreng ba ste// g.yon na dbyug pa spyi blug so// las dang rjes 'thun kha
336a2(rgyud 'grel): dog can// ra yi skye gnas las byung bsgom// tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che// me lha drang srong bram ze mchog/ sreg blug zhal zas bzhes slad du// 'di nyid du ni bzhugs gsol// gzi brjid chen po me yi lha// 'dod pa
336a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad sgrub po po// thugs rjes sems can don mdzad po// 'di nyid du ni bzhugasu gsol// oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba ri Shi dI dza satwa ma gr-i a hu ti a ha ra asmi san+ni hi to b+ha pa/ 'chad pa'i cho gas mchod byas
336a4(rgyud 'grel): la/ spos khang yongasu gzung byas te// 'dod don dngos grub rtogs bya'i phyir// dam tshig yang dag brjod par bya// oM badz+ra a na la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wA la ya sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT dri sh+ya dzaHhUM baM ho// sa ma ya
336a5(rgyud 'grel): s+t+waM A haM/ dam tshig sbyin pa'o// dgang gzar blugs gzar bzang po yi// rdo rje mtshan par sa bon bsgom// lag pa g.yas byas gzung byas te// pus mo'i bar du gnas byas nas// ye shes bdud rtsir byin rlabs rdzas
336a6(rgyud 'grel): me yi lha la sreg blu gos dbul// oM ag+na yai swA hA/ mar gyi'o// oM sarba pA pa~M da ha na ma hA badz+ra sarba pA pa~M da ha swA hA/ til nag gi'o// oM badz+ra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras ma chags po'i'o// oM sarba saM pa di swA hA/ zho dang zas mtshag
336b1(rgyud 'grel): gi'o// oM badz+ra bi dz+nyA yU swA hA/ 'bras sngo ba'i'o// oM ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ mon spyan gre'u'i'o// oM badz+ra g+hasma rI swA hA/ gro'i'o// oM badz+ra a yu She swA hA/ dur bya gzhon nu'o// oM a pra ti hA tA badz+rA ya swA hA/ ku sha'i'o// oM badz+ra bi dza
336b2(rgyud 'grel): ya swA hA/ u dum+ba ra'i'o// oM bo d+hi brik+Sha ye swA hA/ byang chub kyi shing gi'o// oM badz+ra la tA ya swA hA/ pa lak+Sha'i'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA ya swA hA/ n+ya gra d+hi'i 'o// oM sA ha ka rA ya swA hA/ a ma'i'o// mthar ni swA hA/ zhi ba ste/ rgyas pa'i dus
336b3(rgyud 'grel): su bai Shi Ta// mthar ni hUM phaT gsad pas la// dgug dang dbang la dzaHdad+ya hrIHci 'byor mchong gnas me ye lha// rdo rje 'dzin pas bstod par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshang dbang mchog/ gis sras// me lha'i rgyal po Tak+kis dbang
336b4(rgyud 'grel): bskur ba// shes rab mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad bsreg/ 'dzin byed me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud// tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon gyis sras// me lha'i rgyal po drang srong mchog/ 'byung po yongasu bskyang ba'i phyir// thugs
336b5(rgyud 'grel): rje dbang gis sku sprul pa// rigs sngags grub pa'i drang srong tshul// nyon mongs bsreg pa'i shes rab 'od// bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar// mngon shes rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan// thabs kyis sprul pa'i thog pa
336b6(rgyud 'grel): bcibs// rigs sngags gsungs zhing bgrang 'phreng 'dzin// bdud rtsi bcud ldan gun+d+he bsnams// chos kyi bdud rtsi yongs la bsil// nyes pa'i skyon bral tshangs par spyong // 'jig rten gnas kyang mya ngan las 'das// zhi ba
337a1(rgyud 'grel): brnyes kyang thugs kyi che// de bas bstod de phyag kyang 'tshal// de nas yi ge brgya pa bzla// gsang gtor bya ste me lha yi// thugs kar rang lha bskyed byas la// spyan drangs mchod bstod la sogs bya//
337a2(rgyud 'grel): dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pas khyab pa yi// chos sku na mkha' lta bur dbyer med kyang // thabs dang shes rab gzugs brnyan skur ston pa// bcom ldan 'khor bcas 'dir ni gshegasu gsol// ma lus sems can tu
337a3(rgyud 'grel): gyi don slad du// bdud sde dpung bcas mo lus 'joms mdzad cing // dngos rnams ma lus ji bzhin mkhyen gyur pa// bcom ldan 'khor bcas 'dir ni gshegasu gsol// lhag pa'i rdzas kyis dgang blugs kyis// ma lha mtsha
337a4(rgyud 'grel): dgashegasu gsalaM// oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wAn+di b+ha ga taM sa ma ye nA tsa an+d+ra taM saM pra tIts+tsha pU dzA tsar+ya pra sa~M nga ma/ mchod yon phul te dgug sogs bya// byin brlabs dbang bskur legs rdzogs nas// mchod dang gtor ma nyer
337a5(rgyud 'grel): sbyospyong sogs// sngar bzhin phul nas ye shes me// mnyes byas 'dod pa'i don blangs te// yi ge brgya pas gshegasu gsol// lhag pa'i rdzaswA kyis dgang blugs kyis// me lha mchod de gshegasu gsol// bdag gi don dang gzhan
337a6(rgyud 'grel): gyi don// byin za khyod kyis bsgrubs kyis gshegs// ji bzhin dusu slar gshegs te// bdag gi dngos grub thams cad bsgrubs// oM kr-i d+hA wa sarba satwar+tha sid+d+hi ra dat+ta ya thA nu gA gats+tsha traM bud+d+ha bi Sha ya pu na ra ma n+ya muHsbyin sreg
337b1(rgyud 'grel): gis ni lha rnams tshim// tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster// gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa// thams cad sbyin sreg ngag gis skyongs// de phyir rdo rje mkha' 'gro yis// sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad//
337b2(rgyud 'grel): 'dis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur// ye shes me ni rab tu dgyes// rgyal ba phan+da pa mnyes pa dang // gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang // pad+ma gar dpung mnyes pa dang // lcags mchog rgyal po mnyes pa dang
337b3(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pa brgya byin dbang chenA~M dang // khyab 'jug rlung dang me chen dang // thod ldan nyid dang 'dod lha dang // zla ba nyi ma gdon gzhan dang // sa ni zhags pas 'dzin pa dang // lus ngan de bzhin mtshams skyong dang // chos rgyal
337b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ni klu dang ni// dri za lha min mi 'am tsau// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas pa'i lha// 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni// 'phrul dga' yi sa ni lha rnams dang
337b5(rgyud 'grel): gang zhig dag pa'i gnas sen dang // 'od zer 'jig rten khams gnas dang // mi mjed khamasu gnas pa dang // gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can dang // glang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang // snod ldan sems
337b6(rgyud 'grel): can 'jig rten dang // lcags ma tshogs dang rtswa sogs dang // gang dag rab dga'i sar gnas dang // pha rol dri med gang phyir dang // 'od zer can du gnas pa dang // mi g.ye'i gnasu byas pa dang // gang zhig chos sprin rjes// /
338a1(rgyud 'grel): son pa// gang zhig sbyad dkar song ba dang // gang zhig 'od byed du ni gnas pas te// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang // 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyid//
338a2(rgyud 'grel): rA ni ral gri gzugs can dang // dmyal baM yi dwags byol song dang // lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// sbyin sreg tsho gas dgyes pa nyid// dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam las/ sbyin sreg gI byA ba ste dgu pa'o//
338a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags tshul rigs pa'i rnal 'byor pos// yid 'ong srog chags med pa'i gnas// legs sbyang dri zhim chus byugs nas// dus dang sbyar te ro ha~M brtsam// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bzlas pa yis// dri zhim chu yi sgra dang po bkru
338a4(rgyud 'grel): de nas rang lha'i rnal 'byor pas// rnam snang mdzad du de bsnams nas// rdo rje sdom pa byin nas kyang // bum pa'i dbang ni sbyin par bya// m-ig la sogs la gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// rdo rje
338a5(rgyud 'grel): khung rab 'byor pas// sbyin sreg rim pas sbyang bar bya// nyi ma dag ni gsum pa na// rus pa'i phreng ba bsdu bar bya// 'o ma dri zangs bsang gaut+to ra naso// de yi mchod rten yang dag brtsam// dpal kye rdo rje'i bya ba'i rim pa'i lam la stA ro ho mA gyis bya
338a6(rgyud 'grel): ba ste bcu pa'o// / blo dang ldan pa'i sgrub pa pos// rnal 'byor pho mo'i dkyil 'khor la// khyad par can gyi longs spyod kyis// tshogs kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// bsod nams 'dod pa'i sbyin bdag gis// dkyil 'khon
338b1(rgyud 'grel): Ni dang me tog bcas// dI yi thig khe'ing dbul bar bya// phyag 'tshal nas ni gsol ba gdab// dam tshig gso ba 'am gzhan gyis kyang // zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul// snga bar dge 'dun mchod ston bya// bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya//
338b2(rgyud 'grel): bla ma la ni yon dbul zhing // de yi rjes la tshegs kun la'o// gnas der tshogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dbyug sngon can la gsol btab nas// skal ldan skal mi ni shes 'gyur bas// dang por lus dang ngag gi brda// lung gi 'dir ni shos
338b3(rgyud 'grel): bar bya// gang zhig spun dang srin mo yang // the tshom med par rnam par shes// gang gis so mo gcig ston pa// 'ongs sa ma zhes ni 'dri ba yin// gnyis ni legs par 'ongs pa yin// mthe bong g.yon pa bcang ba ni// bde ba'i phyag rgyar
338b4(rgyud 'grel): shes par bya// gang zhig ming med ston pa la// de yi mthe chung sbyin par bya// gang zhig dbus ma ston pa la// de yis mdzub mo sbyin par bya// gang zhig ming med ston par bya// de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la//
338b5(rgyud 'grel): de la rtse gsum rab bstan bya// gang zhig nu ma ston pa lA// de la mtshams ni rab bstan bya// gang zhig sa ni sten pa la// de la 'khor lo rab tu bstan// gang zhig khro gany+tsir ston pa la// de la mgrin pUr// gtsug bud 'grol bar mngon
338b6(rgyud 'grel): pabar brjod// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la// de laM rgyab ni rab bstan bya// gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la// pho long rtse bar rol par bya// phyag rgya so so'i phyag rgya'o// dam tshig la yang dbye bar bya// de tshe rnal 'byor mas smras pa// e
339a1(rgyud 'grel): bA ni s+t+raing rje n+te// galA te phreng ba'i lhag ston nA// 'dra bar bya zhes b+hats+tsha pA yin// phreng byas mngon par gshegs byas la// dam tshig brtulta zhugs shin+na d+ha mA nos// mA nga na chung ba la sha/ ma la ya dzA
339a2(rgyud 'grel): debashrIn du// 'gro ba khe Ta ro shrA pa// rus pa'i rgyun ni ni rang shu// pre kha nAM shog ces rabo tsa na/ k+Sh+mI br-i te ni cang ta'u 'dong // du dur ni skal med brjod// skal ldan ka ri lAM dzaM raM 'dod// reg min din nI ma zhes bya// thod pad+ma bany+dza nA ma// zan ni
339a3(rgyud 'grel): hUMb+h+r-i dzA kA ra// tshad ma ma lA ti dI naM// bshang ba tsi t+tAr+ya sa m+b+ha brjod// kastA ri nI gtso bar 'dod// sIng+ga rang / 'byung shes par bya// ga bur ra ni khu bar sheste// sha chen shA laM dzA zhes brjod// dbang po gnyis s+yA krAn+d+ha rU// bo lA rdo rje bshad ba
339a4(rgyud 'grel): k+ko la ni pad+mar shes// rigs kyi dbye ba'i dbye ba yis// rigs ni rnam paM lnga zhes bshad// brda yi skad ni 'od dag la// sangs rgyas zhes bya rigs lha yin// g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs bshad// gar ma pad+ma rIg suM 'dod// rin chen rigs
339a5(rgyud 'grel): radang 'tshod mi// skye gnyis de bzhin gshegasas mar shes// las kyi rigs nyid rang 'tshong ma// phyag rgya 'di dag dngos grub ste // de yi khro ba rdo rje ya~Mn+d+ra/ mtshud byas brtul zhugs can gyis badrung // rdo rje snying pa sems dpa'u che// khyod la
339a6(rgyud 'grel): ngayi bshad pa gang // rmad du byung ba brda yi tshig/ de dag thams cad dang pas gzung // kye rdo rje las dbang bskur gang // brda yi skad ni mi smra ma/ de yi dam tshig nyam par ni// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// yams dang 'tsho ba rkun ma
339b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / gdon dang rims dang dug rnams dang // bArda yi skad ni myi smra nA// gal te sangs rgyas yin yang 'chi// rang gi dam tshig shes rnyed la// galA te tshig 'di ni sma na// de la gnas bzhir skyes pa yi// rnal 'byor ma ni khro bar byed//
339b2(rgyud 'grel): sgrub dus bkra shis dga' ston dang // dam tshig gso ba'i cho ga sogs// yi dwags zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // tshes brgyad kyi ni dus dgra la// dur khrod ri yi bya sgrib dang // de bzhin maM ma yin gyi gnas// yang na dben pa 'am rgya mtsho'i mthar//

339b4(rgyud 'grel): 'byor pa 'am dmigs nas ni// bems po'i gnasu sreg blugs bya// shar lho byang dang ngag phyogasuM// phyogs gnas rnams ni dga' bar byed// phyogs bral rnamasu lha mo rnamasaka/ dam pa'i tshe yi mchod par bya// lcags kyu lha dang

339b6(rgyud 'grel): sring mo'i bu mo sgyug mo ste// de nas rgyas par mchod byas nas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'grub par 'gyur// thod pa chen po che gcig pa// chang ni bzang pos bkang byas te// bla ma la dbus skal ldan mo// phyag btsal nas ni bdag

340a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas po la ste// mum+mu ni k+She kak+ke la// kyai khyod kri pi ta brdung ba// snying rje ku cho mi byed// der ni ba la bza' bar bya// bsdoms pa ra ma da na btung // kye ka l-i dz+re ni bzhugs bai ra bya// du du ra ni spang bar bya// tsa u su ma ka thu ro// ga pur sih+las
340a3(rgyud 'grel): byug par bya// shU li ma la ti daM naM// der ni rkang pa bza' bar bya// phreng bya khan dang khe tA byed// dag dang ma dag mi bta'o// ni raM s+yA yis yan lag brgyan// der ni shra pa rnam par gzhugs// ma la dz+r-i ni kun+du ru// dI da ma ni dor mi spangs// hi ru

340b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / phyi rol tshad du brtag par bya// sgrub pa po dang rnal 'byor mas// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i ston mo naM// gang du zos na dngos grub ni// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub byed pa'o// de lngar glu gar bkra shis dang // smon lam cho ga kun rdzogs

340b5(rgyud 'grel): bskyed/ lta stangs dag ni dgra bgegs skad// sngags dang bcas paSh+Ti stangs stabs kyis// shar gyi gnas ni mnan par bya// rim pa 'di nyid kyis ni gzhan// sgo gonas dag gis kyang ni mnan// lag pa g.yos dang g.yon dag gis/
